Summary Heading: Americas Best Value Inn and Suites Anaheim
Summary: Very convenient to the Anaheim convention center and great accomodations with microwave and refridgerator and morning coffee service. Room is clean and spacious, kept well furnished. Bed could be upgraded though.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you so much for taking time out of your busy schedule to review us. We are delighted with your decision to stay with us, and we are glad that you liked the cleanliness. We are very particular about the overall cleanliness and hygiene, and hence, we are happy with your praise. We highly appreciate your decision to select us, and we have thoroughly enjoyed hosting you. We look forward to hosting you soon!   Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: Within a 20 minute walk of Disneyland. Nothing extra, no coffee maker or breakfast but close to Starbucks and other places. You do get a microwave, fridge and ironing board. It was perfect for a Disneyland stay. Bed was comfortable and the front desk staff is very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thanks for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your experience with us. We are glad to know that you found everything in order and seemed to like our service. We hope to do have the privilege of hosting you again.    Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great Staff, Not so great room
Summary: The staff was fantastic. The room has been updated & was very clean but All the lamps were rusted. The blow dryer was rusted & the plug did not work. Had to plug in to lamp on table. The walls are super thin & could hear EVERYTHING! I did not turn on heater because of the amount of dust & possibly rust on the vents inside room & out.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you so much for your review. While we are happy that you enjoyed your stay with us, we are disappointed for failing to blow it out of the park for you. We are sorry that the thin walls failed to contain the outside noise. We wish you had brought this to our notice earlier as this would have helped us find a better alternative. We will make sure to highlight the issue to our management, and we hope to take steps to avoid such instances going forward. We look forward to hosting you soon!   Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: Stayed here a couple nights because it is walking distance to Disneyland. Room was clean and plenty of parking. Staff at the front desk was very friendly. Recommend to anyone who is making a quick trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: They gave me an up grade floor level room at no cost. Friendly check in/ out, Clean room with good daily service, close to Disneyland, Comfortable bed. The Garden Walk is steps away and the walk to Disney is nice. Free parking and Internet of course. I will stay again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you so much for your valuable feedback. We are delighted to know that you had a clean and comfortable stay with us. We as an organization have always strived to provide our guests with the best possible service along with a clean and comfortable stay, and we take all possible measures to ensure just that. We feel glad to be acknowledged for the hard work that goes into ensuring it and we would be delighted to be able to host you the next time you are in the vicinity.   Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: Great location, staff was very helpful. Hotel was an older hotel, but great price for the location.  Pool and hot tub were nice and kids had a great time.  Hotel didn’t have a laundry room, but the front desk gave us the info to go next door and they slowed us to us theirs.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great stay at a nice and close location to Disneyland, with plenty of additional options to nearby restaurants. Walking distance to the park but also to shops like Starbucks in a nice and safe location.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you for taking the time to review your stay at our hotel. We trust that you had a pleasant time while being with us and, we hope we have the privilege of hosting you yet again.  Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: Very happy with our stay here. I've been to Anaheim a heap of times. I don't need to stay across the street and pay silly prices, I always stay on Katella Avenue at various hotels.  This was my first time at Americas Best Value Inn. We arrived pretty early (11am) and were allowed to have our room for a small fee ($25) which I was happy to pay to offload our luggage and get to Downtown Disney.  Our room was very clean and comfortable. Beds were great, pillows were a little too soft for my liking but Pillows don't suit everyone.  We had a room with 3 beds, 1 queen in a separate room and 2 doubles in the main room with a small fridge and microwave.  We could hear a lot of noise from neighbours in the connecting room but none at bedtime so it never really bothered us.  We were up at
Manager Response: Dear guest, we are delighted that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Our primary aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and we feel glad to be able to provide you with one. We look forward to welcoming you back when you are next in the area. Thank you so much for your review! Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: The room was clean and that's the biggest thing that matters to me. I was a little nervous about the crickets review posted a few months prior. My room didn't experience that issue and I'm glad I didn't! It was clean and well-kept. The furniture itself and all isn't the newest thing ever, such as the paint might show some chipping but, I did feel the bed was clean after checking the sheets and such. The bathroom was well checked and clean too, decent shower pressure and comes with a bathtub. The owner is very nice as well!
Manager Response: none

Summary: hotel was 15 min walk to disney. pros: close to shops, restaurants, disney, new bathroom, ac, comfortable bed and nice tv. cons: floors were dirty, mattress had chip crumbs on it, bathtub had hair on it. no continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you so much for taking time out of your busy schedule to review us. Your feedback makes us happy and, we are delighted to hear about your impression and experience with us. However, we appreciate you for highlighting these issues and, we will take steps to ensure such experiences do not reoccur. We apologize for failing to fulfil your expectation, and if we were made aware of this, it would have helped us provide you with a better experience. We hope to remain your hotel of choice in this area and to give you a better stay on a future visit.  Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: Great hotel. Stayed one night for a visit at Disneyland. Room was very clean and spacious. Quiet location.  Easy parking. 15 minute walk to the park. Will definitely stay there again next time we are in town.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you so much for taking time out of your busy schedule to review us. We are delighted with your decision to stay with us, and we are glad that you liked the cleanliness. We are very particular about the overall cleanliness and hygiene, and hence, we are happy with your praise. We highly appreciate your decision to select us, and we have thoroughly enjoyed hosting you. We look forward to hosting you soon!   Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: This hotel was clean, huge room comfortable beds and literally under a 10 minute walk to Disneyland!! We will definitely come Back and stay at this hotel again. Please do not be rely on reviews. It was very clean. Plus they clean your room daily if asked.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you so much for your valued response. We are delighted to know that you had a clean and comfortable stay with us. We as an organization have always strived to provide our guests with the best possible service along with a clean and comfortable stay, and we take all possible measures to ensure just that. We feel glad to be acknowledged for the hard work that goes into ensuring it and we would be delighted to be able to host you the next time you are in the vicinity.   Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: We stayed here since we were gone to Disneyland. It is a 8 minute walk. When you walk out of the hotel turn right to the corner and there is a Mexican restaurant and the food is yummy. There is also a pizza restaurant also very good. And at the end of the shopping plaza is a gift shop prices is excellent for souvenirs. Now back to the hotel it is a little old BUT !!! The owners keep it clean which is number for me. The pool is super clean and there is a bigger than most hotels . I would stay here again and again it ain’t fancy but cleanliness and value is what I look for . And it was quiet
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was one of the cheaper hotels we have stayed in around the Disneyland area.  Check in was fine and the chap was polite, but the reception area wasn't very inviting. It comes with parking and we left the car there whilst going to Disney with no issues. We had a mini suite, room 210 and it had a large queen bed with TV, fridge/freezer and a small table. There was also a small room with a king bed in (nothing else) which we didn't use. The bathroom was nice enough although the water pressure was very weak in the shower.  The towels were old and looked like they had been cut up with frayed ends. They definitely need replacing.  This hotel is missing out by leaving its rooms so bare!  Just some colourful pictures would make a big difference. And please add a coffee machine to
Manager Response: none

Summary: This property was perfect for us.  Easy 15 minute walk to security at Disneyland parks.  We were able to return for mid day naps.  Across the street from toy story parking parking lot.  9 minute walk from shuttle. We appreciated the wifi and air conditioning.  We only wanted housekeeping once and they did a good job.  Anaheim garden walk was less than 5 minutes away and full of great restaurants.  CVS and Walgreens are close for last minute staples.  Bed was comfortable and suite was big.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our room was large and comfortable. Bare bones, but it was clean, cool in the heat wave, and had what we needed for the price. Not a lot of storage or space to sit and eat, but we were close to so many restaurants that it was fine. Just a great value for the area!
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you so much for your valued response. We are delighted to know that you had a comfortable stay with us. We as an organization have always strived to provide our guests with the best possible service along with a clean and comfortable stay, and we take all possible measures to ensure just that. We feel glad to be acknowledged for the hard work that goes into ensuring it and we would be delighted to be able to host you the next time you are in the vicinity.   Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: I'm a lil on the cheap side when it comes to hotels usually because it's just a place to sleep and shower. We're usually not hanging out at the hotel so no point in it being overly extravagant. This place was great! Upon driving in it does look run down and older but the rooms have been renovated with a modern look. We had the 2 bedroom suite which was great for a family of 6, with 3 queen beds. Free parking and Its about a 15-20 min walk to Disneyland. Overall we would totally stay again and recommend America's best value in aneheim :)
Manager Response: Dear guest, we highly appreciate your candid review of your recent stay at our hotel. Your feedback is valuable to us, as we strive to enhance our daily performance. We hope you had a great trip to Disneyland and we look forward to hosting you again.  Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: I thought the motel was great good price clean good sized rooms air conditioner worked perfect nice and quiet. The gentleman in the office had a smile on his face was very nice and polite.I would stay again if needed and recommened it to others.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to write us a review. We are delighted to know that you have enjoyed your stay with us and, we hope that we have the pleasure of hosting you again.   Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: Great hotel for big families. Love that parking is included in your stay and that you don’t have to pay any additional fees. Walkable distance to Disneyland estimated between 15-20mins. Easy access to the swimming pool. Vending and ice machines can be easily found.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you so much for your feedback. We are delighted that you had such a pleasant stay and appreciate you for choosing to stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you back when you are next in the area.   Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: The room was pretty good size. The bed was so comfy. My kids swam in the pool that was a decent size. The location was amazing. We went to Disneyland and the open shopping center next door in the same day.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you for sharing your experience with us. We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and the location was convenient for you. We look forward to serving you soon!   Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: This hotel was absolutely wonderful and within walking distance of Disneyland. The room was huge and had great amenities. The room had a beautiful large shower and bathroom area.  There is a very nice restaurants surrounding area has lots of stores with plenty of places to eat within walking distance. This hotel was quiet, the staff was friendly and the price was extremely reasonable. I will definitely be staying here again in the future. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone in the Anaheim area!
Manager Response: Dear guest, we are delighted that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Our primary aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and we feel glad to be able to provide you with one. We look forward to welcoming you back when you are next in the area. Thank you so much for your review! Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: My family and I arrived at the property and from check in to checkout have not a single complaint! The front desk was phenomenal. They helped us in any and every way that they could without any hesitation. The room was very clean, beds were super comfortable, and the property was quiet despite being in a busy area. We are super happy and pleased with our stay!
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you for writing to us about your recent stay. We take great pride in serving our guests with great care and professionalism and, it feels great to know that you feel the same way. Our front desk executives shall be more than happy to receive your compliment. Hope to see you soon! Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: Front desk staff was friendly. Check in/out was easy. The room itself was very big and everything was super clean. We booked this room for a trip to Disneyland. The rates were very affordable. Would recommend
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you for writing to us about your recent stay. We take great pride in serving our guests with great care and professionalism and, it feels great to know that you feel the same way. Our front desk executives shall be more than happy to receive your compliment. Hope to see you soon!  Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: So close to Disney, shopping and restaurants! Wood flooring instead of carpet and I love how the suite bedroom had a locking door for privacy. The bathroom was beautiful! Will definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you for sharing your experience with us. We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and the location was convenient for you. We hope you enjoyed your trip with us and we look forward to serving you soon!   Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: Great location. Nice stay. The front desk  employees were really nice and professional. I will definitely stay again. Really close to Disneyland maybe 6 or 8 min walk  Only negative about stay is I had a bottom room and the guests above us were loud and stomping you could hear everything.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you so much for your valuable feedback. While we are glad that you chose to stay with us, we are disappointed to hear about your experience. We sincerely apologize for the issues related to the noise made by the neighbors and the thin walls that kept you from sleeping. We promise to look into your claims of noisy neighbors and impose strict guidelines to avoid such incidents from happening again. We hope you give us another opportunity to redeem ourselves and provide you with a better experience.   Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: The property was clean and accommodated our family well. We were able to sleep 6 comfortably. It was about a 12 minute walk to the Disneyland park.Staff was very helpful and polite. This is an older property without many modern updates, but there was a fridge, microwave, and blow dryer. The only complaint we had was that there wasn’t room service (due to COVID), so after 3 days the towels were piling up! Other than that, if you’re looking to save some money, this place was great.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you so much for your valuable feedback. We are sorry to note from your rating that you did not love your time at our hotel, and we apologize for any shortcomings you encountered in terms of our service. Should you stay with us again, please do know to make us aware of anything that we can do to improve any aspect of your stay, and we will do our utmost to give you the very best possible stay here. We hope to welcome you back for a better stay soon.  Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: Easy walk to the park. Starbucks and Walgreens right across the street. There are also nearby gas stations and eateries for late night snacks.  We have a large family so we appreciated the fridge and microwave. Great for saving money on breakfast and packing sandwiches for the park. We also found our room had 4 bed when we only booked 3. That was a nice surprise. Will stay again!
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to provide us with feedback. We are delighted to know that you had an enjoyable experience while being with us and, we look forward to having you back with us again.  Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: America’s Best Value Inn & Suites is not as fancy as some hotels, but, it is clean and comfortable, with a courteous and efficient staff and free parking. Also, and most importantly, it’s only a five minute walk to the gates of Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear guest, thanks for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your experience with us. We are glad to know that you found everything in order and seemed to like our service. We hope to do have the privilege of hosting you again.    Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: Did the job but probably wouldn’t stay again. No special flare. U get what u paid for. Room was clean but nothing special. Location was perfect. Close walk to Disney and any store and food that u would need. No food available. Pool was fine but in the middle of every single persons room so no privacy.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you so much for taking time out of your busy schedule to write us a review. We are so disappointed to hear that you had such a negative experience during your stay with us. Please accept our most sincere apologies that we failed to deliver a comfortable stay with us, and we were unable to leave a positive impression on you. We will review your comments in detail and make changes wherever possible in improving and training our staff, to ensure a better experience for our future guests. We hope you give us another chance to redeem ourselves and provide you with a better experience.   Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: This hotel is not great. When we arrived it was 8pm. The lobby was locked and had to ring the outside bell. The room was dirty. The floor looked like it hadn’t been mopped/ cleaned in days and days. The beds and the toilet had hairs. The walls are stained and the sheets smelled. My mom wiped the arms of the chair so my toddler could sit on it and the wipe was black. The chair was heavily stained so we had to put a towel down for her to even sit on it. They’ve made some updates and it could be a decent enough place but it needs a deep cleaning majorly! The shower also did not drain. We stayed for two nights for a trip to Disney and it is in walking distance. It’s about a 15 minute walk. At the end of a long day at Disney it seems longer. The description that says it’s a block
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you so much for your valuable feedback. We are so disappointed to hear that you had such a negative experience during your stay with us. Please accept our most sincere apologies - you did not have a typical experience in our hotel at all. We promise to take appropriate measures regarding the issues highlighted by you. We wish you had brought this to our notice earlier as this would have helped us find a better alternative. We will make sure to highlight the issues to our management, and we hope to take steps to avoid such instances going forward. We look forward to hosting you soon!   Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: I came to Azusa for business and had a great time in this wonderful hotel
Summary: I came to Azusa for business and stayed in Americas Best Value Inn. This is a great hotel ever.  It's very clean and stuff is nice! Price is ok for California State. I would definitely recommend this hotel! Thank you everybody for your hospitality.
Manager Response: Dear guest, We are always pleased to receive feedback from our visitors in relation to their stays with us, and we are delighted with your rating and comments - thank you very much. We are glad to hear that you had a great time with us, and it's nice to read that you found our accommodation clean and staff pleasant. We also appreciate your kind words for our hospitality, and we are happy to know that our price suited you. Thank you for recommending our property to prospective guests. This means a lot to us. It was a pleasure to host you, and we look forward to having you back many more times in the future.  Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: The owners were extremely helpful and accommodating! This facility is in a prime location for Disney. I would recommend this facility for families traveling on a budget for the family suite-3 beds is hard to beat! You can also get a adjoining room to the suite.
Manager Response: Dear guest, It is great to receive feedback from you regarding your recent visit, and we are pleased to hear that you had an excellent stay with us. We are glad that our proximity to Disney suited you, and it's nice to read that you found our property owners helpful and accommodating. We also hope your stay was comfortable, and you had easy access to everything you needed. Thank you for recommending our property to prospective guests. We would be happy to know if there is anything that we can do to make the next visit even more enjoyable for you, and we look forward to having you back soon for another pleasant stay during your next trip to the area.  Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: Great for a 1-2 night stay. Rooms weren’t to small, queen size bed, and was even able to get a crib for my 11 month old. Staff was very accommodating. Don’t let the outside fool you, the rooms are up to date and even have a microwave, refrigerator and coffee maker with coffee. Will definitely be staying again next time we visit Disney
Manager Response: Dear guest, It is great to receive feedback from you regarding your recent stay with us, and we are pleased to hear that you had a positive overall impression of your visit. It's nice to read that the size of the room suited you, and we appreciate you telling us that you found the room up-to-date and well-stocked and our staff accommodating. We also hope your stay was comfortable, and you had easy access to everything you needed. Please do let us know if there is anything that we can do to make the next experience even more enjoyable for you. We look forward to having you back soon for another pleasant stay during your next trip to the area.  Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: The usual, early morning car drop off, then on to the parks to meet friends. Came back later in the day, to check-in, and grab a nap, before back to the park for the evening.  Friendly check-in, no hassle, second floor room as I like. Clean and everything working.  I give it 5stars, because it is just what I am looking for in a visit. Clean, close to the parks, and easy on your budget. Still plentiful free parking.  A short walk to your left, and you get the Garden Walk, BubbaGumps, Cheesecake factory. To your short walk right, a strip mall with several places to eat, including Subway.
Manager Response: Dear guest, We are always pleased to receive feedback from our guests in relation to their stays with us, and we are delighted with your rating and comments - thank you very much. We are glad that our location suited you and it's nice to read that you found our accommodation clean, functional and affordable and parking adequate. We also appreciate you telling us that you had a friendly and hassle-free check-in experience. We are happy to have satisfied you well, and we hope to remain your property of choice here for future visits.  Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: We chose this hotel for its proximity to Disney Land and for it’s continental breakfast. The first reason was a plus, the second reason was a minus.   When we got there I found out our room (a suite), had been accidentally given to someone with a similar name to mine. We were given a smaller, cheaper room the the 2 nights and reimbursed the difference in price.   The room was more updated than I expected compared to the outside of the building. The detailed cleaning in the bathroom was less than I hoped for. The “continental breakfast “ was adequate but very slim choices.   Would I stay here again? Maybe.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for reviewing your stay with us and letting us know that our proximity to Disneyland suited you. We appreciate it. Your feedback about the mix-up over the assignment of your room is duly noted, and we sincerely apologize that our hospitality and attention to details left something to be desired - this is very unlike us. We are also sorry for the disappointment you describe with our breakfast selection. We take guest feedback very seriously, and we will consider adding some more options to the breakfast menu when we review it again in the future. Your comment, related to the cleaning of the bathroom, has been taken on board as well. At America's Best Value Inn-Anaheim, we take upkeep and cleanliness very seriously. Our staff generally does a great job when it comes to maintaining our property and the rooms, so it is strange that this happened. We will ensure your comments are additionally reviewed by our team so that our standards of cleanliness are maintained at all times. Many thanks for sharing your feedback with us. We know we can do better, and it would be an honor to have another chance to host you and delight you with the exceptional experience that our guests have come to expect from us.  Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: Don't expect a breakfast, but its cheap, within walking distance to the park and food, and a comfortable stay. Even for a disabled person; I had ease within the room.  Small parking lot and means of getting in and out of it, but it was safe, and my car was untouched.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for the positive rating. We appreciate you letting us know that you had a comfortable stay with us. It's also nice to read that you found our accommodation affordable and that our proximity to the park and food outlets suited you. Your feedback about the parking lot is duly noted. Parking is a significant concern in the city due to space constraint. Nevertheless, we do provide this convenient service for our guests, and we are glad that you found our parking facility safe. Many thanks for trusting us with your business and for taking the time to post your review. We hope to host you again in the future for another pleasant stay during your next trip to the area.  Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: The hotel itself was just ok. We had a nice refurbished room with a comfy bed, but the room could have been a bit cleaner and the sound proofing was awful so bring earplugs. We could hear people walking around upstairs all night. The location of the hotel is good- 10 minute walk to Disney. If you just want a comfy bed for a cheap price then this should do the trick.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate you recognizing our location, and we are glad to know that you liked the refurbished room and the comfortable bed. We have also noted your concerns related to cleanliness and noise. At America's Best Value Inn-Anaheim, we take upkeep and cleanliness very seriously, and your room should always feel fresh and clean. Our staff generally does a great job when it comes to maintaining our property and the rooms, so it is strange that this happened. Please accept our sincere apologies for the shortcomings that did not ensure a top-notch stay for you. It is disappointing if a guest leaves with less than first-rate experience - this is very unlike us. We hope for a chance to redeem ourselves with you and delight you with the wonderful stay that the vast majority of our guests usually have with us.  Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Still one of the best values for so close to Disneyland
Summary: Had another single day stay-over. Wasn't able to get an upstairs room this time, as the property was booked solid the night before. Luck of the draw. But as usual, everything working....clean....comfortable. Still free parking. The ART pickup has moved, and now is a little down the street at the Wyndam. But on the way back, you can now drop off at the cheesecake factory. Art changed all of their routes and names. Always greeted with a smile, and friendly staff.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Many thanks for your kind words and positive rating. Reviews like yours are what keep us going the extra mile to deliver our best. We are delighted to read that you had yet another satisfying stay with us and we appreciate you recognizing the property's cleanliness, our friendly staff and the free parking. It was a pleasure to host you, and and we hope to welcome you back many more times in the future.  Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: We stayed just for the night. It was a great mattress and decent room for the price. Proximity to the park was great. Check in and check out was super easy and friendly. They where the best part of our trip besides Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It's great to hear back from you and we are glad that you found good value for the money you spent. It's nice that you found the room decent and the mattress comfortable. We are also glad that you liked our location and proximity to Disney. We look forward to having you back the next time you are in the area.  Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great low priced place to stay, not too busy
Summary: Hotel was easy walking distance to DisneyLand ... far more walking in the park than from hotel to the park ... there are other closer hotels, but we could easily walk back to the hotel during the day and watch the fireworks from the hotel at night.  Breakfast was just ok ... nothing hot other than coffee and oatmeal, but that was expected.  Place looked like a dump when we walked up, but when we got to room we were pleasantly surprised by a great room with good space for our three kids and us.  Kids loved the pool (we were pretty much the only family using the pool in May).  Hot tub was nice to relax in after so much walking at Disneyland.  Easy to get groceries/food at Walgreens/CVS and nearby restaurants.   Overall a really good experience, especially for the price!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We appreciate your feedback and we thank you for giving prospective guests who may be reading the comments relevant information about our location and proximity to Disney. We are glad you like the spacious room and that the kids enjoyed the pool. We will see what we can do about having some updates to the property soon. We look forward to having you back the next time you are in the area.  Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: My family & I like to stay at Americas Best Value Inn & Suites each time we go to Disneyland, Ca. We like the fact that they offer mini suite so my 2 daughters can stay in a room and my husband and I can stay in the other so we all can have some privacy.  The location is within walking distance to Disneyland Park, it takes about 15-20 minutes and along the way, we can pick up som snacks from nearby stores such as Walgreens, CVS or 7-Eleven.  The hotel does offer breakfast but it is very basic like small cupcakes and coffee.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your review and we appreciate you giving prospective guests relevant information about our location and proximity to Disneyland as well as local shops. We are glad you liked the suite and we hope you and your family had a comfortable stay. Your feedback about breakfast is duly noted and we will consider adding some more options in the future. We look forward to having you back soon.  Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Tired and dirty, but close to Disneyland
Summary: Let's face it, if you're staying here, it ain't for the atmosphere, it's because it's fairly inexpensive, about a 15 minute walk from the Disneyland Resort, and a relatively quiet place to crash at the end of a big day at the park.  Although some of the rooms might be nicer, mine very certainly was not. It was fairly large, but only because of a "hot tub" room featuring a hot tub that probably hadn't been used since the 1980s (and didn't have knobs to turn it on, anyway). The room hasn't been properly cleaned beyond the bare minimum in quite some time (i.e. bedding) - dust and dirt all over the walls, floorboards, etc. The "breakfast" consisted of boxes of Cheerios, packaged muffins and snack cakes and some apples.  But again, you won't be staying here to enjoy the room, you'll
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your review and we appreciate you giving prospective guests relevant information about our location and proximity to Disneyland. Your feedback about cleanliness is noted and we will see to it that our staff does a better job preparing the rooms moving forward. We will also see what we can do about having some updates to the property soon. Your comment about breakfast is also duly noted and we will consider adding some more options in the future. We hope you consider staying with us again soon.  Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: The shuttle service was great, it took hardly 10 minutes to arrive after the call from the free phone from the baggage area. The hotel requires a deposit of 100 plus dollars at check-in plus advance payment for the booking. The deposit will be refunded after checkout. There are many restaurants in the area. McDonald's and Wendy's close by. Public bus stops are there in front of the hotel for downtown and for the airport. There are a number of hotels in the area.  The suite was clean and has sufficient space and furnishings. Bathrooms have hot water and the suite has heating. There is a fridge and a microwave in the room. It does not have a coffee maker. They have a free continental breakfast from 6.30 am to 9.30am.
Manager Response: We are always pleased to receive feedback from our guests in relation to their stays with us, and we are delighted with your rating, thank you very much. We are happy to have satisfied you so well, and we hope to remain your hotel of choice here for future visits.

Summary: Im really surprised to see reviews with 4-5 stars i must have missed everything these other people saw in this hotel, im usually not picky but dear lord I regret booking here. Just came back from a weekend at Disney, i didn't sleep all weekend. I got put in a room by the street that was a bad start, i told em if they could move me and they said sorry nothing left. Bed was hard and uncomfortable, bathroom door didn’t lock, the outside needs some major remodeling, i don't even think its safe. While lying in bed i could hear all the steps from people walking upstairs, floors squeaking like crazy i thought they were gunna fall thru. Thank god they had no kids. If i were able to get my money back right there and then i would have and spent a lil more somewhere else. I didn't even try
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you so much for staying with us and for your feedback. We always aim to provide a clean, comfortable and pleasant stay for all our guests, so we are very sorry to see that we did not achieve that during your visit. As you know, we are located very close to Disney, so this is a very energetic area. Our hotel does have wide range of rooms, suitable for all our guests. We would have gladly shifted you to a more suitable room of your choice, but we were completely booked. Please accept our sincere apologies that we were not able to offer you another. Furthermore, we take upkeep and cleanliness very seriously and your room should always feel fresh and clean. Our staff generally does a great job when it comes to maintaining our hotel and preparing the rooms for upcoming guests, so it is strange that you found stains. This is very unusual. If there is ever any issue with your room upkeep, just let us know, we are always here to help! We do hope that you will give us another chance to restore your faith in our hotel and hospitality. Thanks again.   Kind regards, Customer Care Team

Summary: The Best Value Inn in Cheyenne Wyoming was a nice stay for sure. Its off exit 9 going north on the I-25. The night manager was more then helpful very polite and welcoming. The room was very nice, king bed very clean. We would definitely stay again. We are seniors and were given a senior rate which was really attractive and was the reason we chose to stay there. The 1 huge draw back was the $15. booking service fee that was charged when we booked. I would recomend phoning the inn directly rather the using the.com service. We were quoted and paid $66.75 but ended up with a total of $96.39 in fees and taxes. Really was quite surprising and disappointing. We will always be careful in the future when booking,try to book direct to the place we decide to stay.
Manager Response: We are always pleased to receive feedback from our guests in relation to their stays with us, and we are delighted with your rating, thank you very much. We are happy to have satisfied you so well, and we hope to remain your hotel of choice here for future visits.

Summary Heading: Stayed for 4 nights to attend a convention
Summary: Really good value for money. Travelled from the UK to attend a weekend convention at Anaheim Convention Centre. Great location - walking distance from many shops, restaurants and Disneyland. Would recommend if you're not planning on spending lots of time in the room. Staff were lovely and we had no problems.
Manager Response: It sounds as if our hotel was perfect for your needs, and we are delighted that you enjoyed your time with us so much. Thank you for your positive rating; we hope that you will have an opportunity to make a return visit very soon.

Summary Heading: Above average motel and very convenient location
Summary: Stayed here for two nights to enjoy one day in the parks. I had previously stayed at a Best Western across from the entrance to the parks, but that was booked. The walk from the property to the parks is easy - 15 minutes max. There are some transient individuals around the area, but none on Katella or near the Inn - it was close to other hotels and very safe.   Our room was right behind the sign on the front of the building, and there are brights lights in the walkways, so it was very bright in our room and it didn't have blinds. We were on the second floor and had no carpeting, so it's possible lower floors are louder, but I can't speak to that. The room was very clean and modern, there were some scratches or cracks in the floor/bathroom but that kind of thing doesn't bother
Manager Response: Many thanks for your positive rating – we are delighted that you enjoyed your time at our property so much. We hope to host you again successfully in the near future.

Summary Heading: Clean, large room, close to the park
Summary: Stayed 4 nights to go to Disneyland. Booked a 2 room suite. The main room had 2 full beds. The smaller room was off the main room. It had a full sized bed and a tv There was a door separating it for privacy. It was clean and reasonably priced. No issues with our stay. Would stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Basic Hotel within walking distance of Disney
Summary: We booked this hotel when there wasn't a lot of options.  The bed was comfortable and the room was quiet.  The bathroom was very dirty and needed the walls and floor fixed.  The breakfast was not very good.  But parking was free and you can walk to Disney.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: 2 More great stays at a super location for Disneyland visits
Summary: Stayed 2 days in Feb, and 2 days the beginning of March.  Each stay, greeted with a friendly front desk. Great clean rooms. Easy free parking, with enough stalls for everyone. Super price, for as close it is to Disneyland.  This location has its own website, that gives you <usually> better prices than the corporate website. Check it out.  They also let you pre-check in early. Drop off your car, with the parking pass, come get your room later. So much easier, and cheaper then trying to park Disney for $30 and ride the tram. Also ART #6 stop is right in front of this entrance by the front desk.   The people who run this location are always super friendly nice people. Love this place.
Manager Response: It sounds as if our hotel was perfect for your needs, and we are delighted that you enjoyed your time with us so much. Thank you for your positive rating; we hope that you will have an opportunity to make a return visit very soon.

Summary Heading: Everything you need for your trip to Disneyland
Summary: 1. Great prices allowing you to spend more at the park.   2. Clean pool and hot tub open from 9-9  3. Light breakfast which can be surprisingly filling. I had 2 cereal boxes and 2 apples and that was enough sustenance until lunch.   4. 15 minute walk to the parks or Downtown Disney.   5. Very friendly and knowledgeable staff.   6. Used Super Shuttle which picks up and drops off at the hotel.   7.  Room was spotless with new hardwood laminate flooring and tons of space.   8.  Rooms were cleaned daily and bed was finely made.   9.  Had a lovely fountain outside that provided excellent white noise throughout the day and night.   10.  Heater and air conditioning unit worked fine.   Conclusion: would definitely stay here again. It had everything I could want on my trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thanks for your comments. We are so pleased that you found our hotel to be a nice place to stay. We are also glad that our hotel impressed you enough that you would stay with us again. We enjoy providing a great experience for all kinds of travelers, and we are very pleased that you enjoyed being with us at our hotel. We’ll be here for you in the future if you visit the area again, as we always strive to maintain a great experience for guests like you. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary Heading: Clean and comfortable suites close to Disneyland
Summary: Enjoyed our stay at this location, the suites were well maintained and cleaned with friendly staff. I particularly wanted to thank the staff member who assisted me in retrieving my Card/Document holder from the last place we had stayed in Las Vegas. He was extremely helpful and this was much appreciated. The location is only a gentle 5 minute walk from Disney and other services. The beds are very comfortable with clean fresh linen. If we have the opportunity to visit, we would certainly stay here.
Manager Response: Dear Christine, We will pass your kind remarks on to the rest of the staff - we do pride ourselves on having some of the friendliest faces in the neighborhood. Please don't hesitate to get in touch with us directly to book your next stay - we look forward to seeing you again! Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: I had a great stay here. Comfy bed, pretty clean room with soap and shampoo. Some days we didn’t get enough towels but when requested they brought them to our room. The staff were friendly and helpful too. A close walking distance of no more than 15 minutes to Disneyland. The walk felt safe as there are other hotels in the area. There are also some shops and food outlets nearby too. Would recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Kate, We are thrilled with your feedback and to know that you enjoyed your time with us so much. We appreciate your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back very soon.  Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: Let me start by saying how much we loved our stay. It’s clean, close to Disneyland, restaurants and shops, easy on and off the highway, nice hot tub and pool, and super friendly people. The best part was the price of $72 per night, free parking and it was soooo quiet. Sigh. Gotta love that for a motel.   They put out a little food for a simple continental breakfast of cereal, fruit and coffee, but it’s fresh and organized. It definitely doesn’t look like it’s been sitting there for days! Yay!  The office staff is really nice and so are the cleaning crew. They have a booth at the front of the motel staffed with people to help you find things to do in town if you’re a traveler.   As anyone who reads my reviews knows, I come to Disneyland a lot and this bargain motel has made it
Manager Response: Dear Vbleghorn, Thank you so much for leaving such a kind and lovely review! We really appreciate you taking time out of your busy schedule to leave us your feedback. We are delighted that you enjoyed your time with us so much! Please come back soon. We will be waiting for you! Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: I would like to thank the hotel staff for an easy stay. My needs were met with a smile and it left a lasting impression! Hats off to you folks.   Nearby is Downtown & The Landing. Plenty of eateries, shopping, and highway access. Yoh can also visit Ballpark Village or see a Saint Louis Cardinals game.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing about your time with us. We appreciate your rating and comments and are glad you enjoyed our hotel. We take pride in providing our guests with everything they need for a great stay. We look forward to your next visit.  Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary Heading: Close to parks and cheap but...
Summary: When I left this motel I was willing to give it 2 stars, yet never stay there again. This was due to many factors. The first, thin walls were I could hear every shower and flush, seems my room was between the bathrooms. The second being hardwood floors, I understand that it makes cleaning easier but then they should clean them and that includes the corners. The other problem with these floors is that nothing was done to sound proof the ceiling and it was lots of fun to hear people leaving and rolling their cases across the floor at 4:30am.  Third the bathrooms are in need of an update. The bath tub was extremely scratched and then a large patch was added to try and hide this. The shower faucet controls were very hard to turn and use. There is no fan in the bathroom and the
Manager Response: Dear Shannon, We're very sorry and absolutely shocked that you appear to have had such a bad experience during your recent stay with us. This isn't the usual feedback that we get and not the common experience that our guests have. Thank you for your comments - we will investigate and see if there is any action that we can take to see if we can improve our guest's experience. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary Heading: Clean room and 10 Mins from Disneyland
Summary: For $100 USD I guess this is relatively good value. The Room was clean and had newer flooring and bedding. Overall the room was Ok but pretty run down and in need of repair/replacement in the bathroom. The Hotel is approx. a 10=15 min walk to Disneyland
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are known for the excellent value that we offer in this location, and we appreciate your acknowledgement of this. It sounds as if our property was suitable for your stay in this area, and if you have similar accommodation requirements here again, we hope that you will choose to stay with us again. Thank you for your review. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: Quick painless check-in. Got my room keys, car parking permit, wifi password slip. Second room floor near the front desk, as requested. Everything clean and working. Always a friendly greeting, they still remember my name.  Bed was great, slept great. Fantastic people run this location. Super location, without the crazy Disneyland area prices.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing about your time with us. We appreciate your rating and comments and are glad you enjoyed our hotel. We take pride in providing our guests with everything they need for a great stay. We look forward to your next visit.  Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: A quite old style motel with very limited amenities and very old bathrooms, I found the convenience to walk to the convention center and Disneyland, as well as the price quite compelling, good service and cleanliness, I wish they would not change towels daily to save water and energy, but otherwise the suite was ok with 3 queen beds, but no kitchenette, with uncomfortable pillows, but good decor. The complimentary hot breakfast was a bit of a joke, consisting of coffee and some packaged mini muffins at the reception, but again acceptable considering the price
Manager Response: Dear Nolinice, We are known for the excellent value that we offer in this location, and we appreciate your acknowledgment of this. It sounds as if our property was suitable for your stay in this area, and if you have similar accommodation requirements here again, we hope that you will choose to stay with us again. Thank you for your review. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: * honest review *  Stayed here at the end of our Disneyland trip for one night. The hotel is what you pay for. No thrills budget hotel within a close proximity to Disneyland (about a 12 minute walk) . Check in was smooth. Pool looked clean. Breakfast is in the lobby consisting of pre packed cereal bowls and pre packaged small muffins & coffee. Rooms are surprisingly large. The bathroom was what you except for a hotel of age. Cracked paint. Stains etc. but who can complain for $90 aud a night and somewhere to rest your head
Manager Response: Dear Jack, Thank you for taking the time to review our property following your recent stay. We have shared your concerns with our team. We're always eager to see where we can do more for our guests and will take your feedback to heart during our ongoing training of our staff and improvements to our property.  We hope that you will come back and stay with us again. Don't hesitate to reach out to us directly if you would like any assistance with a future booking. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary Heading: Best place to stay in all of  Anaheim!
Summary: i Love this place , best hospitality, the owners are very friendly and will always make sure your stay is the best experience. Cleanest rooms , never had any problems whatsoever.  They are a short walking distance from Disneyland. I encourage everyone to stay here .
Manager Response: Dear Steven, We are thrilled with your feedback and to know that you enjoyed your time with us so much. We appreciate your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back very soon.  Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: They’ve done a fantastic job renovating the place. The rooms look clean and modern. The price is right. The location is right. So far I’ve stayed there twice with my wife on Disneyland trips. We will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for rating your recent stay with us; we are so pleased that you enjoyed your time here so much. We love hearing back from returning guests as it makes us feel like we are doing something right! We will make sure to pass on your feedback to our team; they will be delighted that they were able to add to your stay. We hope to welcome you back soon! Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: A group of 200 of us stayed at this hotel, the rooms were great!  Most of the rooms had 3 queens in them with 2 separate rooms.  The rooms were clean and comfortable, I wanted to bring my bed back home with me.   Some of the bathrooms were being remodeled or were about to be.  The owners/staff are great, very friendly.  Walking distance to Disneyland.  Close to Starbucks, Walgreens, and restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, It was a pleasure having you all as our guests. We strive daily to please our guests and your feedback tells us we are meeting those goals. Thanks again for taking the time to share your perfect rating, and we look forward to your return visit. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: This hotel is on West Katella and is only about a 15 minute walk from Disneyland.  (You can also ride the ART shuttle, which is a service you pay for.  You can purchase multi-day passes and they are quite affordable, but the service is sometimes not as timely as their website claims them to be, however, that's another review).  America's Best Value Inn is a hidden gem.  It's no frills, but it's clean and provides a complimentary breakfast (muffins, tea, coffee, oatmeal, apples).  The staff is always friendly and accommodating. We have stayed at this hotel on several occasions and are always amazed that the staff remembers us.  The only downside is that there is a Wyndham time share booth outside and every time you leave the hotel, they pester you to do their time share.  They
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for sharing about your time with us. We appreciate your rating and are glad you enjoyed our hotel. We take pride in providing our guests with everything they need for a great stay. We look forward to your next visit.  Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary Heading: Great location, good rooms, bad wifi and not really breakfast
Summary: We stayed with older kids for 2 nights. The room and bathroom were clean, the beds comfortable, there was a fridge in the room which was convenient. The location was excellent, about 15 minutes to walk to the Disneyland entrance and close to various shops and restaurants. The Outlets at Orange are also a short drive away. At night, we watched the Disneyland fireworks from the courtyard balcony. The kids loved that there was a pool; unfortunately, it closed at 9 p.m., just when we got back, so they weren't able to go in. As has been mentioned by previous reviewers, the breakfast offered is not really breakfast, just prepackaged muffins/cakes and some coffee. Our worse frustration was that the wifi was agonizingly slow, very inconvenient when we were trying to plan the rest of our
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We must apologize for the issues that you encountered with our internet. We will discuss your feedback with our service provider and ensure that we are doing everything that we can to provide our guests with the best possible service. We hope that this will not deter you from staying with us again, we would love to host you more successfully on a future occasion. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: I have stayed here on numerous trips to the USA and would have to say it is excellent value for money. The staff are always friendly and welcoming. Located within walking distance to Disneyland and many restaurants including the well known Cheesecake Factory. If you are on a budget this is the place to go. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear Illarius, We are known for the excellent value that we offer in this location, and we appreciate your acknowledgment of this. It sounds as if our property was suitable for your stay in this area, and if you have similar accommodation requirements here again, we hope that you will choose to stay with us again. Thank you for your review. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: I stayed here for 4 nights with my family.  Pros: The rooms are clean, look nice and spacious.  Disneyland is just around the corner 10 min short walk. Lots of restaurants, shopping near by.  Cons: breakfast is terrible.  Breakfast is put on a little counter where you check in.  They only offer cornflakes, apples, and prepackaged muffins that don't taste good.  They have instant porridge but no bowls.  So don't count on breakfast if you are deciding between hotels.  Overall if you are on a tight budget and want a great location then you would be happy.
Manager Response: Dear Fern, Although delighted that you enjoyed your overall stay with us, we were sorry to hear that our breakfast offerings were not to your liking. Unfortunately, we only offer a complimentary continental breakfast, which traditionally is a limited breakfast offering of juice, bread and/or pastries and tea/coffee. Most hotels similar to ours throughout the U.S. offer similar continental breakfasts, but we are sorry that you expected something more. We review our breakfast offering regularly, and we will take your comments into consideration when next doing so. We hope that you might enjoy a better stay with us in the future. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary Heading: Great little Hotel Close to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights on a recent trip to Disneyland.It was nice being able to leave our car in their parking lot and walk to wherever we needed. There are many shops and restaurants close by and Disney is about a 10-15 minute walk. Parking is free and there is no resort fee unlike other hotels in the area. There was free wifi which worked perfectly and free continental breakfast ( cereal, muffins, apples ,coffee, tea). We also seemed to receive an upgrade as well , We ended up with a 2 bedroom suite, which looked freshly renovated and had hardwood floors- very nice. The pool and hot tub were a nice addition.  Front Desk staff were friendly .I would recommend this hotel for anyone wanting a decent hotel in a great location that wont break the bank
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We love seeing that we were able to provide you with a good experience. Our goal is to provide every guest with an exceptional stay. We look forward to your next stay!  Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary Heading: Another 3 fantastic stays in 3 more months....
Summary: Each time was greeted with a smile, and great service. Rooms very clean, and in working order. This place is the best bang-for-you-buck in Anaheim. Perfect jumping off point for Disneyland. I grab ART #6 right out front, or walk, depending on the day. Each room was a different layout, and all of them were again great. I usually leave for LA before 6am, so I'm not versed on their breakfast offering. As you can see, this is my staple for Anaheim. Clean rooms, free parking, close to Disneyland, you cant beat the price.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your sharing such a great feedback. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed all your experiences. We all look forward to welcoming you back "home" soon!! Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: The motel was clean and well kept up.  Our room was a reasonable size and the bed very comfortable.  It is just around the corner from Disneyland, so it was very convenient.  Free parking and free Wi-Fi sealed the deal.  The front desk staff were friendly and helpful.  The only negatives - no Kleenex in the room and the free
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the kind comments. We are glad you were able to take advantage of everything our well-appointed hotel offers, like our comfortable rooms as well as the convenient facilities. It was our pleasure serving you and we hope to welcome you again on your next trip.  Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: Very close to Disneyland!  Rooms were clean and staff friendly.  I was nervous because I had never stayed at a Americas best but would stay again.  The pool area was also clean and very well kept up.  The beds were very comfy too.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   It is such a compliment to receive such a wonderful rating and review. Thank you for taking the time to share about your experience with us. Please come and stay with us again - We'll still be here ready to greet you! Best Wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: Only a short walk from Disneyland, with restaurants, shops and a Starbucks close by. Our room was clean and quite spacious. The receptionist was helpful in looking after our suitcases on our day of checkout whilst we went to the parks.   For the price, this hotel is great value and we would be back!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for rating your recent stay with us; we are pleased that you enjoyed your time here so much. We hope to welcome you back soon! Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: My wife and I stayed at Americas best value in Plattsburgh and once again were treated magnificantly. The service is top notch and the breakfast was quite good. Will come back again. You get a big bang for your buck.    Patrck G.
Manager Response: Dea Patrick,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us recently, and for taking the time to provide us with your rating. We were happy to welcome you to our hotel, and we are pleased that you had an enjoyable stay. We would love to welcome you back, when you are next visiting the area. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary Heading: Very Consistent. Always a good stay!
Summary: This was our third stay at the Americas Best Value Inn & Suites on Katella and it's still been very good to us. We stayed here in March for Wondercon and it was a great location to walk to and from the Convention Center. The people that run this location are very nice and very accommodating. I have nothing but good things to say about this hotel and i'm pretty sure we'll be staying here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for rating your recent stay with us; we are so pleased that you enjoyed your time here so much. We love hearing back from returning guests as it makes us feel like we are doing something right!  We would love to welcome you back, when you are next visiting the area.  Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: Very good rooms I arrived early to go to the park, before check-in time, but I was able to leave the car in the parking lot. Very good rooms, large and spacious. Breakfast satisfactory. Tickets are sold at the hotel, but they are not cheaper than the park.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for choosing to stay with us recently, and for taking the time to provide us with your rating. We were happy to welcome you to our hotel, and we are pleased that you had an enjoyable stay. We would love to welcome you back, when you are next visiting the area. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: My girlfriend and I were visiting Disneyland for my first time and we booked our stay here. This hotel was very cozy and was a lot nicer than we were expecting for there very low price. The staff were very polite and hospitable and the hotel is about a 10 minute walk from the parks. There are lot of good restaurants nearby as well. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for rating your recent stay with us; we are pleased that you enjoyed your time here so much. We hope to welcome you back soon! Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: I needed an inexpensive place to stay that night solo. Found this place and after reading some of the reviews was hesitant to book but when your on a super tight budget you don't have much choice.  When you first arrive the place looks like the price you pay. It is right accross the railroad (as are the other hotels in that area) so you do hear that noise right off the bat when you pull in.  So I walk in and place looked clean so that was a plus. I wasnt greated with a friendly hey welcome like other places but when I walked up to check in they were very friendly. Got my keys and off I went.  They have a nice security camera setup that covers the parking and it was well lit so I parked right under a light with a camera was so I didn't have to worry about my car getting broken
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave such a candid review. We really appreciate your comments, as it gives us opportunities to constantly improve our service to our guests. We are glad that our property was satisfactory for your needs, and we would love the opportunity to welcome you back, when you are next visiting the area. Best wishes. Hotel Management.

Summary: Do not stay here!!!! The rooms were dirty, we found hair in our pillows and sheets. The only reason we booked this place is because my husband and I told a spur of the moment trip to Disney and this was the only option! Not worth it! We wish we staying in LA and drove an hour to Disney each day!! It was god awful!!! DISGUSTING!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are disappointed that you had such a poor impression of our hotel, and the standard of cleanliness in our rooms, and we apologize sincerely. We are disappointed to have let ourselves down in such a manner and to have provided you with a room that was not of the standard that we aim to provide. We appreciate your feedback, and we hope to have another opportunity to provide you with the wonderful stay that we generally provide for all of our guests. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary Heading: Another fantastic 3 stays in the last 3 months
Summary: Each room clean, everything working, friendly check-in, always free parking, close to anything you want. All of the room remodels are looking great. Close enough to walk to the park, or take ART #6 right outside at the street entrance. If you are arriving early, do a pre-check-in to get your car pass, and leave it parked, come back at check-in time. No need to pay for Disney parking.  This location is always such a bargain for it's location . I have business in Anaheim, then the rest of the time meet friends at the park. It really suits my budget for lodging. Leaving more to spend on other things.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We love to hear back from returning guests. It makes us feel that we are doing something right! We loved being your host and hope to do so again, many times in the future. Thank you for sharing your comments. We really appreciate your business and your feedback. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: Great location, Remodeled suite, no carpet, towels and sheets always clean, room with good smell, no insects. Walking less than 5 minutes, Convention Center, Restaurants, Cvs, Walgreens, Subway (24 Hours), safe tourist area for walking,
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are very pleased that you acknowledged and appreciated the wonderful value and service that we provide here, and we are happy that you enjoyed your stay with us so much. When you have another opportunity to visit this area, we hope that you will stay with us again. We would love to be your host. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: Overall this is a cheap place to stay that is in walking distance to Disneyland.  My husband and I have stayed in the area a few times before and always choose budget prices since our entire day is spent in the parks. The rooms at first look were spacious and seemed to be newly renovated with vaulted ceilings and wood floors.  But the bathroom was a entirely different story.  It was disgusting.  There is dust and dirt all around the edges on the floor and rust an all the fixtures.  If this hotel put a little work into the bathrooms I would stay here again, otherwise I have stayed at similarly prices hotels within a block that offered much better amenities and were extremely cleaner!!  The breakfast is simple, coffee, juice, cold cereal, and packaged pastries.  Another thing that
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave such a detailed review. We are very happy that we were able to provide you with a comfortable night's rest. We really appreciate your improvement suggestions in relation to our bathrooms. We will ensure that they are discussed further with our entire team, so that improvements can be made. We hope you will come back and see us again soon. Thank you again for taking the time to complete the survey. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary Heading: Excellent stay, reserve your room and  don't think twice!!!!
Summary: Our stay was amazing. The beds were very comfortable and the rooms were always clean . The staff and owner were very freindly and always helpfull. The location was wonderfull, its just 7 minutes walk from Disneyland. They have good breakfast too. There are even lots of popular restaurants nearby for lunch-dinner. They also had a jacuzzi to relax from our busy day. Overall, It was awesome and we would love to visit here again.
Manager Response: Hi Stefan, Thank you for your rave review! We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay with us. We look forward to sharing your kind words with our team, and we hope to welcome you back soon. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: We took our trip again to Disney with our two daughters. I had the pleasure of a four-night stay at this Hotel again. Very impressed with the renovation they have done and I loved it. The furniture is new and  room was perfect. Staff is friendly and responsive to requests. It is very clean, close to everything that you don’t really need a car to drive around, so many restaurants around, great customer service. I cannot think of anything that wasn’t satisfying during our stay. My girls enjoyed the pool and hot tub. Our stay at thIs Hotel made our trip excellent and we will definitely come back to stay on our next trip! Thank you for your service!
Manager Response: Dear Molly, We loved your review! Thank you so much for sharing your comments. We were so happy that your time with us was to your satisfaction. We loved being your host and would love to be again, when you are next visiting the area. Thank you for your business and your comments. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary Heading: Okay hotel if you have a tight budget and/or everything else is sold out
Summary: A last-minute trip to Disneyland is never easy, as everything is usually booked in advance, so when I saw that Americas Best Value Inn & Suites had rooms available I took it, the reviews looked acceptable and the photos were satisfactory. I called a few hours before our arrival to let them know we were going to be early and if we could check in early and/or leave our car in the parking lot, they agreed. Upon arrival our room was not ready, and we had to leave our belongings in the car until we returned from the park later that night around 11pm (not a huge problem because we did show up earlier than our check in time even though they said it should have been ready) I tried not to judge the hotel by the outside appearance because you never know…. Walking into the room you could
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. Your stay does not sound like the type of stay that we generally provide for our guests, and we apologize for all of the issues that you experienced during your time here. We will review your comments in detail as a team, and we see what changes that we can make in terms of both improving our property and training our staff, to improve our future guests' experiences. Thank you again for your detailed comments, we really appreciate them. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: If you want a good night sleep don’t stay here
Summary: My Husband and I came to the area because we are Disney annual pass holders. We came for 7 nights. The rooms are clean, but the first night I literally got 3 hours sleep because whoever was above us sounded like they were doing circus acts. I did call front desk several times but it didn’t seem to help. He came to our door and asked if we found bugs. WHAT??!! Next morning I expressed my frustration to the owner and she switched our room. The next two nights were good. But then they put somebody above us again.. who again must of been in the circus. Stomping, kids running around, bouncing balls. We called front desk again, but it didn’t help. Nothing was offered to compensate for the noise or lack of sleep. I would not stay here again. I would pay the extra just to have a decent
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer,  We were so disappointed to hear that your stay with us was less than satisfactory. We want nothing but the best experience for our guests. We are sorry to hear that your stay was marred by some noise from other guests. We would love for you to change your mind, and to consider giving us another chance. We are confident that your next stay with us, will be a more pleasant experience. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary Heading: Very good location and newly remodeled room
Summary: We always stay at this hotel when Disneyland is our destination. The prices are fair; unlike other hotels in area. The beds are comfortable,rooms clean. Nice pool. The staff are friendly and helpful. The A.R.T has a stop at the hotel. #6. However it is not very dependable.several times we had to call dispatch to inquire if and when  it would eventually show up. Same situation at park. I will use UBER in the future. We will stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear John, We were so pleased that you enjoyed your time with us so much. Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We would love to be your host again, in the not too distant future. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: This hotel has everything...continental breakfast, hot tub, pool, ART site, great rooms, and wonderful owners!  We will stay here again and again!  The staff was very professional and went out of their way to make sure our stay was GREAT!  They were friendly, professional, kind, and very helpful.  The hotel was very clean, inviting, and had the ART bus stop right in front of it so that we could hop on a bus to get to Disneyland without any problems.  Shelly is a beautiful woman and staff member that makes sure everything is perfect!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We loved your review! Thank you for sharing! We would love to welcome you back again and again! We really appreciate your business and your feedback. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: The room was very big, clean and the bed was very comfortable. The staff were just wonderful. Very helpful and always smiling. The location of the hotel is perfect for going to the parks. Easy walking distance. There is a 7 eleven up the street, the Cheesecake factory is just down the street so everything is right on the doorstep. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Judith, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments. We were so happy that everything was to your liking, during your recent stay with us. We would love to be your host again, when you are next visiting the area.

Summary: The location is perfect 10-15 minute walk to both Disney parks. Many places to eat near by. Also Walgreens and CVS pharmacy 5 minute walk. 7-11 across the street. The hotel is very clean, room was spacious and clean. You cant beet the price !! Microwave and min ref in the room.
Manager Response: Dear Rose, We were so happy to read your review! Thank you for sharing your comments. We hope to see you again, in the not too distant future! Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: My family of five and my parents (7 total) were able to stay in the family suite that has three beds in it. The cost was cheaper for the room than a room at the other hotels around- not to mention we would have had to pay for two rooms a night for our amount of people at the other hotels. We saved a lot of money for our trip to Disneyland for lodging. It’s not a very far walk to Disneyland either. With a 7-eleven on the way to buy our drinks and snacks on the way, it was a bargain trip to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We were thrilled that our property suited your needs so well. Thank you for taking the time to share your comments. We would love to be your property of choice, for this area. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: After my last bad experience, I wanted to make sure it was a fluke. I would have given 3x 5star reviews since Aug, but tripadvisor only allows 1 review in 3 months.  Each stay has been fantastic. Super clean rooms, all in working order. I have had different rooms each time, and all fantastic. They seem to be remodeling rooms, so some may be different. But all were better then expected.  The same owners always great you with a smile, and even remember regular customers. Parking is always available, and included in the room price. ART bus #6 stops right outside, if you don't want to walk to or from the park. They sell the passes at the front desk. You cant beat the value you get here, for so close to Disneyland. Garden Walk, Subway, Bubba Gumps, are all close walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We love to hear back from returning guests, as it makes us feel we are doing something right. Thank you for leaving such a detailed review. We were delighted that once again, you thoroughly enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again and again! Thank you again for your lovely review. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: We stayed for three nights. We couldn’t have asked for anything more for the price! It was a 10 minute walk to Disney. Right near a bunch of food. We kept our car parked the entire time of our trip.  The staff is very friendly! The hotel is older and room are older but very clean.   No complaints! Perfect hotel for bed nice bed to sleep in while at parks. The price alone is worth it being so close to Disney.  If we’re ever here again, we’ll likely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Matthew, Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We were delighted that our hotel suited your needs so well. We would love to be your property of choice for this area. Thank you for sharing your comments. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: Room was ready ahead of schedule which was appreciated because I was travelling with a handicapped friend. We were at Disneyland for the day and the room was used at a resting place during that day. Good accommodations. Shuttle service right  in front of hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Kathryn, We were so happy that everything was to your satisfaction, during your recent stay with us. Thank you for sharing your comments. We look forward to being your host again, when you are next visiting the area. Best wishes, Hotel Management.
