Summary Heading: A hidden gem of a value
Summary: I was very pleased to find this hotel was just right for my budget as well as conveniently close to Disneyland. My room was very quiet, clean, and decently furnished. The bed was extremely comfortable and the bed linen was super comfy. I believe this is my budget-friendly favorite now.
Manager Response: Dear Geraldine, We loved your review! We also believe, our property is a little 'hidden gem'! We would love to be your property of choice for this area. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: We arrived early Monday morning to the hotel so we can enjoy a full day of Disney. We parked our car and I was felling unsure about how the hotel looks from the outside. We walked in and they were very friendly. The lady checked us in and told us that she will check if our rooms were ready so that we can drop off our bags. They let us check in hours before check-in times. The kids ran upstairs to drop off their bags while I waited downstairs. Coming back from Disney at night I was nervous about how the rooms will look. I walked in and they were beautiful! Both of our rooms were spotless, white bedding covered all the beds, and a clean bathroom. With many kids it was nice to have a mini fridge and a microwave in the room. The next day the hotel let us keep our car in the parking
Manager Response: Dear Riham, it was our pleasure to be your host. Thank you for your lovely review. We look forward to your next visit with us. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary Heading: Walking distance to Disneyland on a budget
Summary: It was OK.  Great if you are on a budget like we were. The bed was very comfortable which is important when you are so tired after walking Disneyland. The room was very clean. It was a little weird because there was a "jacuzzi tub" in the room but it didn't work.  It was unfinished?  It didn't matter really, we were only there to sleep. We spent 2 nights here and it was quiet and comfortable.  Don't know if we would choose this one again but it served it's purpose as we had such a short stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We were delighted to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Our maintenance team have been alerted to the jacuzzi the tub in your room, to ensure this problem is resolved for future guests. Thank you for sharing. We really are in a great location for Disney and we are glad to hear this added to your stay. We hope you choose to stay with us in the future, as we would love to welcome you back. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary Heading: Just what we were looking for
Summary: We were looking for a hotel near the Disney center as we were attending a show at the House of Blues. this spot is a short walk, .4 miles. It's in the middle of a remodel, so lots of workers about, but it did not bother us. the clerk was very helpful in getting me a down stairs room in a area where I could park my motorcycle in the courtyard in front of my room. Very cool of him!! Our room was all newly remodeled, very clean with a flat screen, fridge and microwave. We were very pleased with the whole experience and would stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We were delighted to hear that our property suited your needs so well. We look forward to welcoming you back, when you are next in the area. Thank you for your business and review. We really appreciate both. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: I did not expect it to be as nice as it was , it was also very updated and clean. There were many amenities included and at a good value for the price it was. It was also about a ten minute walk from the entrance of Disneyland , many hotels near the park advertise that they are close, but it does not take into account if you can actually enter near the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are so happy that you enjoyed our hotel so much. Thank you for sharing your comments. We really are in a great location for Disney. We look forward to being your host again, when you are next in town. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: We spent here two nights, because of the Disney.  Budget hotel, but it is ok, because you don't spend here the whole day.  Our room was spacious and clean.It can be noisy in the night but just for minutes because of Disney's fireworks.  Bathroom was small, but ok. Unfortunately they provide soap and shower gel from a dispenser, which I don't really trust.  Disneyland is not so far, but there is a shuttle bus to there for 5USD/pers. It was welcomed especially in the evening. The hotel has a pool but we didn't use it. Only negative point: I didn't find the entrance door safe... Big plus: free parking.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We were delighted to hear that our property suited your needs so well for visiting Disney. We will have our maintenance team examine the entrance door, to ensure any improvements can be implemented. We were so happy that our parking also met with your satisfaction. We look forward to seeing you again, in the not too distant future. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: The motel is conveniently placed for Disney with good parking. The park is about 1.5 miles away on foot, something to consider if you are walking back after a day at the park. The room was clean and comfortable. However the jacuzzi bath is just for show as it is old and non-functioning. Breakfast is Poor with little choice. The muffins are in individual packets and tasted synthetic.
Manager Response: Hi Kathy, Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to review our property. Although thrilled that you enjoyed our location, parking and room, we are disappointed to hear that our breakfast offering did not meet your expectations. We regularly review our menu so that improvements are always being made, and your comments will form part of the next review. Thank you again for sharing. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: First staff is so professional and go beyond fornus this trip. It's an older motel but they renovated all the rooms it is the cleanest hotel we have stayed at by Disneyland we are pass holders and stay down here a lot. the room was spotless and we got to sleep on their new pillow top beds... will stay again .. very quiet but it was off season .
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We loved your comments! We look forward to being your property of choice, when you are next visiting the area. Thank you again for sharing. Your business and feedback is so important to us. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: This hotel is amazing!! It's my go to hotel, for the past 4 years myself, my boyfriend and our son stay here every time we go to Disneyland. They have an amazing staff that's always helpful with whatever we need. They are in the process of upgrading the rooms and I have had the opportunity to stay in some of them and they are extremely nice. All hardwood floors, new beds, and flat screen Tvs just to name a few. We will be staying here again!! Pros: It's a very short walks to the parks only about 10-15 min tops.  Right next to the garden walk.  Very affordable(which is hard to find in the area if your doing Disney on a budget)
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for sharing your lovely review! We loved it! We love to hear from returning guests. We appreciate your business and your feedback. Thank you again! Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: I stay here all the time. The owners are really nice. There's plenty of different types of room to choose from. They have a nice pool it does have a fence around it. there is plenty of parking in the back. it's also walking distance to  Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hi David, Thank you for sharing your comments about our property. We love to hear from returning guests. We are thrilled that once again, your stay with us, was a positive one. We look forward to being your host, when you are next visiting the area. Thank you again for sharing. We appreciate your business and your feedback. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: This was our second time staying at this hotel. Close to Disneyland and they have updated there rooms since our last stay. If your looking for a place to sleep while you spend your days in the park then this is a great choice. We are definitely keeping this one on our list of go to hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Hi Sarah, Thank you for your lovely review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. It was our pleasure to be your host! We hope to see you again soon! Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: Very simple but clean and the beds were very comfortable.  THru  to a room  has a small second bedroom which was perfect for the three of us.  And best of all , prices are reasonable and it's walking distance from Disneyland .
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We were thrilled that we were able to meet your needs and expectations, during your recent stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you back, when you are next in the area. Thank you for sharing! We appreciate your business and your feedback. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: Came with a group of friends and found the suite to be perfect. AC was working well, and the beds were comfortable! Short distance from Disneyland and the Anaheim Garden Walk. Easy access to transportation and food.
Manager Response: Hi Ivan, Thank you for sharing your feedback. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your recent stay with us! We would love the opportunity to welcome you again, when you are next in the area. Thank you again for your business and your comments. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: The motel was conveniently located to the Anaheim Convention Center, where I was attending our annual SCRC Convention.  The room has an updated decor with good air conditioning.  The exterior of the property showed only fair.  Seems live a lot of heavy use on the building over the years have taken a toll. Breakfast was poor.  I did not opt for it.  No place to eat, except taking it back to your room.  Bathroom in my room was in need of paint, toilet seat was loose, stains on the floor and wood molding around the doors had been badly damaged.  The mattress was near the end of its life.  The skirts on the beds were sloppy and hanging on the floor.
Manager Response: Dear Michael, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments regarding your recent stay. Please accept our most sincere apologies for the challenges you experienced with your breakfast, your room condition and cleanliness. This is certainly not the normal high level of service we provide. Please know that your experience does not reflect the overall performance of our hotel when it comes to service and product. We truly value each and every one of our guests and would want nothing but the best experience for them. We have passed your comments on to the relevant staff members for immediate redress. We would love the opportunity to impress you, should you opt to stay with us again. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: This motel is very clean, has nice rooms with new furniture and wooden floor. The pools are nice too. I liked that it had almost everything you needed with in walking distance to Disneyland. Also, Walgreen, CVS and some good restaurants are at walking distance. Friendly and helpful staff.
Manager Response: Hi Niket, Thank you for sharing your comments, following your recent stay with us. We loved your review of our property and we are so happy that it satisfied all your needs. We would love to welcome you back, when you are next visiting the area. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: This hotel was a great value for being close to the parks. Walking distance from a cvs, Walgreens, and a strip of restaurants as well as the parks. Would definitely book here again. Saves time and money for driving everywhere. Comfy bed, ac, some Minor flaws that need fixed but other than that it's a great hotel for the price.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for taking the time the time to review your recent stay with us. We were thrilled to read your comments and delighted that we suited your needs so well. We pride ourselves in offering our guests, clean, comfortable, affordable accommodation, in close proximity to the parks. We would love to welcome you back again. Thank you for sharing! Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary Heading: Questioning of the budget price is now worth it......
Summary: It was still a good trip overall.  But I'm not sure if I will continue to stay and this location for Disneyland. There are literally places to the left and right of this location.  Entering the room, I could immediately see that the window to the room was missing one  of the vertical slats to the blinds. I could see right outside the window as being on the ground floor. I went to the front desk to let them know, and they said they were aware, but there was nothing they could do about it. Never offered another room.  I noticed in the evening, that the TV would turn on, and I could change volume, but not change channels. When I called the front desk, the young man came to my room, checked it out by unplugging, resetting, tried another remote from another room, same thing. He said
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments regarding your recent stay. Please accept our most sincere apologies for the challenges you experienced with regards to the issue with your blinds and television. This is certainly not the normal high level of service we provide. Please know that your experience does not reflect the overall performance of our hotel when it comes to service and product. We truly value each and every one of our guests and would want nothing but the best experience for them. Regarding the cockroaches, we do maintain a very high level of cleanliness, but even so, cockroaches find their way into hotels, and are notoriously difficult to eradicate. That being said, we work with pest control experts, who consistently and continuously work to keep our hotel roach free. We have alerted them to your comment, and they are working to ensure that we are roach-free as soon as possible. We would love to welcome you back, to impress you with our service, when you are next in town. Best wishes, Hotel Management.

Summary: After a wonderful day in Knotts Berry farm we came to the hotel, we hesitated in the entrance not sure it was the hotel and this person sitting in front did not even try to direct us where to park. In the afternoon we tried to call the tour we were taking the next day and the phone does not make a connection and I called up front desk for assistance. Nothing can be given as he kept saying its the same from our room or from the front desk, and I ended up using the mobile phone (after it got charged) to call the tour agent. As this was with breakfast we went to front desk and asked he just pointed at the table beside reception which has a coffee maker, milk, mini carrot cake, a cupcake, a cup of cornflakes and apple. so we ended up picking some items and brought it back to our
Manager Response: Dear guest, We aim to provide our guests with good quality, budget accommodation, and that's what we do for the vast majority of our guests. Unfortunately, it sounds as if we dropped the ball on a number of issues during your stay, and we apologize sincerely for that. Our staff are known for their friendliness and excellent customer service, but it appears that this was not your experience. We are addressing your comments with the appropriate personnel, to ensure that this does not arise again. Thank you for your feedback, we do appreciate it, and we really hope you can allow us to be your host again, when you are next in the area. Best wishes, Hotel Management.   We hope that you'll visit us again, I have no doubt that you will experience everything in your room working as it should. Thank you very much for your feedback - we really appreciate it.

Summary Heading: Just what we were looking for
Summary: Excellent value for a family. We are budget-minded, but wanted certain amenities. This hotel provided everything we needed and more! The mini-suite was spacious, clean, had a 2nd, separate bedroom and was updated enough to have plenty of outlets to plug in everyone's numerous electronic devices.. Free parking, wifi. It is not a big property, so wherever you park is fine, unlike some massive hotels, where if you get back late, you may have to park far away and have a long hike back to your room. Microwave and good sized refrigerator/freezer that really kept the milk cold and blue ice frozen (unlike some hotel mini-fridges), so we could keep some breakfast/lunch items and didn't have to eat out all the time. Pool looked clean, although we didn't have time to use it. Convenient -
Manager Response: We are very pleased to hear that you appreciated the terrific value that we provide, and that we provided an ideal accommodation option for you and your family. We hope to see you again soon! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: We stayed there august 29 and 30. The staff was friendly. The room was clean but the beda were horrible. I never knew they made mattresses so hard! After being on your feet for 15 hrs at disney all day, the one thing you look forward to is a good nights' sleep. Please invest in better mattresses and your hotel would be so much better. It is a convenient place to stay....surrounded by good places to eat and took maybe 15-20 mins to walk to Disney.
Manager Response: We are pleased that you found our staff to be friendly and your room to be clean. We are obviously disappointed to hear that you found our beds to be so hard, and we are very sorry that they did not suit your taste. We hope that this will not deter you from staying with us again, we would love to host you on a future occasion, when you next have an opportunity to visit Disney. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: You Get What You Pay For
Summary: Hotel is in a fantastic location with eateries within a 5 minute walk. Two pharmacies across the road which also sell food and drink. Disneyland just around the corner. However this hotel was in desperate need of repair, as i mentioned you get what you pay for. Breakfast was offered but very basic ( cereal,muffins, coffee and tea). My only problem was when we asked for them to call a cab they put us onto their friend who will drive guest's where they want to go. They said that a cab is too expensive and that their friend was a lot cheaper when  in fact  we soon relised that he was three times more expensive than a  cab/uber. Just be aware
Manager Response: It's great to hear that our wonderful location and proximity to local amenities, (and of course Disneyland!) suited you so well. We are very sorry to hear of your experience when you requested a cab. This was most unusual, and please rest assured that we are investigating the circumstances of what you have described thoroughly. This is not what we want our guests to experience at all, and we are determined to get to the bottom of it. Thank you for your feedback, we hope that you will choose our property again when you next have an opportunity to visit this area. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: This little hotel gives you a big value. The room was large and had a king sized bed with a smaller double bed on the other side of a pony wall to separate the two areas. For the price, the location (about 10 min walk) to Disneyland and overall ease of staying here I would recommend it.  We were there to sleep after long days at Disneyland and it was a great!   It allowed us to maximize our dollars and as everyone knows Disney isn't cheap.
Manager Response: Hi Jenna, Thank you very much for your review and your perfect rating. We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us so much, and we hope to welcome you back the next time you're in town! Thank you for your recommendation! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Considering the low price we paid to stay here, we kept our expectations low -- but we were overwhelmingly surprised. The staff was so friendly and welcoming and the room was large and freshly renovated. The location is a short walk to the Disney Esplanade, and there are many restaurants, coffee shops, and stores nearby including several 24 hour locations (Walgreens, CVS, Subway, etc.). There is a complimentary continental breakfast consisting of coffee, tea, and a few packaged options (muffins, pastries), which is sufficient to grab and go for a day at the parks. My only complaint is that we did not have time to enjoy the pool or hot tub because they close at 9pm. Other than that, we were so pleased with our stay that we decided to return for an additional night a few days
Manager Response: Hi Russ, It is always fantastic to hear that we have surpassed our guests' expectations. We are delighted that you enjoyed our service so much that you returned only a few days later - there really is no better review than that! We are thrilled to hear that we will be your go-to place for future Disneyland trips. We look forward to welcoming you back many more times. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Its not the ritz but the rooms have recently been upgraded. The rooms are big and clean with comfy beds. Its within walking distance to Disneyland, Target and the Anaheim Garden walk which has lots of shops, eateries and bars. Would definately stay again!
Manager Response: Hi Brendon, Thank you for your lovely review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms and our central location. We are delighted to hear that you will stay with us again - We can't wait to welcome you back! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: The hotel said it was non-smoking, but the room smelled so bad from cigarette smoke over time. I ended up buying a bottle of Febreze and sprayed all over the ceiling and walls, so we could get through the stay. The floor was so dirty I did not want to step on it without shoes. The front desk was not helpful to direct us to our room. We walked all the way around the property to find our room.
Manager Response: We are very sorry to hear that you had a poor experience during your recent stay with us. Our room service team works hard making sure rooms are prepared well daily, so we are very sorry to hear that you did not find your room clean and fresh. Please know that we will be looking into this to ensure this does not happen again. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Basic but clean and well located
Summary: Great hotel in a wonderful location for Disneyland and all food options around the park. Room large and clean, wifi free and free onsite parking. Staff friendly and family run hotel. Will stay again when return to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Hi Bec, We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we want to thank you for your review. It is wonderful to know that you found our location and amenities so convenient and found our staff so friendly. It is great to hear that we will be your hotel of choice again next time you're in the Anaheim area. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Taking our 5-year old granddaughter to Disneyland for her 5th birthday.  We arrived early and they allowed us to leave our car parked before check in.  Morning front desk staff was so nice.  The guy in the afternoon wasn't as welcoming as the lady in the morning. We had a family suite that was very spacious. Room was nice and clean; however, it was so hot when we first arrived and a little stuffy but once we turned on the air everything was great.  The pool was nice and clean.  The hot tub wasn't as hot as I would have liked, but it was a lot warmer than the pool.  I would suggest that you take some good soap.  I thought the hotel had hard water and using the soap that the hotel provided left me feeling very dry and sticky.   The hotel is a 15 min walk to Disneyland. It was nice
Manager Response: Hi Michelle, Thank you so much for your kind review, it is lovely to hear that you will stay with us again if you are back in the area. We are delighted that we could be part of your Disneyland experience and that you had such a great time here. We hope we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back again. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: We got the family Suites and we ten people. We advised the hotel to avoid charging us more person and told us it was fine. We park two cars. Clean at all times. The room are huge that we added an inflatable bed for the kids. Love that is next to Disneyland/
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your fantastic review, we are delighted you had such a wonderful stay with us. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our clean and spacious family rooms and our close proximity to Disneyland. It was our pleasure to be your hosts, and we look forward to welcoming you back again in the future. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Hotel rooms are nice clean. Air conditioner works great to drowned out sounds from the street. Bed is comfy. Does it part to sleep. Free parking.  15 to 20 minute walk to downtown Disney. Huge restaurant complex beside hotel
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear about your impression of our hotel. It is wonderful to hear we made your stay so positive, and that you appreciated the great value that we provide. Thank you so much for your review. We hope to welcome you back again soon! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Perfect place for family Disneyland vacations
Summary: My family and I really enjoyed staying here. The rooms were clean, affordable, and comfortable. The staff were friends and helpful. It was nice that it was walking distance to Disneyland so we didn't have to rent a car. Nice clean pool!
Manager Response: Hi, It's great to hear that we provided you and your family with a great base to explore Disneyland from. Our location is fantastic, we are very lucky to have a world famous attraction right at our doorstep, and it's great that you took advantage of that, and didn't have the trouble of renting a car. We're happy to have provided you with a clean comfortable place to stay, at an affordable price in this area - and it's lovely to hear that our team made you feel so welcome. We hope that you'll get another opportunity to visit Disneyland with your family, and that you'll stay with us again! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: This is a very cheap hotel That does not take into account when there very own employees lie. I asked specifically if my friends could come swim in the pool and if I had to pay a fee.( I do not like to be dishonest and sneak people in)The man said no you don't need to ask. "Ok, great" I said "thank you". I was more than willing to pay for them if I needed. I also asked that night if they could park for a few more hours while we went. to Disneyland. "No problem" he said" park in front in this special Space so they won't ticket or tow them". I said "thank you so much and I can pay you for the spot" but no he didn't want any money. Well, I guess someone new came on and wasn't as nice and friendly and he told the first guy that my friends parked all night and and many people stayed
Manager Response: We are very disappointed to read your review and discover the experience that you had at our hotel. We are thoroughly investigating the circumstances of the situation that you have outlined, and we apologize for what happened. Please rest assured that we will ensure that such confusion does not arise again. Thank you for your feedback, we do appreciate it. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Very good service, Nice location, available parking, wifi. they can improve breakfast by: better coffee, paper cups instead of Styrofoam cups, fixing the rooms &heating the pool. I loved management, very nice people.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review! We truly appreciate your kind words about our staff. It's definitely a boost for us every time we hear positive reviews such as this. We are happy to have ticked so many of your boxes in terms of what you want from a hotel, and we hope to see you again soon! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Very good value for money, 10 minute walk to the Disney resort, very spacious room
Summary: We booked a family suite with 2 bedrooms and a total of 4 beds! It was a very spacious room. We think this room has just been recently renovated, it had a really nice wooden floor. It had one bathroom with bath and shower and 1 toilet. Also it had coffeemaking facilities and a fridge. Room perfectly clean. The hotel is more like a motel. In the morning you can get pre-packed muffins and cake at reception as well as coffee (coffee to weak for our Dutch standards). You have to eat it in your room. There could be more drinks for kids, like hot coco. It was only a 10 minute walk to the Disney Resort, so good value for money. It can get a little bit noisy, dependant of what kind of guests are visiting (some adults don't look after their screaming children)
Manager Response: Hi Patricia, Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback about your stay at our hotel. I'm glad that you found our location convenient for exploring Disneyland, and that you liked the spacious rooms that we provided for your family. We do hope that you will stay with us again if you get another opportunity to visit this region. Best wishes, Hotel Managment

Summary: Stayed for 1 night on March 1st 2017 to visit Disneyland. Arrived at 9:00 AM and even though check-in was not until 3:00 PM they issued us a parking pass to park in there parking lot, completed check-in and sold us our 1 day Disney gate pass for same amount as at Disneyland! This hotel is only 4 blocks from the main gates of Disneyland and an easy walk. We did not return to hotel until 11:00 PM and then got a key and found our room clean, basic and the bed comfortable. They supply a small breakfast of coffee, cakes and some fruit in main office in morning. Staff was friendly. No problems or issues. Prepaid for room and made reservation through AMA (CAA) and paid only $115 CDN! which is a great price in my opinion for a room this close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hi, and thank you for your review! Our location is definitely one of the great things about our hotel. We are so lucky to have a property so close to Disneyland, and we're delighted to hear that you appreciated it so much! We appreciate you taking the time to leave your feedback, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again very soon. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel, for a trade show. The room was nice, staff was friendly. The bed was not bad, pillows were to soft but overall slept good. Free continental breakfast, cable TV and a clean bathroom. I would stay here again, o yeah the staff is very friendly too.
Manager Response: Hi Cris, We are glad that you had a wonderful stay with us and that you found our staff to be friendly. It's great to hear that you slept well, and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. Thank you for your feedback, we hope to welcome you back again on your next visit to this area. Until then, Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: The whole courtyard smelt like cat pee I could hardly stand it. Just overall not a very clean place. There was no deadbolt on the door which made me feel unsafe, luckily it was just me and my fiancé. Definitely wouldn't bring my kids to this place. It was very inexpensive at the time but I think it's WAY overpriced normally.
Manager Response: Rebekah, We are sorry that you were not entirely happy with your stay at our property. Our team work hard to ensure that the hotel is cleaned to the highest possible standard, and we apologize for the fact that we were unable to meet your expectations. We will take your comments in relation to the deadbolt on board, we appreciate your constructive criticism, thank you. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: This is a great little hotel if you are coming to Disneyland.  This is a family owned hotel and they are all so sweet and helpful.  Great deal on price and they also allow you to leave your car in the parking lot while you walk over to Disneyland (extra savings on parking).  Thanks so much for your great customer service.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to be your host on your recent visit. Thank you for your review, and in particular for mentioning our staff, who always try to take the very best possible care of our guests. We are happy that everything was to your liking, and we look forward to welcoming you back when you visit Disney again! Best Wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Thought we'd give this place a try to save a few dollars. Never again!  Staff was friendly enough, but really, location and free parking are about the only things that this property has going for it. In my opinion, it is below being just a 'budget' hotel because of the condition. The bathroom, while I guess was technically 'clean', was nothing short of being abominable with obvious patchwork caulking here and there. The attempted 'upgrade' of laminate flooring just comes off as odd due do the slab underneath not being level. Bed was okay, but we were right by the staircase and there was a light right outside the room on the walkway that shone in the window all night. About the stairs, be ready to lug your suitcases up,as there is no elevator. Plan on getting breakfast elsewhere
Manager Response: We are very sorry that your stay with us did not meet your expectations. In saying that thank you for acknowledging our wonderful location, our fantastic staff, and our fee parking facility. We do have an older building, as you will have noticed, but our team work very hard to clean and maintain it to the highest possible standard. We are sorry that our grab-and-go breakfast did not meet your needs.Your comments on this matter will be useful to us as we continually work to improve our hotel. Your feedback is very important to us, so thank you for sharing. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: I stayed in this hotel for 2 nights. I was a solo traveller. The hotel is small inn but clean. Its on Katella avenue near other Hotels like Ramada, Super6 among others. Hotel has an open design, with a swimming pool in center and rooms around it. It has only one floor. I stayed in room 210. Staff is good and cooperative. They helped me keep my luggage in the room as my luggage was heavy and i had room on first floor. My room was very spacious. It had 2 rooms but i used only one. The bathroom was spacious with toiletries and bathtub. Bed was very comfortable. I took a room with microwave but their was no plate or cutlery. Only disappointment was breakfast. They had no options in breakfast and only served apples, muffins and coffee. I paid extra for breakfast but still had to eat
Manager Response: It's really great to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us in the main, albeit you were a little disappointed with breakfast. We regularly review our breakfast offering to ensure that it satisfies the vast majority of our guests, and we will bear your comments in mind when we do so again. We're delighted that you enjoyed al aspects of your room, and we hope to welcome you back again on your next Disney trip! Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Good location but dated, old and needs to improve service
Summary: The main thing this establishment has going for it is the location to Disney and all the other needs. It has plenty of free parking spaces. Check in was average with no real greeting, conversation of any type from their end. The room was not a suite in any sense of the matter. It was old dated and needed a total upgrade. They are upgrading the floors in some of the downstairs rooms but having tradesmen on the tools at 7 am is not convenient for your guests. Breakfast if that is what you call it...don't get there 1 minute late or they whisk it all away...prepackaged yuck anyway. Finally, they have a stall out the front in the morning trying to entice you to go and see another establishment....you are hassled every morning, pretty uncomfortable.
Manager Response: Whilst we are happy to have been able to offer you free parking in an excellent location, we are disappointed that you did not have a great stay. As you mentioned, we are undergoing refurbishment at the moment, and we are really looking forward to them being completed so that we have a fresh product for our guests. We do hope that you might return when we are all fresh and new; we are sure you will have a better stay. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Best wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: We are a family of 6 and had a great time here as it was a clean unit and cleaned daily, owner and staff were very helpful and easy to deal with. We used the hot tub and swimming pool. A very close short walk to Disneyland . Places to eat are all around from cheap to expensive. Car rental companies a 5minute walk away which we used also. As a family we would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi Keith, We just loved reading your review, thank you very much! It's really great that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us so much, and that you enjoyed the pool and hot tub. We are delighted that you enjoyed our location, we really are a great spot for a family to enjoy their Disney trip from! Thank you very much for your feedback, we hope that you will have a reason to stay with us again soon. Best Wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: The property is located very close to Disneyland, on a large boulevard. The room itself was large and had a separate small bedroom. Overall, no major issues.  The main downside of the property is that everything is very, very old, and it shoes. Staff works hard to keep it clean, but the general impression we had was negative. The AC/heating unit was very noisy, so was the fridge. For the price we paid, I feel we should have received much more.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us recently, and for providing us with your feedback. As you mentioned, we do indeed have an old building, many of our guests really love the charm of that, and we are sorry that it did not suit your taste. It's great to hear that you felt that the hotel was clean, and trust that you had a comfortable night's sleep. We do hope that you will consider staying with us again the next time that you're in the area - we would love to welcome you back. Best Wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: We spent 3 nights here.  This hotel is well located and relatively reasonably priced for the area.  It was a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland.  We were in the 2-room mini-suite, which had a good amount of space for the 2 of us.  The room was clean and comfortable.  The bed in the main room was comfortable.  The bed in the other room was a little hard but okay.  There was a good heater in the room, which was good as it got a little chilly at night.  The breakfast was pre-packaged muffins and pastries, apples, and coffee and tea.  We don't drink coffee or tea, and there was no hot chocolate or juice offered.  The pool and hot tub looked nice, though we never made use of them since we were at Disneyland all day.  All in all, it was an okay, basic hotel in a good location.
Manager Response: Hi Kimberly, thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us - we are always very interested in what guests who have an extended stay with us think of our product and service. It's great to hear that you enjoyed your room, and found it comfortable, and we trust that you, like most of our guests, found us a great base for your Disney trip. We hope that you will stay with us again on your next trip to Disney.   Best Wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: Bed was awful, hard as a rock mattress, bathroom was old and in serious need of remodel.  I was disappointed and wont be back and facility just looked ran down.  room had a very stale odor when I first walked in.  Just not a good fit.
Manager Response: Hi Elaine, we are so disappointed to hear that you didn't enjoy your stay with us, and that you didn't think that we were a good fit for you. We appreciate your business, and thank you sincerely for your feedback.   Best Wishes,  Hotel Management

Summary: It was clean, staff was friendly, and right across the street from the entrance to Disneyland. We didn't spend much time in the room, but it cooled down quickly with the ac on and it was the parking was great.
Manager Response: Hi Cassie, we are delighted that you enjoyed your recent stay with us so much, and that we were such a convenient base for your Disney trip. We're always happy to hear comments about our cleanliness and our staff, so thank you very much for taking the time to leave your review. We do hope you'll get back to Disney at some stage soon, and that we'll be at the top of your list of places to stay!   Best Wishes,  Hotel Management

Summary: Check in was great, quick. Lady at the front never gave her name but immediately asked if I had Disney tickets so if u need them, they are offered here. My stay was two nights. Upon entering, the room was nice and spacious.  It smelled "clean". The second day when we had it cleaned, we came back and it looked made up BUT there is a clear difference between made up and refreshed. Refreshed is a linen change, restocking our things and touching places up. So unfortunately,  the pillows were fluffed and placed nicely but not changed out. Neither was the linen which was stained. Things were moved around in my room(my belongings). Microwave and coffee machine weren't thoroughly cleaned, much less wiped down since day 1 of us entering the room. I noticed part of my candy was missing so
Manager Response: Hi there, and thank you so much for taking the time to give us such a detailed review. We are pleased that you found us a suitable location for your needs, but we are disappointed that you had so many issues during your stay. To be honest, when a guest stays for two nights, we do not change the linen every day - this is common practice in hotels throughout the US. We obviously do a thorough clean of each room when a guest departs, in anticipation of the next guest arriving, but during a short stay, we essentially tidy the room and make the bed. We will review your other comments thoroughly and take any necessary action to ensure that we make our guests as comfortable as possible. Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and for giving us such comprehensive feedback - it is comments such as yours that help us to improve our service for all of our guests.   Best Wishes,  Hotel Management

Summary: Nice little motel, clean and staff very friendly and helpful!  The young man who checked us in (we didn't get there until 10 pm) even carried our luggage up the stairs! The manager let us print off our boarding passes right there at the desk!  Very close to the park, restaurants,  convenience stores! Well definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Hi Pamela, thanks very much for leaving us such a detailed review. We are delighted that your stay with us got off to such a great start, and that we were able to accommodate you with printing your boarding passes. We really are pleased that we were such a good fit for your needs, and we're thrilled that you'd come back to us again. We can't wait to have you back! Best Wishes, Hotel Management

Summary: My wife and I wanted to spend two days at the Disney parks, so we needed a place to stay that was convenient but not too expensive. Based on the overall reviews, America's Best Value Inn looked like a good choice. The facility has obviously been there for a long time, but the exterior is well-maintained and the room was clean and comfortable. The best part was that the hotel is located within easy walking distance of the Disney parks, so we saved on parking. It's not fancy, but it is a great value for the money,
Manager Response: Hi Phil, we are delighted that we were such a convenient and reasonably priced option for you and your wife for your recent Disney trip. It's great to hear that you had such a good stay, and that you found your room to be clean and comfortable. This is our number one priority for all of our guests. Thanks for choosing to stay with us, and for taking the time to leave your review. We hope to see you again at some stage. Best Wishes, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Location is only thing going good here
Summary: Unprofessional in all ways. Tried  to kick  me out of room because THE owners didn't  check sent one booking...even when I brought it up at checkin.. they actually came in my room and a costed me. Then when I wanted another day, they gouged me on price. I am now staying at Howard Johnsons in Buena Park, much nicer rooms..except service and breakfast.. for $49/night..pay $18 to park at Disney,don't walk to Disney and stay in a nicer room for less. What Amedical best value calls breakfast is a packaged sweet roll and coffee..here at Hojos...bagels,fruit,yogurt juice milk coffee...etc.
Manager Response: Dear Robert, thank you for staying with us recently. We apologize for the confusion and misunderstanding at the check-in. However, we were glad that we were able to resolve this right away and were able accommodate you in the same room. You may also recall that when we spoke briefly on the first day of your stay, you asked me if I was the owner, and you told me that there had been beautiful work done with the hotel. I'm sorry that you feel that your visit was spoiled by not getting the rate that you wanted for the final night of your stay. Unfortunately, we were not aware that you wanted to stay until after checkout time, and the rate that you wanted was for a smaller room, which, of course, we offered you. We sincerely hope that you will give us another opportunity to restore your faith in our hotel and hospitality.  Best wishes, Hotel Owner.

Summary Heading: Good price and still within walking distance!
Summary: I stayed here with my family from November 11-13th and I found our stay to be very good overall. The check-in staff was very friendly and accommodating during both check-in and check-out. There was plenty of parking space (which is very refreshing compared to alot of the hotels on Harbor. blvd.), and the free wifi was also a big plus! Our room was a 2 room mini suite and it was very spacious and worked out well for us. The laminate flooring is a very nice touch and helps with reducing dust and dirt overall. As another reviewer mentioned, the placement of the electrical outlets was very well thought out, especially the outlet that's located by the headboard in the 2nd room of the suite. The coffee maker, microwave and mini fridge are also very much appreciated. The a/c worked
Manager Response: Hi Michael, we are so pleased to read about your experience with us. From clean comfortable room to amenities to convenient location, we are really happy to make your stay perfect with us. It also gives me immense pleasure to read that you will keep us in mind when visiting the area again. Thank you so much for your kind words. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Best, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great price and location to Disneyland
Summary: The 2day price with taxes and fee's included (Sun, Mon #108), was about the same price for a single day at most other places this close to Disneyland. The room was clean where it needed to be, bed, bathroom, coffee maker, microwave-fridge. The floor is a wood grain laminate, so much cleaner than carpet. I would have given 5 stars, but you could see the room needed some refurb. Patches on the wall, room needed a uniform painting to cover it all up. Little room touch-ups here and there needed work. But, It was great for the price. The bed was comfortable. Location quiet. Close enough to Disneyland to walk. Or, take ART #6 , which the stop is right in front of this property. They sell the day pass right at the desk. Check-in was fast and painless. Front desk staff was friendly.You
Manager Response: We are all about providing a great value for our guests! We're really happy that you enjoyed your stay with us, found the staff friendly and your room to be clean and comfortable. We hope that you enjoyed your trip, and that you'll make return trip again in the near future. Thank you for your review.  Best regards, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Just the way I want it at a great price!
Summary: It has been a while since my last visit, but I was greeted just as friendly.  My room was clean and one thing that many hotels over look is outlets.  I work with software and outlets are important to me for my laptop and other equipment.  I need outlets near the bed as well as near the desk.  Americas Best Value Inn has taken the time to pay this kind of attention to detail.  I know where I will be staying on my next visit to Azusa!
Manager Response: Hi there, thank you so much for your wonderful review! From overall amenities to room to location it sounds like we were the perfect fit for you. Thank you so much for your review and your kind words. We'll be sure to pass along your comments to the rest of the team, and we look forward to welcome you back again soon next time you are in the area. Thank you!  Best, Hotel Management

Summary: You cant beat the price for a location like this. We went to Disneyland and it was so convenient to be able to walk from our hotel to the park and back and not waste money on parking! We had a late check in and gentleman at the front desk was so nice and directed me right to my room. The rooms are basic but comfortable. I liked the hard wood floor and the little table with chairs. They also had on demand TV so we could unwind after a long day at the park, Additionally, having a microwave and refrigerator in the room was convenient but we did struggle a little bit with getting it cold enough. When checking out, again the front desk staff was super friendly and offered directions on how to get to the freeway to head to our next location. Thanks for a great stay!
Manager Response: Hi Andrea, thank you so much for your review. We are so happy to see that everything during your stay was to your liking. We hope this means you will stay with us again. We look forward to your next visit.   Thanks again,  Hotel Management

Summary: Enjoyed my stay here. I got a room that totaled at about $60 for the night (which is cheaper than most places). They offered breakfast and were accommodating to my needs. I had a friendly conversation with an Indian woman at the front desk... But I can't remember her name or I would put it on here! Close to town and near shops 5/5
Manager Response: We always strive to make your stay with us as pleasant and cozy as possible and I'm so pleased to hear that we achieved our goal on your visit. Thanks for leaving a stellar review, and recommending us on TripAdvisor. I am sure your experience will help many other travelers choose wisely. Hope to see you soon again!  Best, Hotel Management

Summary: It was really nice and comfortable. Great location close to Disneyland. Free Wifi and great room. Walking distance to other stores and food places. Will stay there again. Friendly staff and they were able to help us get a scooter delivered to hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing our hotel. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are delighted that you will be a  regular guest with us. It's great that you find the room and location very suitable for your needs. Please let us know if there is anything that we can do to help or assist you while you are staying with us, we want you to feel that we are your home away from home.  Warm regards, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Very clean. Nice size rooms. Great staff
Summary: Stayed here 3 nights.  Great price. Had a 1 bedroom place it was a great size for a family it had a refrigerator microwave and coffee maker.  It is a older motel but our room was remodeled with hardwood floors and tile bath very very clean.  Easy walk to Disneyland 10 minutes we had a  9 and 8 year old they did great on the walk.  I would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to see that you and your family had a comfortable stay with us. If there's one thing we want, it's for you to have a good night's sleep in our little home away from home. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!  Best, Hotel Management

Summary: Beds were so hard, like a rock, no one slept well, including children.  Breakfast was 3 different types of packaged pastry, not even juice.  Staff had thick accents making it VERY difficult to understand things (not their fault, just a heads up in case you have questions for them).  Rooms were dilapidated, large holes patched haphazardly, my 12 year old literally looked at me and asked "cheapest one mom?"  There were bugs in the light fixtures (still alive).  We have stayed at properties close to Disneyland several times, including one labeled as a "hostel" this one was hands down THE WORST.  Spend your money elsewhere.
Manager Response: Denise, we are very sorry and absolutely shocked that you appear to have had such a bad experience during your recent stay with us. This is not the usual feedback we get and not the usual experience that our guests have. Our guests always tell us that they love our spacious and well-kept rooms. Upkeep and cleanliness are very important to us and our room service team does a great job preparing the room for our guests, so it is strange and unfortunate that we overlooked details in your room. We wish you had brought this to our attention during your stay, we would have loved to shift you to another room to ensure you had a great stay with us. We hope you'll give us another opportunity to restore your confidence in our hotel and our hospitality. We are confident that you will have a wonderful experience as vast majority of our guests do.   Sincerely,  Hotel Management

Summary Heading: A clean room, great location, great price.
Summary: Nothing fancy but clean & comfortable. Bonus refrigerator & microwave. Room much larger than expected. Free parking and easy walk to Disneyland. Everything we needed  and more. They offered coffee and packaged pastry as well, but we did not partake. Would recommend this motel for 1-2 nights on a budget. A/C powerful & cool. Provided bar soap & shampoo. Bring your own shampoo if you want the good stuff. Towels adequate, better than most motels.
Manager Response: Dear guest, we're really happy to hear that you found us an affordable place to base yourself while visiting an event in Anaheim. I am happy to learn that you enjoyed the value and  clean spacious room. It is very rewarding to hear from you on this matter and we appreciate that you have acknowledged our efforts to provide a clean, comfortable, and hospitable experience. We hope that you will stay with us again.   Best, Hotel Management

Summary: This is our second stay with Americas Best Value on W. Katella. I would recommend this location over and over. Check-in is a breeze, rooms are clean, beds and pillows comfortable, pool is nice and the location to Disneyland is great. Walk is about 10min, many restaurants along the way for a quick bite before or dinner in the room after a long day. Wifi works great also, This is not a fancy resort hotel and is older, but you CANNOT beat the price and location. You are also close to Garden Walk, maybe 3min walk to Bubba Gumps and Cheesecake Factory. Staff is also very friendly and accommodating. For the budget conscious, this is your place!
Manager Response: We're really happy to hear that you found us an affordable place to base yourself in Anaheim. We hope that you enjoyed your trip to Disneyland, and that you will come to again soon. Thank you for your wonderful review.  Best, Hotel Management

Summary: We stayed here last night. I really enjoyed it it was very clean very quiet and the bed was so comfortable!!! We will definately come back!! I would definately recommend this place to my family and friends!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to see that you had a comfortable stay with us. If there's one thing we want, it's for you to have a good night's sleep in our little home away from home. I hope this means you'll be back again someday on your next visit. Thanks again.  Best, Hotel Management

Summary: One of the last small places and best kept secrets to stay around Disneyland. All rooms have laminate flooring, this is way better then carpet. The people who work there are so nice and helpful. Within walking distance to Disneyland or The Convention Center. You can also walk to Walgreens or Cvs for what ever you may need. Comfortable beds too.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and your kind review. It is so great to hear that you felt that our hotel is the "best kept secrets to stay around Disneyland". That is a wonderful compliment  We believe that hotel should be a home away from home, and that is what we work hard to provide. We are glad that we could make your stay homely and that we could be of your service during your recent visit. Thanks again.  Best, Hotel Management

Summary: This was a quick weekend trip for us before heading to nor cal... great location for Disney and House of Blues as those were our destinations. This is located across the street so no driving.. gated hotel so great if you have kids no unwanted ppl here... simple but clean rooms.  Will definitely come back with the little ones.. for its convenience to Disneyland.. friendly staff, and affordability.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. Hope you and the little ones enjoyed the visit to the park. We are glad to hear that you will come back, this means a lot to us. Thank you, we look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards Hotel Management

Summary: We recently stayed here on our recent trip to Anaheim. We have stayed here on numerous occasions and always have had a pleasant experience. There has been considerable improvements to rooms. The owners are friendly and helpful always. Located close to Disneyland and Cheesecake Factory. The rooms are clean and comfortable. Prices are reasonable. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: We're really happy to hear that you found us an affordable place to base yourself in Anaheim. We're really happy that you enjoyed your stay with us, found the staff friendly and your room to be clean and comfortable. We hope that you enjoyed your trip, and that you'll make return trip again in the near future. Thank you for your review.  Best regards, Hotel Management

Summary: The rooms were basic but comfortable and clean,,staff were helpful with our needs,,rooms were also quiet. Close to a shopping Mall for fruit, food and water,,,there wasn't a kettle to boil water but had a coffee dripalator,,we had a pleasant stay,,across the road from the hotel was a Domino's Pizza and also a Korean Restaurant, and a Farrell's restaurant, had wonderful ice cream and lollie's, chocolates,, and had great food,,big meals,,
Manager Response: Charmaine, we are happy to hear you decided to stay with us when you were in the area. We're glad that your time here was comfortable and that you enjoyed many aspects of your stay with us. But we are disappointed that we weren't able to knock it out of the park for you. We appreciate your feedback. Please do let us know if there is anything else we can do to do make your stay even better.  Best, Hotel Management

Summary: I booked this motel through TA for a special price (about $80 per night - with tax - plus a $25 Amazon gift card.) It is worth that money.  I wouldn't pay $100+tax for it, however.  Don't expect a 4 out of 5 place, but it is clean (no black feet for me) and in a very nice and safe area (literally a 10 minute walk to Disneyland's main gate, and a two to  three minute walk to Bubba Gump, Roy's and McCormick and Schmick's.)    It IS old.  It reminds me of apartment houses in the 60's and 70's - where the rooms surround a small (but nice) pool area (the pool was working and in use - though they close it at 9PM.)  The place is kept up pretty nicely for an old establishment.  My room (I write this while I'm here, on September 7) is very large. It would be good for a family with lots
Manager Response: Richard, thank you so much for your detailed review. I do appreciate your comments and am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We do pride ourselves on being an affordable and top notch value place for guests visiting the Disneyland.  I am also pleased to note that our wonderful staff lived up to your expectations. Thank you for your review, we hope to welcome you back again on your next visit to the area.  Best, Hotel Management

Summary: The hotel is located right off the Disneyland with ample choices off restaurants and shopping nearby. Whether traveling for business or on a road trip the Americas best value inn will not disappoint. The property and rooms are well maintained....clean and very spacious..not one spec of dust to be found.  The staff are extremely polite and courteous and the prices cannot be beat.  Stayed there on August,2016
Manager Response: We do have a really great location don't we?! We're happy to hear that everything throughout your recent stay went so smoothly, and that you had a great visit. We do hope that you make a return visit to Anaheim, and we look forward to welcoming you back when you do! Thanks, Mohil.  Best, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: 4 night stay, OK for the price.
Summary: It was OK. The whole place needs to be remodeled! The carpet in our room was ripped and stained, the walls in our bathroom were cracked and some of our towels were stained as well. Room service was good, they were always on it! We didn't need to ask for anything extra. All though I was a little upset when I got there because they specifically told us we would get breakfast (I'm thinking eggs and bacon), but instead they gave us cheap muffins and coffee. Luckily there's a few breakfast places to go to a couple of blocks away but they're not the best. I guess u get what you pay for so it was ok.
Manager Response: Dear Alyssa,  Thank you on your review and on pointing out issues which have influenced  your overall impression of your stay with us. I personally, apologize for not meeting your expectations with respect to your recent stay. We are continually upgrading and improving our amenities and services at the hotel but it’s a long process and hopefully we will meet your expectation one day.  Shelly

Summary: Friendly people , ok hotel but not worth the money. Spa pool covered up like a dead bug. pool was nice, no milk for coffee in the morning and the pastries were hard, food is cleared out by 9am sharp...Toilet didn't,t flush good, big hole in the wall that was patched.  You can get a super modern room ( like I did ) Indigo Hotel for less...Americas best value should be charging $49.95 a nite.. Housekeeping dosnt speak English. That's a value ...Close to Disney...Yayyyy
Manager Response: Dear Frank, I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us. I am sorry to hear that you were not pleased with your stay.I am sorry that our grab-and-go breakfast did not meet your needs.Your comments on this matter will be useful to us as we continually work to improve our hotel. Your feedback is very important to us, so thank you for sharing.   Shelly

Summary: This Inn is walking distance to Disney and the Convention Center. There were many restaurants within easy walking distance as well.There is a bus stop nearby which will take you to both places as well. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean and functional- housekeeping did a good job. WiFi worked well. The negatives keeping me from giving a higher rating was the lack of breakfast and the loud air- conditioner.
Manager Response: Dear Guest  Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay. We are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. It makes all our efforts worthwhile when our guests leave Americas Best Value Inn with good memories. We look forward to greeting you again!   Shelly

Summary: I thoroughly enjoyed my week stay at this hotel.  I was there for work for a conference.  I'm a budget-oriented traveler with food allergies who requires a fridge and microwave when I travel.  The location was great.  I didn't go to Disney, but it was within easy walking distance to the park and the conference center and hotels. Stores and restaurants were also within walking distance.  I enjoyed Cheesecake Factory and Roy's. And target was a short drive away.  What made this hotel satisfying was the convenience features for the price.  There are no marble sink, Moen faucets, fancy furnishings, heavenly bed or anything remotely resembling a luxury hotel. But there was a wall AC, TV, Iron, Fridge, microwave, free parking, free wifi, coffee maker, pool, continental type breakfast,
Manager Response: Dear Bruce,  Greetings from ABVI and thank you on your encouraging and supportive review.  We always appreciate the positive comments left by the most important people in our world; our guests. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and satisfied with our hospitality. Thank you for being our guest and thank you for sharing your positive experience of ABVI with other TripAdvisor readers.  Shelly

Summary: Not a bad place to stay , their pool was under construction at the time which is a bummer if you have any children with you.  Overall the room was nice, clean, spacious with a microwave and fridge.  Parking was good offered free Wi-Fi but TV options for viewing was not great and the one thing that I didn’t like was the fact they charged for Ice, we paid $91.00 a night for them to charge for Ice which is a not a typical charge at all the hotels/motels I have stayed. But slept well with no loud outside noises, with a lot of food options within in a short distances and theme parks all withing 5 - 15 minutes time
Manager Response: Erlinda, thank you for staying with us and for your review. We apologize for the pool, it is being upgraded and will re-open soon. But we are glad to hear that you had a good stay overall and we look forward to welcome you back again in the future.   Best regards, Hotel Management

Summary: Best value is a great place to stay at.  The rooms are clean,  the staff is very nice and accommodating. This was my third time staying here and for sure I will be back . The owners are very kind as well as the rest of the staff.
Manager Response: From friendly staff to clean rooms, it was our pleasure to make your stay with us wonderful. Thank you so much for your complimentary words. Our team was very pleased to read your comments. We look forward to welcome you back again.   Best regards, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Cheap with a hope of quality
Summary: I hoped that since its so close to Disneyland that it would have some quality associated to it but i was wrong. Bugs in the tub, window shutters no curtain, patch jobs on the walls, scrapped caulking all over the bathroom. The only good traits are management is accomodating, the room has hardwood floors and there are so many places to go that your time spent in the room is just sleep time.
Manager Response: We sincerely regret to hear of your experience at our hotel. We strive to provide our guests with flawless service and product delivery. Our apologies that we did not live up to your expectations. We were very distressed to learn of your impression of the hotel. Please know that we are looking into your feedback and we'll make necessary changes in our service delivery. Thank you so much for your feedback. We hope you'll give us another try. Thanks again.

Summary: My whole family enjoyed our stay at this great hotel.  We stayed for 3 night and it was a wonderful experience.  Great staff, great location and you even see the fireworks at night from Disneyland.  Thanks again for a great stay!!!See you again.
Manager Response: Griselda, we are pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your review. We look forward to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Adequate, safe, clean.  Didn't use pool.  Hot tub was not working or something - was covered with tarp during our stay.  Breakfast was nondescript and not something I would eat, really.  But having said all of the above .. prices were fairly reasonable and would stay again.
Manager Response: We are really glad you enjoyed you stay with us overall. We do have pool and Spa, our pool was open but our spa was closed for upgrades. We apologize for your inconvenience. Still, we are glad that you liked other aspects of your stay with us and we appreciate your review. Thank you!

Summary: I really wouldn't call our room a suite.  It was more like an extra closet with a bed in it.  When we walked into the room in was hotter inside than out and it wasn't until the sun went down that the room cooled off.  The pool area is lovely, but remember you get what you pay for.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your concerns with us. We try very hard to make our guests stays as pleasant as possible and it is always a disappointment when we learn one of them has left with a less than first-rate experience. During the summer months, for all new reservations, we make it a point to leave the AC on, so guests can feel comfortable upon arrival. It appears that our room service team did not do this after they made arrival preparations. Please accept our apologies for this. We have brought your experience to our team's attention to ensure this does not happen again. We sincerely hope you'll give us another opportunity to restore your confidence of our hotel and our hospitality. Thank you.

Summary: Old, dated and breakfast was not worth it. Bagged pastries and red apples. Close to the park but I will stay somewhere else next time.  I will say the bed was firm yet comfortable.  Could update the facilities to improve the quality.  Also get a better breakfast biuffet.
Manager Response: Dear Lorri, while we're glad that you enjoyed the location and found the bed to be comfortable, I'm disappointed to hear that our facilities and breakfast did not your expectations. We appreciate your feedback and we'll be sure to make the necessary improvements for the next time you're here. Please do let us know if there is anything else we can do to do make your stay even better. Thank you.

Summary: I did some extensive research to find a hotel for the best value for our weekend (2 nights) stay and visit to Disneyland. Most of the reviews for this property mention that it's a great value, decent quality, and great location. Apparently we lucked out and got every bad thing that could happen in a hotel! A shuttle from John Wayne airport was $20; $10 per person. Estimated cab fair would have been about $43. Upon checking in, which was a frustrating experience because the gentleman at the front desk did not speak much English(he was trying, but there was a lot of confusion), we went up stairs to our room and it smelled AWFUL!! We immediately opened all of the windows and the door just to air the room out. Our window overlooked an alley and the street, and even at about 11pm it
Manager Response: Dear Olivia, we're disappointed that your stay with us wasn't very restful. Your room should always feel fresh. Had we known this in the moment, we would have loved to switch you rooms and give you another room away from the parking area to ensure you had a topnotch and quiet stay with us.  A second chance is all we need to prove to you that we're better than this. We hope you had a wonderful time at the park. Thanks again.  Sincerely, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Not what we were hoping for
Summary: After reading many good reviews about this hotel I booked it for my husband and I's honeymoon hoping to save some money and have a nice place to stay.  We ended up canceling our stay and leaving.  The room was very old and dirty and very small.  Everything was very basic which was some what expected but I personal care a lot when it comes to cleanliness. The man at the front desk had a very very thick Indian accent making it extremely hard and frustrating to work with him once we realized the issues with the room.  We were charged for one night of the stay due to the fact that we did not cancel earlier.  The tub had a dripping faucet that wouldn't turn off and the bathroom and room had an overall dirty feeling and was in need of an upgrade.  If you are looking to save money this
Manager Response: Dear Ally, we are sorry that you did not have a great stay with us. We aim to provide clean, comfortable and pleasant stay for all our guests so we are disappointed to hear that this was not he case. Our room service team generally does a great job when it comes to preparing the room for upcoming guests, so it is strange that this had happened. We would have loved to switch your rooms to ensure you had a great stay with us. This is not a usual comment we receive so please know we will look into your experience further to ensure this does not happen again. We hope you will give us another try.

Summary: This hotel is a 10 minute walk to Disneyland. A fraction of the price of surrounding hotel chains. Kept up really well. A family runs it, and they are extremely personable and helpful. No elevators. If you have a baby buggy, request a ground floor room. If you have two parties, request a "suite." It's nothing fancy, but for one low cost you get two bedrooms and can save you a ton of money.  If you are looking for a decent place to lay your head while spending most of your time at Disneyland, there is no better place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear guest, we're glad that the customer service you received was just as pleasant as your accommodations. We're happy to be an affordable rate for travelers heading to Disneyland and other local attractions. It's also wonderful to hear that our amenities and location will keep us on your radar for your next visit. Thank you for your wonderful review, and we hope to see you soon again.  Warm Regards,  Hotel Management

Summary: Would stay again. They are very nice. The beds are very comfy. Pet friendly as well. Always have ice in there ice machine, pop machine works great as well as the snacks. I would come back and stay. They have a restuart right next to them and they do deliver. McDonald's, pizza hut, subway are all right down the road a little bit. Easy access to the interstate.
Manager Response: Dear Taylor, we are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and liked everything from comfortable bed to our amenities. It's great to hear that you will be back to stay with us again. Thank you so much for staying with us and taking time to review us. We look forward to welcome you back again soon!  Best, Hotel Management

Summary: For the price we paid in the area, we struck a deal. Especially since we needed the extra cash for Disney. The only thing that I did not like was that there is no complementary shuttle to the park ($3 a ride) but there is a day pass for ($5) and other shuttle bundles at the booth where you get dropped by at the park.  *we didn't fing out about this until the day before our checkout.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer,  we're happy to be an affordable rate for travelers heading to visiting Disneyland other local attractions. We are glad that your found our hotel to be of a great value. We hope that our amenities and location will keep us on your radar for your next visit. We hope to see you soon!  Best, Hotel Management

Summary: So I booked on priceline through bidding and I am very pleased. I have two bedrooms, more than we need but the child liked having her own room. Yes it's definitely a motel that was refurbished and renamed, it has hardwood floors and bathroom is very nice, spacious, and clean. Cute pool is in the middle. Close to park, bout a 5 minute walk . the front desk was friendly, free WiFi, free parking, and free breakfast. Thank you Americas best.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us Jennifer. We're pleased that you enjoyed your stay.There's nothing better than knowing that you've found a safe, clean, comfortable place with great amenities to stay during your travels. If you're ever in the area again, we'd love to welcome you back again.   Safe travels, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Convenient to Disneyland at a great price
Summary: 2nd stay. I like the proximity to Disneyland and the convenience to lots of eateries. Great front desk folks and very helpful.  Not fancy but clean and there is value here. Staying again in late May. My name is Bob and I approved this message
Manager Response: Professional customer service and comfortable rooms with great amenities are always what we strive for and I'm so pleased to hear that we achieved our goal your visit, Bob. Thanks for your review, and we can't wait for your next stop in late May.  Warm Regards, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: You can't beat the price for location!!!
Summary: A little dated but....No frills, no thrills, just a good old fashion, clean, and friendly place to lay you and your family down for the night after a long marathon day at the park. Just two blocks from Disneyland. You have free parking, clean linens everyday, microwave, a small refrigerator in the room...coffee and packaged muffins in the morning in the lobby.  There is a small strip mall on the way to Disneyland where you can also find food before getting to the park. (we ate at our favorite place SUBWAY). Great price for location, location, location!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Thekokonutcrew, we're delighted your stay with us was pleasant from staff to hotel room. Our great location puts guests right in the area they want to be, and we're glad to hear that you enjoyed that benefit. We're looking forward to your next stay with us!

Summary Heading: Nice little surprise close to Disneyland!
Summary: We enjoyed our stay here.  Rooms were large and clean, as was the entire motel. Super affordable and the ART is convenient after a few days of walking to the parks.   Free parking, Disney Fireworks, and close to many dining choices.  Staff was super helpful.  No complaints and would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: We're happy that you had a great experience with us, and we couldn't be more excited that you'll be returning in the future! We are a convenient location for our family. Hope to see you again soon -- we're eager to improve our rating. :)

Summary: I stayed for two nights at Americas Best Value Inn & Suites last week with my sister. It was nice to discover that the bedroom contained a fridge and a microwave which saved us money to store snacks for disneyland. On the first night of our stay we discovered that our King bed sheets were dirty and had two tiny bugs on it. They were not bed bugs thankfully just two random bugs probably because it looked like nobody has cleaned this bed recently... Anyways, I alerted the front desk and they moved us immediately into another room which we had absolutely no issue with. Overall, I would come back again due to the price but not to the room with cleanliness issue.
