Manager Response: Dear Erika, while we're glad you had a great stay with us and we were able to offer up an alternative room right away, we apologize for the inconvenience. Hopefully, this won't dissuade you from being our guest in the future. We'd love to have you stay with us again. Thank you.

Summary: Like many, I booked this place while we visited Disney. The room was very spacious, overly so for two people. Everything was the bare essentials, done to par. Nothing outstanding, nothing too underwhelming.  The bed was very stiff however, but it wasn't really an issue. The bathtub was a little grimy, but again, not too much of an issue. Be aware though that the walls are pretty thin. Was able to hear the couple next door having sex in the morning. All in all, good for the price. The staff was friendly, it's only about a 10min walk to Disneyland, decent accommodations. If you're on a budget trip, this is a good choice.
Manager Response: From location, to amenities to service it sounds like we were the perfect fit for your hotel needs, Christian. We'll be sure to pass along your kind words to the rest of the team. Thank you for taking time to leave us your review and recommending us. All the best!  Warm regards,  Hotel Management

Summary: The best part about this room was its proximity to Disneyland. We could walk there in 5-10 minutes. It was also rather large, which was nice. But it desperately needed to be updated. The bathroom specifically was a little scary.
Manager Response: Dear guest, we are glad you enjoyed the location. Our guests love the location and easy access to the Disneyland. We are sorry that room did not quite meet your expectations. Please know that we are always here to help, we want you to love your stay with us, if you need anything during your stay, we are just a call away. We wish you had let us know about this during your stay, we would have gladly switched your rooms to ensure you had a top notch stay with us. We hope we will get a another chance to show you the five-stars experience we are known for.   Safe travels, Hotel Management

Summary: Pros: budget rates, great location - walking distance to Disneyland, Anaheim Convention Center, numerous dining places. Rooms are clean. Bed is firm. Free Wi-Fi. Free parking.good views of Disneyland fireworks from second floor. Mini fridge and microwave in room. Cons: dated building and rooms, missing minor amenities: lotion, conditioner, decaf coffee. Thin and scratchy towels, firm pillows, loud AC unit. Breakfast is watery coffee and packaged danishes.  If you are looking for an affordable, very basic room at a great location then this would suit your needs.
Manager Response: We're really happy to hear that you liked many aspects of your stay with us such as customer service, in-room amenities like fridge and microwave, comfortable bed, and overall cleanliness.  But we are disappointed to hear that some part of your stay left so much to be desired. Our aim is to provide comfortable, quality stay for all our guests at a competitive price, so we will surely look into your experience to make necessary improvements to ensure our guests have a top notch stay with us. We hope to welcome you back again and we can't wait to make your next stay even better! Thank you.

Summary: Very nice and helpful staff.Room was spacious and clean. A.R.T. shuttle in front of hotel. Value was excellent. We will stay here again. Subway,CVS, a few minutes away. Get on # 6  A.R.T. shuttle and 7 minutes later " Disneyland". Save the feet". Back to LAX? call SuperShuttle, will pick you up in front of hotel ..
Manager Response: Thank you for your stellar review, John! We're pleased to hear that everything was to your liking.  Our great location puts guests right in the area they want to be, and we're glad to hear that you enjoyed that benefit. We're looking forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: The room was very basic with clear signs of wear and tear.  Bed was pretty comfy.  Could not close bathroom door if bathmat was in place. No washcloths on the last night of stay.  The breakfast included was packaged muffins, apples and OJ.  Great as a take with you snack but not what I would call breakfast.  To be fair they just do not have the space for more in the tiny front office.   Huge problem was that one of the day managers  pulled us out of the office to stand at a podium to hawk  a "free breakfast" at the new Wyndahm resort nearby.  I am on vacation and I do not want to hear a timeshare speech.  We had to fake phone calls over the next several days to avoid engagement as the podium  as at the entry point to the Inn.  Would not recommend
Manager Response: Dear Stephen, we'd like to apologize for the impression you received. Our goal is for you to have a pleasant and comfortable stay. This isn't a complaint we've heard before, but we want to apologize if outside third party booth was a bother to your stay. Please know that we are going to speak to them about your experience to ensure this does not happen again. As for bathroom door issue, please accept our apologies, our team thoroughly prepares the room for upcoming guests, it seems we dropped the ball here. But if there is ever any issue with your room, we are just a call away, we'd send some one right over or shift your room to make sure you have a top notch stay with us. We're glad to hear that comfortable bed left a more positive impression. We sincerely hope that if you're in the area in the future, you'll give us another opportunity and stay with us. We are eager to make this right!

Summary: Just returned from our first stay at this little place. We were happily surprised and will definitely stay again. Because we were out and about all day every day, we were really looking for an inexpensive place to stay, within walking distance of the parks. We never tried the continental breakfast or the pool (which is only open until 9pm) so I can't speak to those, but this place was clean and spacious and exactly fit what we wanted! Stayed four nights. We had reserved a two queen bed room and were thrilled to end up with a room that was more like a room and a half, with a king in the main room and a queen in a second room. Then a large closet room with ironing board, fridge, microwave, and a bathroom off that. Dresser, two night stands, enough outlets to charge all our phones,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! Professional customer service and comfortable rooms with great amenities are always what we strive for and I'm so pleased to hear that we achieved our goal your visit. It's great to hear that you'll be staying with us again in the future. Hope you'll try our complimentary breakfast next time you stay with us.   Until next time, Hotel Management

Summary: Stayed here on short notice for 3 nights  to go to Disneyland. Room was decent sized.  Was only a 0.8 mile walk (15 min) each direction. Breakfast consist of juice and muffins.  Had a little issue with the wifi , but after a little bit the front desk got it fixed. A.C was a little loud , but not terrible. Like the fact of having wood floors and not having to worry about nasty carpet.  For the money (free wifi /free parking ) it was a good value for a place to crash after a long day of Disney.  If you planned on doing multiple back/forths from Disney daily this might a little far.  We just stayed all day and the walk ok.  Would stay here again
Manager Response: We're happy that you had a great experience with us, Glen. Thanks for letting us know about the WiFi issue during your stay, we are always here to help! From amenities to service it sounds like we were the perfect fit for your hotel needs. It's also great to hear that you'll be staying with us again for future travels. Thanks again.

Summary: kids around the place was pretty noisy.  inside and out this place is pretty old except for the paint. the breakfast was not much of a breakfast. so don't expect a full breakfast. could have stayed at some place better.
Manager Response: Providing our guests with a comfortable, pleasant, clean environment that makes them feel at home is why we're here, but it sounds like we didn't quite live up to our standards. We apologize that our breakfast was not up to the par for you. This is not the usual comment we receive from our guests as we have a wide range of fresh choices for our guests to start the morning right, Please know that we'll surely look into your experience further.  We're looking forward to your next visit with us and showing you that five-star experience we're known for!   Sincerely, Hotel Management "

Summary: This isn't a 5 star hotel, BUT, If you're looking for a place to comfortably sleep and shower on a budget then this is the place. We rented a two bedroom 3 bed suite first 7 of us (3 adults 4 children) we fit fine. I read that it was noisy at night, but we knocked out and hardly heard any noise. (Just during Disney's fireworks ). Beds seem hard, but at the end of a long day, they were the most comfortable ever! Slept through the whole night. Very close to disney, walking distance about 15 min at the most. There are different restaurants around the area, including breakfast buffet next door, a 7-11 a block away as well as a CVS. You also have cheesecake factory and Bubba gump at a walking distance. Staff is very nice and helpful. Cleaning lady helped me with directions. Pool
Manager Response: Christy, we're happy your stay with us was pleasant from staff to hotel room. Our great location puts guests right in the area they want to be, and we're glad to hear that you enjoyed that benefit. We're looking forward to your next stay with us! Thank you so much.  Safe travels!

Summary: Great place to stay for a family trip to Disneyland. We got the two room with 4 queen bed in total. Plenty of room to spread out. Easy walking to both theme parks and Starbucks. Able to see Disney fireworks at night. Great swimming pool and hot tub. Management  were great, we were able to check out late due to flights. Rooms a little dated but very clean, adequate bedding. Only one con refrigerator didn't work. Would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Liz, thank you for your stellar review. We're glad we could provide you with a pleasant and comfortable place to stay. Our goal is for our guests to feel as if they're at home, and it sounds like we achieved that. Thanks again for recommending us. We hope to welcome you back again soon next time you are in the area.

Summary: Price was right. Walking distance to Disney or Convention Center. Old, but clean. Pillows very firm and big, so bring your own if you like thin or soft. Towels like sandpaper. Extremely loud from 845-900 pm during Disney fireworks show! First night I thought there was a shootout going on! Windows allow you to hear any conversation going on outdoors. Don't count on breakfast, unless you like packaged banana muffin and some other pastry. Minimal variety for that.
Manager Response: Lisa, thank your for staying with us and taking time to leave us your review. We are really glad that you loved the location and found the hotel to be clean and pleasant. Our great location puts guests right in the area they want to be, close to Disneyland! We are sorry that you were disturbed by fireworks at night, this is not the usual comment we hear but we will surely look into this further to see what we can do. We hope you'll give us another try next time you visit the area. Thank you, Lisa.

Summary Heading: Don't expect much and you'll be fine!
Summary: Overall there was nothing majorly wrong with this place other than it's not very impressive or comfortable and is on the older side. We wouldn't usually stay at somewhere like this but we literally just needed a place to sleep and it was on the lower end of the cost scale and had the location we wanted. It is very close to Disneyland parks - walking distance even with small kids. The person at the front desk was very friendly although hard to understand with his thick accent. The parking was good so I was happy about that. It worked for what we needed but I probably wouldn't stay there again.
Manager Response: Kathleen, thank you for staying with us and for taking time to review us. I am glad to know that you enjoyed most aspect of your stay with us and that you loved the location, but we really want you to love your stay. We want to be a home away from home for everyone who comes to visit us. Thank you and we hope you'll call us next time you are in the area and need a place to stay. We look forward to making your next stay even better.

Summary: Spent two night on a business trip.  Great location - easy walking distance to the Anaheim Convention Center and several small and big name restaurants.  I give the place an overall 5 point rating based on the value.  This is not a 5-star hotel.  It is inexpensive, clean, relatively quiet for being on a very busy street, has a quaint outdoor pool and hot tub.  The place shows its age but is in pretty good condition.  There are places in the area that are the same price or more expensive that are a real disappointment compared to this one.  The manager and staff are very polite and helpful.  Our group had several rooms reserved and they had about half of the rooms ready for an early check-in (we arrived at 11AM) which really helped us out.
Manager Response: Fred, what a delightful review. . Thank you so much for your very complimentary words, especially those commending our staff who we know to be as welcoming and friendly as you. I am very glad that we could make your stay wonderful. We will look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Anaheim. Thanks again:)

Summary: The staff was very friendly and accommodating. Rooms are very spacious with lots of storage and large closet. Updating is in process. We got a great price! Excellent location, one  block from Disneyland
Manager Response: We're thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your complimentary words for our staff, they were very happy to read your comments. We're glad that you loved your room as well as our location. Thanks again, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon next time you visit the area.  Until next time, Hotel Management

Summary: Rates doubled during the time we stayed, but still cheaper than other options that met our criteria (location/bus accessibility). Although there were no major issues for us, I would probably spend a little more next time to stay where the room and ambience are better.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great family room with extra seperate bedroom - easy walk to Disney
Summary: The extra bedroom with tv, large main room with two queen beds, tv, microwave, fridge, coffee machine and bathroom with a bath make this a great place for families. It is an easy walk to Disneyland and is right next door to Starbucks. You can see the fireworks each night and walk to Walmart and fast food restaurants. The only fault is that there are no towel racks or hooks to hang towels. The beds are firm but comfortable. There is also a pool and spa.  Highly recommended!
Manager Response: none

Summary: clean and comfortable , parking was good. public transportation was right out front . breakfast featured off brand cereal which tasted like cardboard . how much more can it be for the decent cereal ? great place to stay for disneyland .
Manager Response: none

Summary: Not quite walking distance and a little run down,  but awesome for the price.  They keep it clean,  it's just outdated a bit. The beds aren't super comfy and neither are the pillows, but for what you're paying, it's definitely a good deal and the parking garage next to it, typically, has shuttles to disneyland, because it's disneyland's overflow parking garage.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Have stayed at this place a few times now. It's central to some great dining, shopping, public transport and disney!! The owners are very friendly and accommodating.   Clean and we'll serviced.  When we stay there it feels like we are in our second home!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights while visiting Disneyland.  It's only a 10 minute walk to the park.  Free parking.  Breakfast in the morning consists of juice, coffee, muffins, cinnamon buns and apples.  The staff was friendly and helpful at the desk.  The room was fairly clean, no problems with the sheets as others had mentioned.  They even placed my son's stuffed animal on the bed when they made it (nice touch).  Coffee maker, microwave and refrigerator in the room.  Free wifi with password.  It was a good place to sleep and get ready for the day.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This motel is a bit further from Disney (10-15 min walk) but close enough to make it worth it. Price was excellent and was well worth what we paid. Room was clean and quiet. We stayed two nights for a Disney Halloween party. It is not close enough to un back during the day from the parks. Parking was ample and free, we did not try the breakfast but it looked like the usual muffins and coffee fare that is offered in most of the local hotels. Front desk staff was friendly and welcoming. The pool looked nice but we did not use it. We would stay here again for the price!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: So Close to DL, warm and welcomign staff
Summary: Great staff and great location. The rooms are not the most up to date, but if you are going to Disneyland, how much time will you be spending in your room realistically? I love the location and the staff here, will be coming back for years to come.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us. Once again, thank you, and we look forward to another chance to serve you!   Shelly

Summary: If you are looking for a good value, ABVI on Katella is a good choice. Our room was suite style, one king bed and a double bed in a separate bedroom.   Room had a microwave and small refrigerator.  Cleanliness of room was good. Parking is complimentary. Disneyland entrance is about a 10 to 15 minute walk.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations with our future guests. We are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you again for choosing ABVI, please feel free to contact us for any assistance you might require on your future reservation.   Shelly

Summary Heading: Cheap hotel but in a great location.
Summary: In the first room we stayed in the wood floor was so dirty that our clean white socks were black within 3 minutes of taking off our shoes. The bathtub was filthy with long black hair and we are all blond) We had trouble with the toilet not flushing properly and the bed and pillows were hard. The next morning we complained and they moved us to a room with carpet and softer bed. Management did give us extra towels when asked. The rooms do not look as nice as the photos listed on their website anf the hotel needs to be updated.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us. I am sorry to hear that you were not pleased with your stay. I apologize that you were not pleased with the cleanliness of our hotel. As this hotel’s manager, I can assure you that as of today, our property has made some positive changes.  Regards, Shelly

Summary: Stayed for two nights in a suite style room with a king bed and double bed in separate room. Carpets looked clean but wore shoes entire time, bathroom was clean could use some painting but didn't bother us. Beds were comfortable brought our own blankets though pillows were good. Very nice staff too. They had breakfast which was just orange juice, coffee, and some packaged pastries not too fancy. There were soda machines right outside and a coffee machine which I thought was very good with many options all under $2. Pool and jacuzzi looked nice and it was about 100 degrees at one point but we didn't use them since we spent all day in Disneyland. Overall had a very nice experience and would stay again and recommend. Room 104 was very nice.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your experiences of your recent stay at ABVI with future guests.  We look forward to another opportunity to host you at our property, and once again, thank you for your positive comments.  Regards,  Shelly

Summary: My family and I traveled to Disneyland in Anahiem California to celebrate my 60th birthday.  Due to my physical limitations we chose a motel whose location was close to Disneyland. Americas Best Value Inn on Katella is located 2 blocks from the main entrance. As a senior who is retired and on a budget the ABVI nightly price was right on target for us. What I also liked was the ART shuttle picks you up at front of the motel and drops you off at the main entrance to Disneyland for a cheap price. You can pay for an all day bus pass to and from the park in the motels office or pay cash on the bus.  The hotel offers a small discount on Disneyland tickets. The ABVI on Katella shows a bit of wear and bit dated but it's clean and fits a budget. We rented a 2 bed room suite with 1
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations with our future guests. We are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you again for choosing ABVI, please feel free to contact us for any assistance you might require on your future reservation.   Regards, Shelly

Summary: If you're looking for a 5 star hotel, you wont find it here, but my husband & I wanted to stay at a "lower end" hotel for our mini Disneyland vacation that has NO bugs of any sorts, complementary breakfast, close to food sources & within walking distance to the parks. GOOD LUCK finding that for a good price right? Well I did! The staff are so friendly & helpful which is hard to come by these days. The room was a decent size with a nice bathroom that came with a spacious mini fridge, microwave, FREE Wifi & a coffee maker! Um...YES! If you're not into walking to the parks, there's a shuttle right out front that could take you for $5 a person. Honestly, we won't be staying anywhere else for our Disneyland trips. It accommodates ALL of our needs. If you would ĺike to see how the
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Greetings from ABVI and thank you sincerely on your marvelous review. We have read your review with the greatest of pleasure and pride. It makes all our efforts worthwhile when our guest leaves ABVI with such fantastic memories. We look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help if you decide to come back. It will be our pleasure to assist you.  Regards, Shelly

Summary Heading: Very Used Mattress, Odd Contoured Pillows, Heater not Hot
Summary: This time stayed in room 222.  Seems like the same sleeping issues still exist.  The mattress was uneven, like the springs had permanently settled from too much use.  One pillow was so soft as to have almost no form, the other two were mixed.  Mixed meaning one half of the pillow was hard, the other half decent.  It was unseasonably cold during our visit, and it didn't help that the heater only blew lukewarm air.  Set the temperature to the max, on heat, but turned it off after 20 minutes of no improvement in room temp.  Still giving it a three due to it's proximity to Disneyland, and affordability compared to hotels in the area.  However, if you are after a good's nights sleep following a long Disneyland day, check elsewhere.  I realize this hotel is a budget option, but it's
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to make us aware of your experience at America's Best Value Inn and Suites. I personally, apologize for not meeting your expectations with respect to your recent stay. We are continually upgrading and improving our amenities and services at the hotel but it’s a long process and hopefully we will meet your expectation one day.  Regards, Shelly

Summary Heading: Ideal place to stay on a budget.
Summary: Motel staff very friendly and helpful. Rooms are cleaned everyday with fresh linen. Walking distant to Disneyland and to restaurants. You can purchase Disneyland tickets and tours also from the office.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your experiences of your recent stay at ABVI online and we are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help if you decide to come back. It will be our pleasure to assist you.  Regards, Shelly

Summary: Good value for your dollar. I stayed seven days and liked  how close it was to Disneyland. There were also a lot of good food options around this hotel. booking in advance I got a great rate. Carpets were a minus but the place was clean.  Would stay here again without a second thought. I am Bob and I approved of this message !
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations with our future guests. We are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you again for choosing ABVI, please feel free to contact us for any assistance you might require on your future reservation.   Regards, Shelly

Summary Heading: A great value close to Disney
Summary: Found the management very helpful and responsive.  Room was large and comfortable.  New TV with good cable selection.  Furnishings are a bit tired but very clean.  Didn't use the pool  or hot tub but it looked fun.  It was only a 5-10 minute walk to the entrance to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations with our future guests. We are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you again for choosing ABVI, please feel free to contact us for any assistance you might require on your future reservation.  Regards, Shelly

Summary: The room was clean overall. My boyfriend and I stayed there while we visited Disneyland, and it is within walking distance from the parks. It was just right for a place to sleep. The bed was a bit stiff.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in Anaheim.  Regards, Shelly

Summary: It was the best rate within easy walking distance of Disneyland, but we had family that booked even closer and their room rates were only $10-15 more per night.  Obviously this adds up when you're staying for 5 nights, but I think well worth it. Everything at this motel is done with cheap, cheaper, cheapest in mind. The rooms are dingy. Though they have paid for nice shutters on most windows which gives an updated apperance, don't let that trick you. The walls are marked and chipped, the carpet is nasty, the sheets are sandpaper, the bathrooms are old and crusty. The "breakfast" each morning was packaged honeybuns, moon pies, a small pot of coffee and a pitcher of orange juice.  Good points: The staff is friendly, it is a 10min walk to Disneyland, parking is free.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make us aware of your experience at America's Best Value Inn and Suites. I offer you my sincerest apology.  I will be addressing your reported issue with our housekeeping & Maintenance staff.  Regards, Shelly

Summary: The room itself was good. I was pleasantly surprised it did not reek of smoke and smelled clean. I had a bad experience at another Americas Best Value Inn in Phoenix with that issue. A dirty sock was left underneath the lip of the bed so not sure how thorough the clean job was. I just threw it in the trash. The carpet looked to have many stains all over it, which was not attractive. The walls are disturbingly thin, I could hear my partner through the wall outside very easily even though she was speaking normally. We both slept good though with no disruptions during our stay.  The attendant when I arrived ignored me and looked at his computer for awhile after I walked into the office, which I thought was rude. He warmed up a bit after he began the check-in process. We arrived
Manager Response: Dear Guest, I would like to personally apologize for the incidences that you experienced during your check in. I can assure you that I am taking your feedback very seriously and will be working with the staff to ensure the issues you experienced are not a problem moving forward.  Regards, Shelly

Summary Heading: Paper thin walls and hard mattresses
Summary: Chose this hotel because of location and decent reviews.  No one mentions that all the walls and ceiling are paper thing. 1st room we were in every morning at 5:30-5:45 herd of buffalo stampeding followed by acrobatics and furniture throwing. The people who run the place were very nice and offered another room, which apparently had a mattress from the flinstone home. We were also unaware that blizzcon was going on during the end of our visit and our last day at the hotel was spent listening to groups of 20 somethings walking and talking at all hours. At one point a group of 4 of them stood in front of our door by the pool and chatted for 20-30 mins. We heard every word. We heard every word the cleaning ladies said while they were on either side of us and above us. Don't book if
Manager Response: Dear Guest, I would like to personally apologize for the series of unfortunate incidences that you experienced during your stay with us. We continually try to do our very best for all of our guests, but unfortunately, sometimes we do fail.  I will look into each issue that you have noted, in an attempt to correct and improve our hotel policies. We take the comments of our guests very seriously, as our goal is to always improve on meeting and exceeding expectations. Once again, thank you for staying with us, and we look forward to another chance to serve you!  Regards, Shelly

Summary: Its always a pleasure to stay here . It is within walking distance of Disneyland and always clean and neat. The staff will go out of their way to make sure your stay is a great one. We will stay again when we are in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations with our future guests. We are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you again for choosing ABVI, please feel free to contact us for any assistance you might require on your future reservation.   Regards, Shelly

Summary: cheapest room at 145 per nite for 6 people...3 double beds....one small bedroom w 1 bed no tv...2 beds with small flatscreen but channels worked. microwave and fridge, small closet  small bathroom but great water pressure and enough towels. decor was bad, needs a paint job on inside walls, stains on blanket, carpet is not vacuumed well, bathroom repairs not covered up well, cobwebs are not removed from corners. serves breakfast for free 7am to 9am...pool was kinda dirty and open 9am to 9pm...beds were firm. booked at last minute and needed a cheap room so you get what you pay for. a place to sleep and shower and head off to all of the sights to see. about a 10 minute walk to disney parks. food and stores close by. small table and two chairs in room. parking behind building.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  First, I apologize for not meeting your expectations with respect to your recent stay. We review all positive and not so positive reviews and insure all issues or concerns are handled immediately. We hope you contacted our front desk staff right away so your issues could have been addressed while still in house. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.  Regards, Shelly

Summary: This place was a good location if you are visiting Disneyland in Anaheim Ca. They really need to renovate. Rooms didn't seem to be cleaned very well either. We stayed in the mini suite that has the 3 full size beds. It worked for my family of 7 but beds were hard as rocks. Did not sleep well at all. Continental breakfast could have been better. It was just sweet donuts, coffee and orange juice.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. I sincerely apologize for the level of cleanliness in your room. Please know, I am working with our housekeeping staff to improve our cleaning procedures to ensure your experience is not repeated. Again, thank you for the comments. We would love to have another chance to provide you with a better experience in the future.  Regards, Shelly

Summary: We were just here for 2 nights during Disneyland's Mickey's Halloween Party Festivities and what a fantastic find.  As we had seen mentioned but I can absolutely verify- great location- easy level walk to Disney AND only one traffic light to cross.  Signal lights in this area can really eat up time, there is only the one at Katella and Harbor to cross :0)  And a convenient 7-11 on that corner.  15 min walk to the parks.  Our room was absolutely huge, the staff Always friendly and helpful, even the pool cleaner guy said hello.  The pastries/coffee/OJ that are free in the morning were a nice touch and very fresh, they had some apples out as well during our stay.   We had read some people disliked the pillows so we had brought our own but need not have bothered, theirs were
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of our hotel. it's great to hear that you were pleased with our great staff and our grab-and-go breakfast. I will be sure to share your kind remarks with our team. Thank you for choosing ABVI. We hope to see you again, should your travels bring you back to our area.  Regards, Shelly

Summary: I felt very taken care of.  They helped us with all our requests in regards to food, getting around and transportation to events etc.  Also felt very safe...two girls traveling alone needs that.  They hung on to our bags before and after check in so we could continue to enjoy our time in Southern California.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review on Trip Advisor and thank you for complementing our hotel facilities but most of all our dedicated employees. Once again, thank you for being our guest and sharing your positive experience of ABVI with other Trip Advisor readers.  We look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Regards, Shelly

Summary: My wife and 3 daughrers planned a trip to Disneand for the third week of September.  So it became my job to make arrangements.   I spent considerable time researching hotels within walking distance of Disneyland.  I looked at hotels with breakfast and a pool under $120/night.  Even though there were some poor reviews recently about cleanliness dirty carpets and overall "outdatedness" I hoped it would be a good fit for the girls trip.  At the last minute my wife's mother decided to come.   This made me nervous because her idea of roughing it is the Hilton.  Although the hotel was somewhat outdated it fit our needs perfectly!   It was very clean, my mother in law was pleased, daily the room was cleaned with new linens and towels.  The carpets were clean.  The breakfast was as
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your experiences of your recent stay at ABVI online and we are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help if you decide to come back. It will be our pleasure to assist you.  Regards, Shelly

Summary: You get what you pay for in most cases, in this particular case that's not the case. It was over $100 a night and not worth that amount. The room was big and bathroom was over sized. There was no closest at all just a pole on the wall mounted with a metal rack. The location for Disneyland is great because there is a shuttle just outside of hotel that takes you straight to the parks.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  First, I apologize for not meeting your expectations with respect to your recent stay. I insure all issues or concerns are handled   immediately. We will work with our housekeeping and maintenance staff to address these issues.  Regards, Shelly

Summary: Budget accommodations but with great location.  Forgot my suit in the room when I checked out and the staff worked hard to get it back home to me--much appreciated!! It's family run and the staff is really nice.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us. Once again, thank you, and we look forward to another chance to serve you!   Regards,  Shelly.

Summary: It is nothing fancy and very dated but the price is right and the location is very convenient. The staff was very helpful and pleasant, left a few bucks for the maid with a request to give a little extra attention to the bathroom, it sparkled. The bed and pillows were extremely comfortable, especially after a long day at the park. Would love to be able to afford to stay at a Disney hotel, a Sheraton or Hilton but until we hit the lottery this will suffice.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Greetings from ABVI and thank you on your encouraging and supportive review.  We always appreciate the positive comments left by the most important people in our world; our guests. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and satisfied with our hospitality.  Thank you for being our guest and thank you for sharing your positive experience of ABVI with other Trip advisor readers.  Regards,  Shelly.

Summary: We stayed here two nights on our most recent trip to Disney.  The location is good-only about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland and the price was decent for the area.  The room was clean and pretty large. It's kind of a no frills place to stay which is fine if you are only in the room for sleeping and showering. There was what looked to be a decent pool and our maid service was good for our short stay. All in all I would say we would stay there again if we got a good deal.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your comments. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help if you decide to come back. It will be our pleasure to assist you.  Thanks & Regards, Mukesh

Summary: This was my 6th time staying at this hotel, and my second time staying in 2015. We've always been a huge fan of it. The facilities have been clean, the pool area well maintained, and the staff has always been fabulous. This past visit it was like staying in a completely different hotel. Upon arrival there was empty beer bottles right outside of the pool area and an ash tray balanced on the air conditioning unit. The grounds seemed dirty and in need of some repairs.  In the past we have always brought my family with us, but this time it was just me and my finance so we stayed in a different room than usual. The room looked like it hadn't been used in months. There was black foot prints in the shower from the previous tenants and the whole room had a fine layer of dust over it. On
Manager Response: We want to thank you for your continued visit at our establishment over the past six times.  We are very sorry to hear about your unfortunate stay at our hotel.  However, if alerted to any inconvenience we would have made it our priority to make sure your stay was as comfortable as possible.  We will better our efforts in making each guest feeling as welcome and comfortable as possible.  We hope you grant us the opportunity to regain you, our valued customer.

Summary Heading: Comfy hotel & short walk to Disney Parks!
Summary: Great place to stay for our visit to Disneyland and California Adventure. Short walking distance to the parks, lots of choices to eat out nearby, swimming pool, etc. Great customer service from front desk and housekeeping! They were all very friendly and professional. Room itself was clean, but I wore flips and or socks because at this point the carpet really needs to be replaced!!! Continental breakfast was very simple, just some danishes, coffee& juice. If you want luxury this is not the place for you, but if you just need a simple, comfy place to relax after a long day at the parks I would highly recommend it here. Overall we really enjoyed our stay!!!
Manager Response: We want to thank you for visiting our small but humble establishment!  We take pride in being a small establishment in comforting every single guests request big or small.  We want to continue expanding our business to amazing customers like yourself.  We hope to see you the next time you decide to visit the Disneyland area.

Summary: Pleasant surprise! Front desk woman was very kind and welcoming. Our room on the second floor had hard wood flooring. Some negatives: my feet got a little dirty walking around barefoot, the fridge smelled a bit odd when I first opened it but nothing unbearable once it aired out, and there seemed to be a small leak under the bathroom sink. But other than that, the room and bathroom were very clean and very comfortable and perfectly suited my needs of a nice but cheap place to sleep and shower that was within walking distance of the park. Continental breakfast included danish pastries, donuts, mini muffins, coffee, orange juice, apples. Check out was a breeze. Would definitely stay here again. :)
Manager Response: Dear Guest Thank you for your comments. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in Anaheim.  Mukesh

Summary: My fiance and I chose to stay at this hotel for my 21st a couple month ago. We chose it due to the closeness to Disney and from the wonderful reviews it had... Unfortunately, our stay was nothing short of mediocre and at times, just plain gross. The first night in the room, as I was preparing for bed, I sat down with my feet up and my fiance goes "Your feet are so dirty!" I was confused, having had been in socks all day. I then wiped my hand against the carpet and it was DARK BLACK! The carpet clearly hadn't been cleaned in MONTHS. I was so appalled. Aside from that, the shutters were broken, the bath tub clogged during every shower and we were not informed that the WiFi password changes DAILY, so every morning we had to go ask what it was.. This is not a place I would ever stay
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I would like to personally apologize for unfortunate incidences that you experienced during your stay with us. We continually try to do our very best for all of our guests, but unfortunately, sometimes we do fail.  I will look into issue that you have noted & will correct. We take the comments of our guests very seriously, as our goal is to always improve on meeting and exceeding expectations.  Once again, thank you for staying with us, and we look forward to another chance to serve you!  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwa

Summary: We stayed at this hotel during our last trip to disneyland.  I was not so sure about this hotel when we first pulled up and parked and checked in.  even my husband gave me the "look" like he wasn't sure either.  we were pleasantly suprised.  The room was not big, but was just fine, since we were literally at disneyland from 8 am until midnight.  The carpets were torn up and my feet did get dirty walking on the carpet, but it did not bother us in the least.    the best part of the stay was how amazing the housekeeping was.  I cant attest to how the blankets and sheets looked, because i take my own large blanket and lay it over the bed and use all my own blankets and pillows (my ocd, i can't help it!), but i was amazed at how great the housekeeping was.  they folded all my
Manager Response: Dear Guests,   Greetings from ABVI and thank you on your encouraging and supportive review.  We always appreciate the positive comments left by the most important people in our world; our guests. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and satisfied with our hospitality. Thank you for being our guest and thank you for sharing your positive experience of ABVI with other Trip advisor readers.  Best Regards, Mukesh

Summary: The guy at the front desk was friendly and helpful, but the whole place stunk. The room smelled like it had mildewed and they had attempted to clean it with cheap cleaner. The bed was like sleeping on a brick and the bathroom looked like it was designed in the 70s and hadn't been well cared for since. Overall, the moniker "seedy motel" seems to capture the essence of this place aptly.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to make us aware of your experience at America's Best Value Inn and Suites. I offer you my sincerest apology.  I will be addressing your reported issue.  Best Regards, Mukesh

Summary: This is my second time staying at this hotel with my kids and it was wonderful experience again. We bought the Disney ticket at the front desk with a discount rate and we enjoyed every bit of it. The rooms were great and clean. My kids sure enjoyed the pool during our stay. The front desk people are very nice and kind. We are definitely coming back for our next vacation! Thank you again for making our trip memorable and most wonderful.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay. We are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. It makes all our efforts worthwhile when our guest leaves ABVI with good memories. We look forward to greeting you again!   Best Regards, Mukesh

Summary Heading: A disgusting, filthy mess. Check out my pics.
Summary: Clean, spacious rooms? Hardwood floors? How is this the same hotel from the reviews?  I thought I lucked out when I got this place for $89 a night through TripAdvisor's rates. It's got a 4-star rating here and is near the top 20-rated hotels in Anaheim. I know it's a budget motel, but all I expected and asked for is a clean, simple room. I got the opposite of that.  I'll try to keep it short and let the pictures do the talking. Here's what was wrong: - Dirty, moldy shower. - Dirty, swampy floors.  - Dirty walls. It looked like a tire-stained curbside. - ROACHES. We saw the first small roach within minutes of walking in. We saw at least five while there. - Torn shower curtains. - Pillows are like boulders. It was so hard I just folded up my sheet and used that as a pillow each
Manager Response: Dear Guest  First, I apologize for not meeting your expectations with respect to your recent stay. We review all positive and not so positive reviews and insure all issues or concerns are handled immediately. We hope you contacted our front desk staff right away so your issues could have been addressed while still in house. We are very disappointed to hear about the condition of your room. We will work with our housekeeping and maintenance staff to address these issues.  Best Regards, Mukesh

Summary Heading: Cheap, decent and close to Disneyland
Summary: The top thing going for this hotel is its price considering the proximity to Disneyland. We booked about 5 months in advance through Hostelbookers and when we checked in were told we paid less than half then the current rate.   We used our room for approximately 6hrs to sleep after Disneyland and I was really pleased at how clean and decent our room was. They have free wifi which worked perfectly and some breakfast is included although we left too early to see what they had to offer. Other positives were the free parking and 24hr reception.  The only negative is the air conditioning is sooooooo loud. I couldn't sleep with it on despite the heat.  There isn't anything fancy or luxurious about this place but if you're looking for a place to sleep, I'd highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations with our future guests. We are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you again for choosing ABVI, please feel free to contact us for any assistance you might require on your future reservation.   Best Regards, Mukesh

Summary: The room was large 3 beds and an extra bedroom.  no couch or comfortable chairs. The beds were clean and changed daily. Breakfast was fresh pastries and muffins .The pool was clean. Pricey ? yes ! but so was everything else around, including Disneyland . That's Anaheim. Book early to get a better choice
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on your future stays in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Mukesh

Summary: This was a last minute booking not on my part unfortunately.  The price was insane for the amenities, and I am so glad I read reviews prior- no blood stains for us fortunately.  But the room had such strong fumes from cleaning supplies!  There were structural cracks and lawn furniture in place of real furniture!  I have learned to book my trip early for next year to skip having to stay at a hotel like this or others similar.  Also, there were no fans in the bathroom, and if you opened the bathroom window, the neighboring hotel occupants could see right into the bathroom!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  First, I apologize for not meeting your expectations with respect to your recent stay. It disappoints me to hear comments like this, after the time, efforts and expense that we have invested in our people and property. We continually try to do our very best for all of our guests, but unfortunately, sometimes we do fail.  We are a very nice and well operated INN located near the most popular local attractions; offered at very affordable room rates. We always try to make our guest happy when they leave our hotel.   I will look into each issue that you have noted, in an attempt to improve the quality of stay at our hotel for our future guest.  Best Regards, Mukesh

Summary: We stayed here three nights to go to Disneyland.  The front staff was friendly and checkin was easy.  The room was much larger and nicer than I expected. Nice hardwood floors and spacious. The beds were a bit on the hard side, bit comfortable and we got a good nights rest.  The continental breakfast was just the average muffins, donuts, etc....nothing special.  It was about a 12 minute walk to the park.  There are several nice restaurants nearby such as Bubba Gump, Cheesecake Factory and PF changs, as well as pizza, etc.  We would certainly recommend it and would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guests,   Thank you for sharing your experiences of your recent stay at ABVI online and we are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help if you decide to come back. It will be our pleasure to assist you.  Best Regards, Mukesh

Summary: Close to Disneyland.  Room was clean staff very friendly. Good place to stay to lay your head.  Who really stays at the hotel when going to the parks,  Right.  Restaurants close by.  If you have two cars there is a parking garage yards away. We will most likely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on your future stays in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Mukesh

Summary: This hotel is located in the perfect area for traveling. If you decide to walk around there's so many restaurants to chose from and a CVS. Downtown disney is a 5 min drive away and you can park for free up to 3 hours in the designated lot.   The room is clean and spacious. The staff is very welcoming and friendly. The guy at the front desk allowed us to check in early which was very nice of him.  The price for the room is cheap especially for everything you have nearby. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone who's looking for a clean, inexpensive spot to stay at for traveling.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay. We are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. It makes all our efforts worthwhile when our guests leave ABVI with good memories. We look forward to greeting you again!  Best Regards,  Mukesh

Summary Heading: A Great place to stay for Disney fun!
Summary: We stayed June 27th-July 1st 2015. First of all when we go to Disneyland we always stay right across the street....but this trip was a very last minute planned one so our normal go to hotels were either booked or super expensive. I searched TripAdvisor for the closes one and a good rate for our trip and America Best Value came up. So I decided to just go with it. On the day of arrival check in was great, staff was friendly and patient with me and ALL my questions about bus passes and such. The rooms for the bigger families was huge! If you want Marriott or Hyatt or any other fancy style hotel than stay at those ones.....but if you are looking for clean and comfy beds and a reasonable price for Summer Disneyland fun then this is a great place! I also would say that the walk to

It makes all our efforts worthwhile when our guest leaves ABVI with such fantastic memories. We look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help if you decide to come back. It will be our pleasure to assist you.  Best Regards, Mukesh

Summary: To be upfront, I normally don't stay in this type of hotel so my views might differ than those that do. We chose to give this place a chance based off the reviews.  The service is good and the front staff was kind. I didn't have any interactions outside of check-in and check-out. My stay was 2 nights with the purpose of visiting to go to The Happiest Place on Earth :)   I purchased my 3 day Disneyland tickets through them at a discount with no problems.  Cons: Dirty. The carpet was disgustingly dirty. I wore socks while in the room and noticed the bottom of my feet were dirtier than they should have been, then my wife checked the bottom of her feet after just getting out of the shower and they were covered in dirt from walking barefoot on the carpet. The room was dated and
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make us aware of your experience at America's Best Value Inn and Suites. I offer you my sincerest apology.  I will be addressing your reported issue with our housekeeping staff.  Best Regards, Mukesh

Summary: Friendly service in a fabulous location for a Disney visit. The rooms are large - we had a separate bedroom in ours for the second bed; and the beds were comfortable. The rooms are slightly dated (and there was no safe in the room) [but we gave valuables to the front desk staff] but was great value and very clean. There is a pool but we did not use it. There are a number of good eating choices nearby (2 minute walk) for dinner. Would definitely recommend it as a place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us. Once again, thank you, and we look forward to serve you again!   Best Regards, Mukesh

Summary: In Anaheim, I've stayed at: the Sheraton, the Disneyland Hotel, Motel 6, Del Sol Inn, Holiday Inn Express and the Candy Cane Inn. America's Best Value Inn is my motel of choice for this area for the price point! Sure, if cost wasn't in the mix when making a decision of where to stay, the Disneyland Hotel would be where I'd stay. But...that's 3 to 4 times as much as America's Best Value Inn!!!   America's Best Value Inn is obviously an older property, but impeccably maintained. If feels as if the grounds are cleaned daily in addition to the rooms of course. This place isn't fancy, but it has it where it counts! Great pool and spa area. Close to Disneyland. Large rooms, flat screen TV, mini refrigerator, microwave, iron, ironing board, hair dryer, etc. It has all the basics for a

We look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help if you decide to come back. It will be our pleasure to assist you.  Best Regards, Mukesh

Summary Heading: Great accommodation for an affordable price
Summary: We stayed here two nights so we could be close to Disneyland. The front desk were very lovely and extremely helpful. It was a basic room but was all we needed. We had a car with us and there was ample parking, staying here was a breeze.   Would recommend to anyone looking for affordable and easy accommodation in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations with our future guests. We are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you again for choosing ABVI, please feel free to contact us for any assistance you might require on your future reservation.  Best Regards, Mukesh

Summary: The hotel was in poor repair and felt dingy.  The water pressure was very low and when the toilet backed up and we called for service, it took 7 hours (and a repeat call) to get it fixed.  The "breakfast" was bad coffee, orange juice, donuts/cupcakes/Danish and apples/bananas.  The front line staff spoke very little English and were not very nice.  Do yourself a favour and stay somewhere else.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make us aware of your experience at America's Best Value Inn and Suites. Providing for your total satisfaction, from the moment you arrive to the moment you depart, is my staff's primary duty. Hearing that we failed in your case is truly disheartening, and for that, I offer you my sincerest apology.  I will be addressing your reported issue with our maintenance staff and coach them on the importance of responding to guest requests in a timely manner.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Great for families on a budget
Summary: This hotel is great for families on a budget. Most importantly it is a 15 minute walk to the Disneyland main gate. The rooms and grounds are showing their age. Our room was a suite which had a good amount of space and a seating area. The bathrooms are really in need of an update but are still serviceable. There was a breakfast but it was fruit and some muffins and donuts. The staff was very friendly. If you are just looking for a place to sleep, this hotel does a great job!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for sharing your positive comments. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: My family and I traveled down to Anaheim last weekend to go to Disneyland for my brother's show choir performance in the Heritage Festival. My boyfriend and I were on our own for transporting ourselves down there and lodging. We decided it best to go with a CHEAPER hotel, because you spend so much at Disney, and are hardly there anyway!  This was the best decision!!  The staff at this hotel were REMARKABLE in their hospitality. They allowed us to hold our luggage behind the front desk after checkout, so we could go to Disney and come back to go to the airport. I doubt very many larger hotels allow this. I'm pretty sure they were family run, so they were very friendly and always wished you off a good day, and asked how your day was when you came back.   The hotel was a 10-15
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Thank you for your recent review on Tripadvisor and thank you for complementing our hotel facilities but most of all our dedicated employees. Once again, Thank you for being our guest and sharing your positive experience of ABVI with other Tripadvisor readers  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: The hotel is okay to stay if you want something cheap,is 13min. Walking to Disney land there are a lot of restaurants around and the Disney parking lot is 3min. Away if you are planning to park there,  the hotel offers breakfast from 7-10am and is only coffee and donuts, we don't have preference for hotels all we want is a room to sleep because most of the day we at Disney park. Is up to you to book at this place come and judge it yourself.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: My husband and I came into town for 10 days, 4 days at Disneyland and 4 days at Star Wars Celebration (with two travel days tacked on). This hotel fit everything we needed! Close enough to walk to Disneyland (though by day 3 of 12 hours at the parks, we took the very reasonable $5 round trip bus!), 10 minute walk to the Convention Center, a CVS on the corner, 7-11, and Gardenwalk with many restaurant options all within walking distance!  We decided to rent a car, and parking was free, which was great!   The staff was amazing, breakfast was simple but good to get us out the door (or lounge in our rooms for a bit).   And it turned out to be a saving grace -- I ended up in the ER with a horrible virus, and had to extend our stay by 4 days until I was clear to fly back to New York.

Summary: Was in town for Star Wars Celebration at the convention center and also a visit to Disneyland. The hotel was much more reasonably priced than the convention offerings, with much larger rooms. I don't normally stay at budget properties, but due to the price, location, and room size (2 double beds plus second small bedroom with double bed), and the great trip advisor reviews, we decided to take a chance. The hotel is older but extremely clean and well maintained. Small refrigerator and microwave in room. The staff was friendly, hospitable and low key. Has a beautifully maintained and spotless courtyard area with pool and Jacuzzi. Safe location in the tourist area. View of Disney fireworks from hotel courtyard. Easy walk to convention center, mall, restaurants, cvs, 7-11, & about
Manager Response: Dear Guest, My sincere thanks for taking the time to write a review of our property. Your positive comments are very much appreciated by our staff, who work hard each day to make sure valued customers like yourself, are looked after.  Thank you for being our guest and thank you for sharing your positive experience of ABVI with other Trip advisor readers. Best Regards, Mukesh

Summary Heading: A great place to stay, with a great price
Summary: I was searching for a spot for me and my friends/family to stay when in Anaheim last week. I was excited to find ABVI on Katella. The price was great and the location was ideal - close to both Disneyland and the Convention Center (which we were at for Star Wars Celebration). The room was spacious enough, and we were able to use the pool/hot tub to relax when we were out seeing the sights of Anaheim and Los Angeles. The breakfast was okay, though mostly just pastries. It was good enough for a quick bite in the morning. And although the hotel is a bit on the older side, it was well maintained and clean. We had a great time here and you can't beat the price or the location of this hotel. I'd definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a spot to stay in Anaheim and doesn't want to
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words. We take the comments of our guests very seriously, as our goal is to always improve on meeting and exceeding expectations. We look forward to being of service to you in the future, and on behalf of our team here is ABVI..... Thank you! Best Regards, Mukesh

Summary: We needed a place close to the convention center with free parking and a good price.  This place is it!!!  5 minute walk to the convention center!  I booked early and got a discount.  The room was large, beds comfortable, everything very clean. The mini fridge and microwave were a bonus!  There's a 7-Eleven and a CVS on the corner.  We were able to save money on food/snacks this way. The staff is so friendly and helpful.  I had my 4 kids with me and we loved staying here.  I highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We always appreciate the positive comments left by the most important people in our world; our guests. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Best Regards, Mukesh

Summary Heading: Well equiped hotel for a couple of days stay
Summary: Room was great, so spacious with fridge, microwave, iron and board, bath, coffee machine, TV, 2 large beds. What more could we ask for?  I was finally able to iron some wrinkled clothes that didn't like being in the suitcase for so long!  We were able to heat some delicious dinners in the microwave and keep fresh milk and soft drinks. Saved us money and the stress of trying to find a good place to eat! Being able to walk to Disneyland was a huge plus. No worries about trying to find a carpark. The place was clean, the staff very helpful and friendly. Had a spa and a pool which we didn't use but plenty did.  I have no hesitations in recommending this hotel.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay, 10 minute walk from park!
Summary: This hotel was great. Normally I stay a little bit closer to the park entrance, but this place was nice - just the basics, the wifi worked well for us, we took a ten minute walk to the park and downtown Disney for two nights. Might be a bit of a long walk if you're going to the park over multiple days, but it's fine for just a day or two!  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on your future stays in Anaheim.  Best Regards,  Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: idela place to visit Disney land
Summary: The hotel is conveniently located near Disneyland. The room was clean, the equipment a bit older and could be renovated.The staff was very nice and helping. No mold in the bathroom. The hotel proposed a small swimming pool and a jacusy. we felt a family atmosphere inside patio.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations with our future guests. We are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you again for choosing ABVI, please feel free to contact us for any assistance you might require on your future reservation.   Best Regards,  Mukesh Silwal

Summary: I read all the reviews before our trip to Anaheim and have always had good luck with following the advice of Travel Advisor posts.  In this case I was so disappointed.  Why do patrons give this cheap motel 4 plus stars?    In this case, if you want to pay less money and don't care about the room being stinky and dirty then know you get what you pay for.   I wish I had paid the extra money to stay at a nicer, cleaner, more comfortable place.    The picture of the rooms on-line are deceiving because the walls are painted nice colors and the bed looks fine. What you aren't show is the nasty carpet that is at least 20 years old.  You also don't see that the bathroom have never been updated and has mold.  The sheets on my children's bed had cigarette burns on them which had been

Summary: My husband and I took our three year old son to Disneyland for his first visit. I booked this motel mainly for the price, and somewhat close location to the park. I assumed I'd be dishing out all my money for toys and stuff and didn't want to spend a lot on the room. We stayed here three nights and it was fine. Clean rooms, friendly staff, and about a ten minute walk (with a stroller) to the park. The only real negative I noticed was the chipped paint on the bathroom door. The room was small, but since we were literally at the park for the whole day except for his 1 hour nap, it served it's purpose. The next time we visit Disneyland, I most likely will shell out the extra money for a hotel right across the street because by the end of our second day at the park, that ten minute
Manager Response: Dear Guests, Thank you for sharing your experiences of your recent stay at ABVI with future guests.  We look forward to another opportunity to host you at our property, and once again, thank you for your positive comments. Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Like most people going to Disneyland, we just needed a place to crash after a long day at the park...  And we booked this based on price, location, and so many good reviews (which I CANNOT believe that people found this facility "okay to stay in")!  Let me start with the PROS:  Since we had a reservation at this facility, we were able to park our car there and head to Disneyland earlier in the morning.  We arrived at 10:00 (obviously before 2 pm check in) and the staff gave us a parking permit.  Very easy and convenient!  The only other pro was the close proximity to the park....great location!  Now here's the CONS:  Room 202 was horrendous!!!  Room smelled musty/dank/mildewy.  Beds were awful....hard as a rock thus a horrible nights sleep.  There is mold in the bathroom on the

Summary Heading: Perfect holiday suites in every way
Summary: These suites are perfect they are kept extremely clean very welcoming excellent value for money and super helpful staff in a perfect location for theme parks and disney. Rooms have everything needed. Would definitely return here.

Summary Heading: Effort and staff are amazing. Rooms still need work.
Summary: We stayed here for two nights after we decided against staying at the Pepper Tree resort. The inn is centrally located in the very busy resort area near Disneyland. It's so close you can see the Tower of Terror from the back parking lot. It's steps away from a strip of restaurants, including Subway, and the popular Gardenwalk.   The staff is great. It's a family-owned motel, and they make sure the grounds are cleaned and well-maintained, including the pool courtyard. In fact, when we got there, the owners were working to fix the pool area and repair a bathroom door in one of the other rooms.  We were in a junior suite for our stay. It included two queen beds in the main room and a third in a small separate room. A small refrigerator and microwave are in the closet alcove next to
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay. We are continually upgrading and improving our amenities and services at the hotel, and recently replaced all of our televisions to flat screen versions. Once again, I thank you for your comments, you have noted that our staff is great and trying there best to make this place better. I will make sure that these comments reach to our hardworking staff members, who work hard every day to ensure a positive guest experience. We look forward to being of service to you in the future, and on behalf of our ABVI team ..Thank you! Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We booked brough hostel bookers - the name of the hotel and contact numbers appearing on the booking were incorrect - but the address was correct..  We checked in late to this hotel, and the two guys at the counter were fantastic, we peppered them with questions and they were only too happy to answer. Breakfast provided was sweet pastries OJ, Coffee & Tea. There was a Subway, two 7/11s, CVS, other huge eateries, and a car hire place within 5min walk. On our check out, the staff were accommodating of all our needs, let us hang around the place until we were sorted, Exhausted our needs of the wifi & chatted to us with anything they could to help. Excellent customer service and location - room was beautifully cleaned & exactly what we needed for our stay with big days coming home
Manager Response: Dear Guests, Greetings from ABVI and thank you sincerely on your marvelous review. Thank you for being our guest and thank you for sharing your positive experience of ABVI with other Trip advisor readers. We hope we will have the pleasure of greeting you again in your next trip to California.   Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Good location, Value for money and very helpful staff ..I was travelling solo and always felt safe staying at this hotel. There were plenty of places to eat in the area and bus stops were nearby to make it very easy to get around. I would stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay. We are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. It makes all our efforts worthwhile when our guest leave ABVI with good memories. We look forward to greeting you again!  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 1 night. It's a nice little hotel. Nice and quite in a good neighborhood. Friendly staff. Clean pool and hot tub. Save your money and walk to disneyland it's just a 10 minute walk! We'll be staying here again when we visit disney.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us. Once again, thank you, and we look forward to another chance to serve you!  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Best hotel for your money in California!
Summary: This was a last minute trip we took from Tx to Cali and this was the cutest hotel we've stayed at in Anaheim. We frequently go to Disneyland and we will no longer stay at any other hotel when we go now! We were within walking distance to Disneyland and nice restaurants as well, therefore our car sat parked for 4 days! The people that ran the hotel were very welcoming and helpful and the rooms were perfect for all four of us. I loved the cleanliness and how quiet the property was. We can't wait to return!
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Greetings from ABVI and thank you on your encouraging and supportive review.  We always appreciate the positive comments left by the most important people in our world; our guests. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and satisfied with our hospitality. Thank you for being our guest and thank you for sharing your positive experience of ABVI with other Trip advisor readers. Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Clean, Simple Room at Great Location
Summary: We stayed early March for 4 nights just before school spring break.  The hotel is in good shape, and simple.  Only 15min walk to the entrance to Disneyland We stayed at the end of the hallway and it was quiet.  This room had a king bed with a separate double bed in another room.  They provided a small fridge.  The room and bed were very clean.  We were very satisfied with the accommodation.  Breakfast which is included was very bleak.  Only juice, coffee, mini muffin, danish, and apple.  We had hoped for cereal and milk. Overall we are happy with our stay, and consider it a good value.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations with our future guests. We are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you again for choosing ABVI, please feel free to contact us for any assistance you might require on your future reservation.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We stayed in a family suite which was perfect for our family. We stayed for 6 nights and utilised the microwave and fridge everyday. It was a good size room and very affordable.   We loved the easy grab and go breakfast, simple and easy. Perfect for us.   The staff were fantastic very friendly and helpful. Always ready to help us out, book taxis etc.   The location was good a short stroll to Disneyland. We had a view of the nightly fireworks.  Pool and spa were great too.  Would recommend to anyone as a family friendly and affordable accommodation.
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Greetings from ABVI and thank you sincerely on your marvelous review. We have read your review with the greatest of pleasure and pride. Summary: I been coming to this hotel for about 10years now.They improve more for every year I always get the same room this year the floor was changed to more Europeian style not the old carpet any more.Very clean and nice.It is not to big so you get friends with the owner and the staff very qvick.They have nice pool and jacussi in the center of the hotel.It is always sad to leave but coming back in October again.If you like Disney it is 10minutes walk. best regards Stefan(Sweden)

Thank you for being our guest and thank you for sharing your positive experience of ABVI with other Trip advisor readers.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Close to the convention center, wonderful friendly staff and clean rooms.  The hot tub and pool felt amazing at the end of a long day.    Their staff is always willing to go above and beyond. It seems hard to find a hotel down to earth and convenient in this section of town, but they certainty accomplished it.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: I was a little leary when I booked this hotel. Most ABV hotels we've ever seen or looked at are pretty bad. We decided to stay at this hotel based on the reviews on Tripadvisor and the price. We were going to be in the area for close to 2 weeks, so we couldn't really afford to stay at the more expensive hotels for too long.  It was nice that the room had two separate rooms along with a fridge and microwave. The pool was a little chilly (by our standards, but not really by hotel standards), the hot tub was nice though.  The room could use a little work to it. You could tell it had been painted not that long ago, but they didn't seem to remove the fixtures or even tape around them (we've seem that in a lot of hotels, not just this one, trying to do it cheap and quickly). The
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review. We take the comments of our guests very seriously, as our goal is to always improve on meeting and exceeding expectations. We have invested time and resources into improving our property, and we are not finished yet. I apologize for the carpet issues that you had, and the Internet services. We have already contacted our wireless internet supplier to thoroughly check our system, and to correct any issues should they be present. Thank you again for giving us valuable feedback and we really appreciate you recommend our hotels to our future guest.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: I won't believe the ranking anymore.
Summary: The high ranking (#9 last month, 11 this month) of this place was a major factor my wife kept reminding me to choose it for family vacation. It was a mistake. For your own good, don't believe the ranking.  This place is ok as a plain vanilla low-end motel. Carpet had some unpleasant smell, floor whippy, walls not able to block noise from adjacent rooms, heater abnormally noisy, tape water misty, cheap quality coffee maker, dirty-looking iron board cover, chairs of dirty-looking cushions, towels felt like rug. Pillows were not comfortable though bedsheets look clean.   Hot breakfast mentioned in the information was untrue. Just simple orange juice, coffee, tea and some stale Danish, muffins and donuts placed in the tiny space in front of front desk.  Another real disappointment
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  First, I apologize for not meeting your expectations with respect to your recent stay. It disappoints me to hear comments like this, after the time, efforts and expense that we have invested in our people and property.
