We continually try to do our very best for all of our guests, but unfortunately, sometimes we do fail. We are very realistic about our product and we never advertise about hot breakfast but we do offer continental breakfast in the hotel lobby making it more effective for our front desk staff to monitor and restock. We are a very nice and well operated INN located near the most popular local attractions; offered at very affordable room rates. We always try to make our guest happy when they leave our hotel. We provide them early check inn if possible and even store there luggage in the front desk for longer period time.  I will look into each issue that you have noted, in an attempt to improve the quality of stay at our hotel for our future guest.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Stayed 4 nights to visit the Disneyland & Disney's California Adventure parks. Good location, easy walk to good restaurants (Cheesecake Factory was 2mins walk & fabulous), and much much cheaper than many of the hotels around. It's a 15-20min walk to Disneyland, but it is actually just one massive block.  We got a room for well under $100 per night, it was very clean with daily servicing (housekeeping did a great job- even folded the towels up nicely) and the front desk staff were friendly & helpful. There is included coffee & croissants for breakfast, but with an IHOP and a Denny's on the way to DL, we didn't need it. The rooms are basic, but had everything we needed. The only thing we missed was a box of tissues (it being cold/flu season!)  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, My sincere thanks for taking the time to write a review of our property. Your positive comments are very much appreciated by our staff, who work hard each day to make sure valued customers like yourself, are looked after.  I look forward to having another opportunity to have you as our guest! Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: I enjoyed my stay very much! The service was great. The rooms were nice and clean. Super comfy beds!!! The shower was s uhh per clean and felt so good! The pool was a great place to hang with friends. Absolutely loved the sauna!! It felt so good and relaxing! The environment was great and it was so nice to get away from home.
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Thank you for sharing your experiences of your recent stay at ABVI online and we are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help if you decide to come back. It will be our pleasure to assist you. Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Clean, inexpensive, and close to Disneyland!
Summary: This is the perfect place to stay when visiting Disneyland. Our family of 4 stayed in a mini suite (king bed in the main room and a side room with a double bed).  It was comfortable, clean, and spacious.  We appreciated having a refrigerator and microwave in the room.   This motel is a short distance from Disneyland, so once we parked at the motel we could leave our car and walk to Disneyland and California Adventure.  We bought our park tickets at the front desk, which was very convenient. The owners are friendly, kind, and helpful.   We will definitely stay here any time we visit Disneyland in the future!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on your future stays in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Before staying here in October of 2014, I did a REALLY thorough research of all the hotels surrounding Disneyland . I've stayed at around 10 hotels in the area over the years, ranging from the Grand Californian to some sketchier motels - all have their pros and cons. This time I was specifically looking for something with two rooms since I have two kids who are no longer babies and I'd prefer they had their own space (and have MY own space - haha!).   The ONLY con to this place, for me anyway, was the walk. The kids were 7 and 5 at the time. We opted to bring the double stroller, even though they're big enough to walk, I figured we'd mostly use it to hold all our water, snacks, jackets, etc., and it might be used by the kiddos at the end of a long day on the walk home. The walk
Manager Response: Dear Guests, Greetings from ABVI and Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations with our future guests. We have read your review with the greatest of pleasure and pride. It makes all our efforts worthwhile when our guest leave ABVI with such fantastic memories. We look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help if you decide to come back. It will be our pleasure to assist you. Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: This is a reasonably priced simple clean and comfortable place to stay.  The staff were really helpful, the walk to Disneyland was not too long, there were fast-food outlets very close by that were quite adequate. The room was clean and comfortable, very comfortable bed.  I thought this was all we needed and was very happy to have stayed here.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for sharing your positive comments. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in Anaheim. Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Just to clarify from the start, I judge a motel/hotel for what it is. I rate a Hilton Hotel against other Hiltons. I rate budget motels against other budget motels. For a budget motel, this did the trick and then some!   This is what makes a great stay for me: clean, fast WiFi, friendly staff and a hot tub. Ding, ding, ding! America's Best Value Inn in Anaheim wins! The rooms were clean. I even noticed that the interior of the microwave looked freshly scrubbed. The WiFi is fast - how do you think I'm writing this review right now? The staff was very friendly. (Seems like it's run by a family.) And the hot tub was nice!  The extras: Micro and fridge in the room. Love it! Flat Screen TV - didn't use since I streamed movies on my Macbook. Pool looked nice, though I didn't indulge.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words and thank you for sharing your positive experience of ABVI with other Trip advisor readers. We have also noted your kind comments on items we have to improve on and on which we can certainly do better.  We look forward to being of service to you in the future, and on behalf of our team here is ABVI..... Thank you! Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: The price for the room was very reasonable.  The location is within walking distance to Disney so you can save on parking.  The staff was very friendly which made the stay all the     more pleasant.  I will stay here again on my next visit to the area for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, I appreciate your comments regarding your recent stay. Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future. Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for - and that's not a bad thing.
Summary: We had a family meetup at Disneyland and 4 parties rented rooms at the Americas Best Value Inn & Suites, so I saw multiple rooms on the property. I base the majority my ratings on 3 things: clean (mostly), not horrible neighborhood (it's near Disneyland, this isn't tough), and reasonably priced (yes). The good: The staff was great. The gentleman on duty was very helpful - when we checked in he showed us a map of the area, circled certain things that might be helpful (CVS, inexpensive gas, restaurant clusters). He was helpful at getting the shuttle that goes to and from Disneyland ($5.00 per person, per day - to and from the resort). He was always right on the ball with everything we asked.  Wifi was free and had all of us had decent reception. The walk to and from the resort if
Manager Response: Dear Guests, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations with our future guests. We take the comments of our guests very seriously, as our goal is to always improve on meeting and exceeding expectations. It is based on this feedback, that we are able to deal with issues as well as pass along appreciation to our hard working dedicated staff members. Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future. Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Definitely the best value hotel near Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here for two nights at the end of November 2014 and had a very pleasant stay! The hotel is only a 5 minute walk from Disneyland and everything you might need is just a short walk away. The room was spacious and very clean and we had no problems using the wifi. The room also had a television, a microwave, coffee maker and fridge. Because we arrived at 9:00am, we weren't able to check-in immediately, but the friendly lady at the front desk allowed us to leave our luggage behind the counter while we went to Disneyland and they got our room ready for check-in at 12pm. Overall, we had a very positive experience at this hotel and in Anaheim! Would recommend to anyone looking for budget accommodation that does not disappoint!
Manager Response: Dear Guests, Great review! - and thank you for it and for pointing your positive experiences of our facilities and services. We have read your review with the greatest of pleasure and pride. It makes all our efforts worthwhile when our guest leave ABVI with such fantastic memories. We look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help if you decide to come back. It will be our pleasure to assist you. Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Great older style hotel in Anaheim.  When we stay in Anaheim its all about the location and how far the walk is to Disneyland. This is a super easy 15 minute walk door to door. There are also 100's of spots to eat in-between. The hotel is absolutely fine. We had a King Room which had plenty of space and a big bathroom.  I did ask for an additional pillow which the staff were happy to provide and it was free Wi-Fi. There was also a fridge and microwave. Definitely no issue with cleanliness or safety. Plenty of free onsite parking. Check in staff were efficient and helpful and there was a small continental breakfast. Good location and good value. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your comments, we really appreicate that you took time to give us valuable feedback and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in Anaheim. Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Americas Best Value is Disneyland's Greatest Value
Summary: The room was extra big and the staff extra accommodating so it was a huge value for the price itself alone, then you add the prime location, free parking, and just a short walk to the park and it absolutely has got to be the best bargain in town. No real problems to report, the room was very clean, comfortable and quiet. I have no reason not to give it a 5-rating and more importantly make it my go-to next time I bring the family to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, “Superb” review. Thanks and million! We are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. We always appreciate the positive comments left by the most important people in our world; our guests. Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future. Yours in Hospitality, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: My review is overdue, we stayed in June of 2014 in one of the suites. The staff on check in were very kind and welcoming.  For the price it was a wonderful deal - nothing extravagant, but was a good place to crash after a long day at the parks.   The room was clean and very spacious. We had plenty of room for luggage, strollers, etc. It was a 10-15 min walk to the parks with kiddos (age 4 & 5) riding in strollers.  I would definitely recommend this property.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Greetings from ABVI and thank you sincerely on your marvelous review. We have read your review with the greatest of pleasure and pride. It makes all our efforts worthwhile when our guest leave ABVI with such fantastic memories.  We look forward to being of service to you in the future, and on behalf of our team..... Thank you! Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Clean affordable and scant on extras, pleasant courteous staff
Summary: Was surprised at the roominess of upstairs mini suite.  Appears to have been recently refurbed (newer TV, mini fridge with no freezer but cold enough to ice the leftovers, double pane windows and fat louvers on shutters) and outlets paired high on the walls) Second bedroom has enough space to walk on all sides of the double bed and has it's own window and air conditioning unit (but no heater) so for kids or folks with minimal luggage that's fine. No closet or dresser for it Bring hangers. We only had 3  Wifi was almost useless.  Most of the time our sprint iPhones could not work the web even with our own data . Our friend with a Verizon android could use her own data fwiw  No Kleenex. Bring your own. Continental breakfast is served in the minuscule lobby off of a 4 foot counter
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words. We take the comments of our guests very seriously, as our goal is to always improve on meeting and exceeding expectations. I apologize about the internet issue you had it might be some small issues which has already been fixed. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in Anaheim. Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Wonderful experience from start to finish!
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for the first time the first week in December for a Disneyland/anniversary trip.  We were checked in quickly and efficiently by the manager of the hotel, he was very friendly and helpful.  The room was clean and spacious.  By the next morning, we realized that our refrigerator wasn't working properly, so we called the front desk and they said they would have someone come and take a look at it.  By the end of the day when we got back from Disneyland, we had a brand new refrigerator in place of the old one.  My husband is an insulin dependent diabetic and so he carries his insulin in a case with an ice pack.  The manager was nice enough to let us refreeze my husband's ice pack in their freezer for the trip home!  Throughout our stay, we were always greeted
Manager Response: Dear Guests, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations with our future guests. We are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. We have also noted your kind comments on items we have to improve on and on which we can certainly do better. Thank you for being our guest and thank you for sharing your positive experience. Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Not only was our vacation at Disneyland great but our stay at Americas Best Value Inn, Anaheim was simply terrific. The hotel is on walking distance from the entrance of Disneyland. The rooms are comfortable and clean. The entire staff is very customer oriented and provides GREAT SERIVICE TO ALL. I would recommend this place to my family and friends for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Guests, Thank you for sharing your experiences of your recent stay at ABVI in Anaheim and thank you for rating our hotel so highly. We have read your review with the greatest of pleasure and pride. It makes all our efforts worthwhile when our guest leave ABVI with such fantastic memories. We look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help if you decide to come back. It will be our pleasure to assist you. Yours sincerely, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: It was one of the best family vacation we've experienced at this Valve Inn. We stayed for 5 days at this hotel for our Disney trip. We are from Florida and usually go to Orlando, Florida for Disney parks but this year kids wanted to go to Anaheim, CA for Disneyland. It was a wonderful experience and we enjoyed every bit of our stay. Restaurants and Shopping were at the walking distance. Rooms were very clean and comfortable. We received a great service during our stay. Our kids enjoyed swimming and especially jacuzzi. We had a family suite that is attached within the inner door so we as a family we had a good space in the room. Fridge and Microwave was very convenient. Kids had so much fun playing outside and not getting bored during our stay. Breakfast was free and excellent.
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  “Superb” review. Thanks and million! We are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. It makes all our hard work and effort worthwhile and sincere thank you on your kind words. We hope we will have the pleasure of greeting you again. Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: This was one of the best vacations I have had and alot of it was due to the accommodations.  The staff here was excellent in attending to our needs.  They were very informative about the area and attractions.  The breakfast was simple and a great way to start the day before going to Disneyland.  The room was comfortable and very clean.  It was also spacious.  I will stay here again when I come to Anaheim again.  Thank you for all the nice things you did for us while we were there you really made our vacation fun.  We look forward to coming back to stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  My sincere thanks for taking the time to write a review of our property. Your positive comments are very much appreciated by our staff, who work hard each day to make sure valued customers like yourself, are looked after.  We look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help for your next visit. It will be our pleasure to assist you.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We really love coming to Anaheim and staying here.  The staff is always very friendly and accommodating to us.  The breakfast is simple with muffins, danish, juice, coffee, and fresh fruit.  The rooms are spacious and comfy.  The family room suites our needs to make our family comfortable while we enjoy Disneyland.  Thank you to all the staff.  We look forward to our next visit.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words. We take the comments of our guests very seriously, as our goal is to always improve on meeting and exceeding expectations. Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Yours in Hospitality, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Don't stay here, they dont clean their sheets
Summary: We took a family vacation at the beginning of December. We were exhausted from our trip to our family reunion and even more exhausted from our 2 hr trip to get there.  We pulled up to the hotel around 5:30pm, got our room, ate pizza and swam in the pool all before 8:30pm. We were pleasantly surprised with how nice the rooms were at the time of arrival      (never once checking the beds).  We packed up the kids and headed to Disneyland. We enjoyed all the holiday decoration,  and road so many. It was truly a magical family moment for us.   Tired, no exhausted,  we drug ourselves back to our room around 1am. Showered and put the kids to bed by 1:15am.  By 1:30am it was final our turn to sleep. We pulled the covers down "AND FOUND BLOOD ON OUR SHEETS" IT HAD SOAKED CLEAN THROUGH TO
Manager Response: Dear Guest  As the Manager of this hotel, I would like to apologize about your stay and your experience.  The easiest place to start in our response to your review is to say that we apologize that we did not meet your expectations.  You are well remembered as our Night Manager relocated you to another room.  We have very strict policies on the bedding and how it needs to be changed.  We review this on a consistent basis with the housekeepers to prevent these things from happening.  We instruct the housekeepers to make the bed in half section, to make sure this does not happen.  We will review this policy with our housekeepers again.  Best Regards, Pat

Summary: This is the strangest 5 star review I've ever written. The first day I came to this hotel/inn, I pretty much told myself I don't think I will stay here again. This is after a weary day of traveling which included a mere 2 hours of sleep. It's clear the property has been around for a little while judging by how some things were. But this will be a veiled review because the big picture is what really matters.   The first 24 hours after arriving and getting more sleep, I went back to the hotel room to find it nicely turned down. The bed was neatly made, all trash cans emptied, and bathroom towels and such changed out, folded, and replaced. The toilet paper on the dispenser was shaped in the form of one of those hand fans you might see in a hot church. This was done all six days
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Greetings from ABVI and thank you sincerely on your marvelous review. We have read your review with the greatest of pleasure and pride. It makes all our efforts worthwhile when our guest leave ABVI with such fantastic memories. We look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help if you decide to come back. It will be our pleasure to assist you.  Yours sincerely Mukesh Silwal

Summary: The reviews were good, and the price was reasonable for a room with enough space for 3 adults and 2 toddlers.  I did have concerns, but our stay was more than acceptable. We had a room with 1 king plus a crib, and a double bed in a separate room with a door and an individual a/c unit.  Do keep in mind this is a small, older motel.  It is the second motel west of the Anaheim Garden Walk, so a good assortment of restaurants are within 1/2 a block.  Katella is a busy street, but you step into this little motel courtyard, and the traffic noise fades, the greenery is refreshing and the pool is inviting.  A quaint, budget oasis.  Our room was clean, beds fairly comfortable and the place seems to be maintained.  Miscellaneous cosmetic issues like a toilet seat that didn't quite fit the
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments. We take the comments of our guests very seriously, as our goal is to always improve on meeting and exceeding expectations.  We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Well, if you only need a place to spend the night and visit the Disney parks, this is a good value. The property is old but clean and the rooms could use some updating, but for the for the price you cannot ask for more. The complimentary breakfast is just coffe, juice and some bread and muffins. The only thing I disliked is that my phone never charged. It was plugged the entire night and it only charged to 20% not ideal if you want to take pictures with your phone at disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay. I apologize for the phone charger issues. Thank you again for staying with us we look forward to being of service to you in the future.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Let's face it: you only need a place to shower and sleep when you visit Disneyland. This place is pretty cheap compared to other nearby hotels. It's a 10 minute walk to Disneyland, just about my personal limit before I'm willing to pay extra for a closer hotel. Our mini suite was basic and spacious. We booked the mini suite as they are ground level vs the double queen rooms which are on the second level because I wanted easy access for my stroller. They don't have elevators and I didn't want to carry a stroller up the stairs. The continental breakfast is pretty basic so I just bought and loaded up my fridge with yogurt, fruits, etc from the closeby 7-11. The people here are super nice. I arrived at 2:30am to check-in and the gentleman was really helpful and all smiles despite me
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Thank you for your review on Tripadvisor. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and had a good experience. We look forward to another opportunity to host you at our property, and once again, thank you for your comments.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Still Good Budget Option, But Beware Hard Beds
Summary: This was our second time staying at the hotel.  The price is still good($150 for Wed/Thurs Thanksgiving week).  The location is still excellent(10 min walk to Disney).  We stayed in room 225 this time, single queen.  I don't remember the beds being particularly bad or good before, but this time it was like a rock.  I seriously wish we had checked while there to see if it was just a box springs, it was that hard.  Also, some of the pillows on the bed were pretty hard, harder than any I can remember using.  Not sure if they have changed their mattresses, or we just got "the room", but beware, you may not get most comfortable nights sleep while staying.  To be fair, we could have asked for a room change, but we are not particularly picky, so we tend not to complain unless it's
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We are sorry to hear of the mixed reviews you had with your last visit at our hotel. We take all our guest's feedback seriously and appreciate you bringing these items to light for correction.  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We still hope you think of us for your future accommodations as we will do whatever it takes to provide you with a comfortable, enjoyable stay. Thank you.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: I stayed here in November 2014 and I loved it.  Like the color of the accent walls, It was bright.  Staff was nice and Attentive.  Pool was clean.  Thanks for the great Experience I'll come back on my next trip your way
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your wonderful comments. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Mukes Silwal

Summary: Americas Best Value Inn & Suites is fantastic value for money. The location is great for a nice 10-15 walk to Disneyland. The front desk staff were excellent when we arrived late Tuesday afternoon on 4th November, they organised a taxi straight away for us to attend the Lakers game. The breakfast in the mornings were perfect to start the day off, lovely patisseries. Free WiFi was a bonus and the team at Front Desk were very helpful and most accommodating as we had a early checkout. The pool was fantastic and in tip top condition, our room was nice and big, not to mention the bed and the efficient House keeping providing us with clean amenities daily, great.. A really neat and tidy place to stay with the Garden Walk close by to shops and the bus route, which can take you down to
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  My sincere thanks for taking the time to write a review of our property. We are glad to hear your overall experience and you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for complementing our hotel facilities but most of all our dedicated employees.It makes all our hard work and effort worthwhile and sincere thank you on your kind words. We hope we will have the pleasure of greeting you again in the near future.   Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We stayed in a mini suite for three nights in October and walked to Disney each day, a fairly easy 10-15 minutes. We loved the size of this hotel, (not a big high rise like so many of the others) and loved the pool area, an old Hollywood kind of vibe. The weather was perfect and we walked back for lunch each day to eat outside at the tables near the pool. There are several good lunch choices, including a 7-11 and a CVS for take out for food and drinks, a nice alternative to eating at overpriced restaurants in Disney. Our two favorite restaurants, Bubba Gumps and Roys, were only a few steps away for great dinners, as well as the Anaheim Garden Walk. It was off season, not that crowded and super quiet so we slept great after viewing fireworks from the second floor. A great
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Greetings from ABVI and thank you sincerely on your marvelous review. We have read your review with the greatest of pleasure and pride. It makes all our efforts worthwhile when our guest leave ABVI with such fantastic memories. Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.    Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: The location & price is unbeatable plus it offers parking at no extra cost. The hotel is about 15 walking to the main entrance of the park and about 20 to downtown disney.  It offers complimentary breakfast which consists of coffee, juice and donuts and it is next door to a shopping mall. There is also a 7-11 store and a subway and pizza place very nearby.  The wi-fi was free and fast.  It has all you need for staying the night, AC, a fridge and a small table. The room was very clean.  We were really happy with this hotel and would definitely stay again
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  My sincere thanks for taking the time to write a review of our property. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: we actually booked rooms in 2 different hotels during our stay in anaheim one at a 4 star hotel and the other is this hotel and was quite surprised to have had a better overall experience here. my perception of 2 star hotels have changed so thank you!   kudos to your frontdesk staffs as well. they were very accomodating. sometimes it makes all the difference!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and your positive comments are very much appreciated by our staff, who work hard each day to make sure valued customers like yourself, are looked after. Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: I picked this motel near Disneyland because it had the combo of very good pricing and quite good Trip Advisor average, especially for the America's Best Value Inn chain which is pretty downmarket. I have to say that this time Trip Advisor let me down.  We were staying for several days to visit Disneyland, and this motel is a decent distance from the park if you are ok with walking for maybe 15 minutes, or quick if you're paying for the ART shuttle. At the end of a long day on your feet it can be a tiring walk back but we managed ok. There is a huge shopping center practically next door as well. Parking is free which is definitely a plus and the property is surrounded by other properties so it felt quite safe to leave the car there.  On our arrival we were given a front corner
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We always appreciate the comments left by the most important people in our world; our guests. We appreciate both the great comments, and the 'no so great' comments. It is  based on this feedback, that we are able to deal with issues as well as pass along appreciation to our hard working staff members. We are continually upgrading and improving our amenities and services at the hotel, and we already replaced most of our televisions to flat screen versions. All of the rooms already have them now, and I apologize that your particular room did not have it at that time. We continually try to do our very best for all of our guests, but unfortunately, sometimes we do fail. We will look into each issue that you have noted, in an attempt to correct and improve it, as our goal is to always improve on meeting and exceeding expectations.    Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Was really surprised how nice this was, we checked in no problems, then headed to our room past the water feature and it has a good sized swimming pool and spa.  They were perfect to relax by.  There was vending machines near the front desk that you could get Water and soft drinks from.  There was never many people around probably because everyone was at Disney all day.  You can buy Disney tickets at the front desk if you want to.  we bought them at the park the day before as for some reason the manager had locked them away so the guy at check in couldn't access them.    The room we has was spacious and had a microwave and fridge and a coffee making machine.  The beds were comfortable and it was quiet at night.  I recommend wearing earplugs as you may hear the people above
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Thank you for sharing your experiences of your recent stay at ABVI on line and thank you for giving us five stars with some good feedbacks. We are very glad that you enjoyed staying at our hotel and liked our services and you recommend our hotel to our future guests.   We look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We stayed for three nights in a  family room that had two beds in the main room and 1 bed in a separate. Another bathroom would have made the room perfect as there was only one. It is an older hotel but has gone through a renovation. The staff and service cannot be beat by any resort. We rented a scooter that was delivered to the hotel. The staff kept it in the storage room and plugged it in overnight so that it would be ready for the next days use. One of us has a sever tree nut allergy and has to be careful to read labels before eating. The continental breakfast consists of donuts, Danish, muffins, and fruit. There weren't any labels on them but when questioned a member of the staff went out of her way to get a new package that we could read. That really blew me away. Free
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations with our future guests. We have read your review with the greatest of pleasure and pride and thank you for giving us 5 star review on TripAdvisor. We have also noted your kind comments on items we have to improve on and on which we can certainly do better. We hope we will have the pleasure of greeting you again in the near future !   Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: My wife and I were down for my son's Disneyland wedding in late September. This was our first visit to Disneyland and with the wedding and attractions it had the potential to be a bit overwhelming. We chose Americas Best Value Inn Anaheim because of the reviews and value. We were not disappointed. The room was clean and comfortable and after a long, hot day at Disneyland the pool was a welcome retreat. It was a easy walk to Disneyland with lots of restaurants nearby. We had car trouble that required mechanical attention. The owner recommended a mechanic who turned out to be honest and accommodating. Overall we a great experience at the Inn and will return again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review and your kind words, we really appreciate that you took time to give us valuable feedback. It makes all our efforts worthwhile when our guest leave ABVI with good memories.  We look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help if you decide to come back.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: I read all the other reviews here and was still skeptical but we made out reservation for 2 nights.    When we checked in very friendly staff.  The gentleman even remember me when I called to make my reservation.  Nice touch!  When we walked into our room we were happily surprised!  Extremely large and spacious long suite.  Plenty of room for suitcases and pack n play for our 14 mo old. Definitely not modern at all but clean and everything worked.  Microwave and tall mini fridge in room, 7/11 a block down the road, free donut/ pastry breakfast in the am, 9 minute walk to Disney's main gate.  Done and done!  Housekeeping did a great job when we asked them to come in.  Least favorite part - tub looked a but too run down, clean but run down.    Overall the stay was so great we
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We always appreciate the positive comments left by the most important people in our world; our guests. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that our staff have gone above and beyond in terms of service.  Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Stayed here for a weekend while going to Disneyland with my husband! Great location, great prices, and amazing customer service!!! The rooms were very nice and clean. Overall, everything seemed pretty quiet at this hotel at night time as well. The staff was extremely friendly and very welcoming to us.  We will definitely come back here again once we take another trip to Disneyland! I would highly recommend this place!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in Anaheim. I would appreciate the opportunity to meet you and personally thank you, on your next visit.  Best Regards, Mukes Silwal

Summary: Ad copy kept saying "1BR suite," but I wouldn't believe it until I got there. Room has a main room with queen bed PLUS a separate bedroom. Never had anything close to that in this price range. Clean room and grounds, tremendously friendly staff (I think manager and family live onsite), relatively quiet, walk to Disney and restaurants -- HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Thank you for your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. From your description it looks like you have stayed on Mini Suites which comes with King size bed on main room and on separate room with Double bed, Mini Suites is one of the fastest selling suites at our hotel. We are happy that you are pleased with our property, rooms and friendly staff services.  Thank you again for being our guest and thank you for sharing your positive experience of ABVI with other TripAdvisor readers. We look forward to being in service to you in your future at Anaheim.   Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We were looking for a family friendly affordable hotel within walking distance to Disneyland. This place was perfect! They were very friendly, and accommodating! With a 3.5 year old, a 1.5 year old, and a double stroller - we needed a room on the ground floor. They gave us a huge room with 2 bedrooms, as well as the kitchenette/closet.  It was dated (no flat screen TV) and it wasn't in immaculate condition... but for a family that spends all day long in the parks and is really only there to sleep - it was perfect! It was CLEAN. Beds were comfortable, and the place was quiet. I would recommend to a friend and I would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. Sorry about the TV, we have invested time and resources into improving our property, and we are not finished yet. Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for three nights on a trip to Disneyland. We needed a clean, inexpensive place to stay, and this was perfect! The price was great compared to the other motels in the Disney area. The room was large, and comfortable and very clean. The entire motel grounds area was very clean. We were impressed. Everyone at the front desk was friendly. We would definitely stay again. The pool and hot tub area looked wonderful, only wish we had time to take advantage of it. Saw the higher fireworks from the back parking lot of the building, that was nice. The fridge and microwave were great to have in the room. The only complaint, and I think they could easily fix this, is the breakfast. It was stale or day old cheap donuts and muffins. Didn't matter to my husband but
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations with our future guests. We have also noted your kind comments on items we have to improve on and on which we can certainly do better. We look forward to being of service to you in the future, and on behalf of our team we'd like to say Thank you again.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: GREAT PLACE TO STAY AND GREAT PRICE
Summary: MY wife and I stayed here for a month the service was great and close to all the things that we did it is a great place to set up as a base the rooms a clean and yes it is a cheap the staff were friendly and the pool is great they made us welcome every time we have been there this is our third time we have stayed for a month and all the food places are so close to your hotel the owner is a great person and has made our stay great keep going the way the you are thankyou again we will staying with you soon again we hope BART@TINA from Australia .
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from ABVI and thank you on your encouraging and supportive review. We are so happy to hear that you have enjoyed your stay with us and thank you so much for choosing our hotel again. We are so happy that our facility and services are popular among guest all over the world. We look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help if you decide to come back. It will be our pleasure to assist you.  Yours sincerely, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: My husband and I had a conference to attend and a vacation with family. We stayed at your hotel for 11 days and enjoyed every moment. The entire staff was very friendly and very accomodating. We stayed in one of the family suites and it was just perfect for our family. The rooms are clean and the housekeeping staff works very hard to meet any of your needs. If you are looking for a hotel that is perfectly located within the Disney resort, look no further. You are close to many of the Disney venues and a host of wonderful restaurants. And when you are finished with your day of fun, you can come back to the hotel and relax in the pool or hot tub. We had a wonderful experience and would recommend your hotel without hesitation. Thank you for making our trip so wonderful.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments on Trip Advisor. Great to hear your overall experience and we feel so proud to hear that you recommended our hotel to future guest as well. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Stayed here in 2008/2011 and on our recent trip. If anything the décor and standard has improved. The rooms are clean and knowing the manager who has been there since our first visit we always get the same room ( bottom level ). He is always laughing, pleasant, helpful and always remembers who we are. Sure it is not up market but walking distant to Disneyland and my favourite restaurant The Cheesecake Factory. Once again thanks for a pleasant stay and see you sometime in 2016. Highly recommended. You will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  I would like to take this opportunity to personally thank you for coming back to stay with us.Thank you for your wonderful comments. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us. We also like to take this opportunity to tell all the future guests that we are located very close to Disney land (8-10 minutes walking distance), Garden Walk (Very popular place where you can find all the amazing restaurants and bars, movie theater and bowling alley)  and Anaheim Convention Center (2-5 minutes walking distance).  I would appreciate the opportunity to meet you and personally thank you, on your next visit.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: My fiance and I picked this hotel at a friend's recommendation and I'm so glad we took it. It was such a great trip, and I believe that is, in part, thanks to this hotel and its staff.   We left for our Disneyland trip after work, so we called ahead to let them know that we'd be checking in late (around 11-ish) and they were very accommodating, assuring us that we'd be fine checking in so late.  When we arrived, the night-desk employee was very helpful and efficient. He quickly asked if we had our Disneyland tickets yet, and showed us their official discounted prices. As we had already gotten our tickets ahead of time at full price, I had to decline. However, I am so glad to know that I can get the tickets from them next time we plan on going. He gave us our room keys and our
Manager Response: Dear Guests,   “Marvelous” review. Thanks and million! We are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. We have read your review with the greatest of pleasure and pride. It makes all our efforts worthwhile when our guest leave ABVI with such a fantastic memories. It is based on this feedback, that we are able to deal with issues as well as pass along appreciation to our hard working team members. We look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help if you decide to come back. It will be our pleasure to assist you.  Yours in Hospitality, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Very good value, especially for the location
Summary: My wife, infant daughter and I stayed here for four nights while we took in the Disneyland parks.  We had a great stay at this motel, with plenty of space for our daughter's pack n' play as well as our things.  Room also had a good size fridge which we utilized, as well as a roomy bathroom.  We also took advantage of the pool a couple times.  For the price I have 0 complaints.  For those looking for a real breakfast, though, you'll want to look elsewhere.  Just donuts, coffee & muffins in the lobby.  I would recommend this for anyone traveling to Disneyland Resort on a budget.  Quick walk to the parks.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to serving you in the near future.   Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Spent four nights here with the boyfriend during our celebratory Disneyland trip, and both of us agreed it was a very pleasant stay. No, it's not some fancy-schmancy resort, but it was perfect for what we needed. Our room featured a king-sized bed, TV, fridge, microwave, A/C, all of which functioned just fine, no complaints. The staff was friendly and the wifi was free.   - easily within walking distance of Disneyland and restaurants/convenience stores - parking lot is a bit of a squeeze if you have a larger vehicle (parking is free though) - breakfast provided in the office consists of coffee, juice, and some pastries -pool was nice and we had it all to ourselves since it was the offseason.  I found nothing to complain about, we had a wonderful stay. This was the perfect place
Manager Response: Dear Guests,   Greetings from ABVI and thank you on your encouraging and supportive review!  Thank you for complementing our hotel facilities and our dedicated employees. We look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help if you decide to come back. It will be our pleasure to assist you.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Budget friendly and Disney don't always go together, but this hotel makes it true!  Great room - family suite with separate bedroom (3 beds) made it so nice for our grandson - naps and nighttime we could put him to sleep and then relax ourselves.  Owner is super as far as customer service.  Responded to our requests immediately.  The air conditioning wasn't working so they quickly moved us to another room so we could move and still get to Disneyland in the morning.  Property shows extreme pride of ownership.  We have already made a reservation to come back in December.  You can't go wrong here - free breakfast (yes it is minimal, but it gets you out the door and on your way), free parking (and it was safe - off the street) and comfortable beds, refrigerator and microwave were a
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Marvelous review! - and thank you for it and for pointing your positive experiences of our facilities and services. We have read your review with the greatest of pleasure and pride. It makes all our efforts worthwhile when our guest leave with such fantastic memories. Thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Yours in Hospitality, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Service was awesome, very friendly and helpful. Not far of a walk to main gate( maybe 10mins). No problem with parking, even let me keep car here after check out to finish some shopping. Nothing special about room but wasn't expecting it to be. Very clean room and comfy bed. Also very quiet. Overall was everything I was expecting and some. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay. We very much appreciate that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Stayed 7 nights at this hotel and it was great. Staff were excelent and helped with everything we needed. Had the family suite with a roll-away bed and there was still plenty of room inside the suite. Hotel looks a bit old school but u get what u pay for. Room was cleaned everyday and any request for linen etc was'nt a hassle. Plenty of parking for your car, which is always good. Was'nt any noise why we were there, but maybe its that time of the year...not sure. The only downside if its a downside, is the breakfast, not that flash at all. If your staying here and relying on a flash breakfast..dont stay here, but it should never come down to that. Overall i wouldnt stay here again because i like to change hotels on each visit, but if your a family on a budget, i would definately
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay. We are continually upgrading and improving our amenities and services at the hotel and many of the rooms already have been upgraded. Sorry, to hear about continental breakfast. It is common for economy properties to offer basic continental breakfast because but we take the comments of our guests very seriously, as our goal is to always improve on meeting and exceeding expectations.   Once again, I thank you for your comments, you have noted that our guest rooms were cleaned and we provide great service to you. I will make sure that these comments reach our housekeeping staff, who work hard every day to ensure a positive guest experience.   Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: My friend and I stayed for 1 night at this hotel and it was great. The staff was very friendly and the room was clean. The greatest thing of this hotel was location. Disneyland was 10 minute walk and a big shopping mall was in only 5 min walk. We will stay this hotel, if we go Disneyland again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate your comments regarding your recent stay. Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We stayed for a 3 nights and we loved it. Very nice and friendly people, the service was great and we felt accommodated all the time. Excellent location near the Gardenwalk and within 15 mins walk to Disneyland. We stayed in a Quad room which was big and comfortable. Will definitely stay here again next time.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  My sincere thanks for taking the time to write a review of our property. Your positive comments are very much appreciated by our staff, who work hard each day to make sure valued customers like yourself, are looked after. We look forward to being of service to you in the future, and on behalf of our ABVI team we'd like to thank you !  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: This was our first stay here. Definitely won't be our last. The staff was so friendly and warm immediately. Our first room was cute. Microwave and fridge was a great money saver. The room was clean and bright. My only complaint was that the bed broke, so we had to change rooms. Our second room was still bright and clean, but was not updated like our first. However, because the staff was so nice, the location was relatively close to the Disneyland Resort, and it was a steal for this area, we will certainly stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words. We take the comments of our guests very seriously, as our goal is to always improve on meeting and exceeding expectations. I apologize for the bed issues that you had. We are continuously trying to improve our hotel property and services. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in Anaheim.   Best Regards,  Mukesh Silwal

Summary: The hotel was in a great location. Everything was close by. The rates were very affordable. I would return to this hotel for sure. They have great amenities. Great for families with kids. Thank you so much for a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We stayed for a week and we loved it. Very nice and friendly people in the front office plus  the staff was also very nice and friendly. The service was great and we felt accommodated all the time. Shops and restaurants are close by as well as Disney park if you're there for a visit to Mickey.  Martin
Manager Response: Dear Guests,   Greetings from ABVI and thank you on your encouraging and supportive review. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to another opportunity to host you at our property, and once again, thank you for your positive comments!  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Stayed at this hotel on my own for 4 nights whilst waiting for friends to arrive from overseas.  I love staying here. This was my 5th or 6th stay.  The staff are all friendly, the rooms are very clean.  It is basic accommodation but the pool is clean, the beds are comfortable and it is only a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland.  There is also a Cheesecake Factory nearby, plus other eateries and a 711 store.  I was a bit disappointed they took out the rose garden and changed the hotel colours (for some reason I loved the yellow and red theme), but the new colours are growing on me. Also, you can see the fireworks from Disneyland from the back car park, if you are not in the Park itself at night.  Only downside is there are Wyndham staff set up out the front who stop you to give you
Manager Response: Dear Guests,   "Superb” review. We are so happy to hear that you have enjoyed your stay with us. We have read your review with the greatest of pleasure and pride.  We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you in the future, and on behalf of our team here is ABVI..... Thank you!  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Great customer service! For price and distance to disney this place was great. accomidations were what you would expect for the price, but the customer service was great.I would absolutely reccomend this place if going to disney.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate your comments regarding your recent stay. Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: All our enquiries were dealt with by Mukesh & Shelly, most helpful & on our last day we stored our luggage there and were able to change our clothes in a spare room for our late flight home after another full day at Disney Land.Stayed 5 nights. The pool was very clean- nice to relax midday then back to Disney later. Maid service daily. Shuttle pick-up and another bonus was that on the corner you could catch a bus to Down town L.A.;Universal Studies; San Diego; Amtrak bus thru service and next door at the Garden Walk the Luxbus to Las Vegas. Have stayed here before and will do so again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from ABVI and I would like to take this opportunity to personally thank you for coming back to stay with us. It is great and heart-warming to read of your experience during your stay with us and we are so pleased we were able to make your holiday a memorable success.   It makes all our hard work and effort worthwhile and sincere thank you on your kind words. We hope we will have the pleasure of greeting you again in near future !   Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: very good inexpensive accommodations 15 min walk from Disneyland
Summary: This family-run place gave unusually good service from initial phone contact till leaving.  All family members at the desk are very friendly, right in line with Disneyland.  Upon our arrival, they had upgraded us to a suite with no additional charge.  Rooms are plain but roomy and clean, with nice pool. The three-year-old twins slept like, well, babies, as did their mom, and me, the Grandpa.  Breakfast is just pastries, coffee and orange juice served out of the small reception area.  That's all we needed. If you hoof right along, the Park is just 10 minutes away.
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Thank you for your recent review on Tripadvisor and thank you for complementing our hotel facilities but most of all our dedicated employees. Once again, Thank you for being our guest and sharing your positive experience of ABVI with other Tripadvisor readers  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We stayed here for a visit to Disneyland, we found the hotel clean, nice, you can tell its an older hotel but the owners make an effort to keep it clean. Nice pool area, and the location is great. We walked to Disney in about 10 minutes. Be warned though, if you have a larger vehicle like a full size pickup the entry can be tight and parking is tight, otherwise a good stay, friendly staff, and the price was right for its location.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments, we really appreciate that you took time to give us valuable feedback, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: My daughter and her husband stayed here a few months ago and recommended this place to us. Staff very nice and accommodating. Price was right. Room large and clean. Pool older but sparkling clean. Unfortunate that smoking allowed there. Also wish that Wyndham reps were not positioned in front of the front entrance every day ... Strange to me that one motel would allow another to stop their customers on their property. Would have liked more information from the front desk upon check in. For example, we found out on the last day that there was a bus/shuttle available in front of the hotel to the Disney parks! It is a 0.8 mile walk to park entrance. Several nice restaurants very nearby though we weren't told that either.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay. We take the comments of our guests very seriously, as our goal is to always improve on meeting and exceeding expectations. It is based on this feedback, that we are able to deal with issues as well as pass along appreciation to our staff members. Once again, thank you, and we look forward to another chance to serve you!  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: great service,great price, just don't the 4 seasons or anything
Summary: The front staff was nice and kind. the rooms were decent size and clean. If I ding it on anything it would be on little things like the tv was old and had a little trouble playing the the cable. I got a big black box like it wanted to display close caption or something. second-the continental breakfast wasn't very appealing. so if you don't put to much in those things it should go well with you
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments and we very much appreciate that you stayed with us.  We have also noted your kind comments on items we have to improve on and on which we can certainly do better. Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: All we wanted was somewhere to sleep that was quiet and clean. This was both. Friendly, helpful staff and very close to Disneyland. If you feel energetic you can walk but I suggest you take the bus which stops right outside the building. Why pay for an expensive room when you spend all day at the parks? Perfect for our needs.
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Thank you for your review on Tripadvisor. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: it was great no trouble at all  I'm done looking for other hotels when I come back to Anaheim. you can see the fireworks of Disneyland also you can walk to the theme park its about 3 minute walk.......
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Great review! - and thank you for it and for pointing your positive experiences of our facilities and services. Thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to greet you in near future !   Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We had a great room on the second floor above the office. We stayed six nights to visit Disneyland and had no problems with the hotel or the staff. They do a great job keeping the place clean and we felt welcomed by all we interacted with. We had no issues with the parking lot and the shower did not run out of hot water. We had a great experience and highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  My sincere thanks for taking the time to write a review of our property.  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay at ABVI and would highly recommend this place to our future guest. Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Yours in Hospitality, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Great value for a weekend get away,  the rooms and the staff are great.  If you are looking for a place to stay close to Disneyland,  you can't go wrong staying here.  It is close to the park and there are some great places to choose from for a great meal after a long day at the park.  The rooms are clean and so are the grounds.  I recommend you try it out for yourself.  We usually stay at the big name hotels when I am staying mor then one night.  But now that I have stayed here I might make it my number one place to stay now.  Try it out once or twice I am sure you will enjoy your stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments and giving us five star on Tripadvisor. We have read your review with the greatest of pleasure and pride. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We had a family of 6 stay in one of there small suites w/3 queen beds. Our stay was excellent! We felt very welcome from the staff/owner!!! Even when I forgot my room key to get ice. Someone saw me and came out to get the machine to work. If you are on a budget pick this place. Plenty of places to go eat and a very good 15 min walk to Disneyland. I will be coming back to stay there. The only negative(s) part of the hotel is always being asked by the Wyndham Vacation rental ppl stopping yo on the way out and in of the hotel. I kindly said no thanks and just went on my way. Hey we all need to make a living and cant judge them for trying. I also wished they had a shuttle to/from the airport and Disneyland.  The pool is very clean and very welcoming when you are exremely exhausted
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations of your recent stay at ABVI with our future guests. We have also noted your kind comments on items we have to improve on and on which we can certainly do better.  I look forward to having another opportunity to have you as our guest!  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Stayed for 5 nights for Vidcon at the Anaheim Convention Center. It is a very short walk up the street to the convention center and is also well-located for walking to the Disney parks, shopping, and restaurants. Check-in was very friendly, as was all staff we encountered. The room was very spacious, the bed perfectly comfy (and lots of pillows provided!), and the free Wifi had a great signal. It is clearly an older property but is well-maintained. There are minor cosmetic issues (patchy drywall, paint chips etc.) but they do not deter from the overall pleasantness. The pool/hot tub was clean and very refreshing after a long day. The property is quiet despite being on a very busy road. We would certainly stay again if coming to Anaheim!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We always appreciate the positive comments left by our guests. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for sharing your positive experience with millions of trip advisor readers worldwide. We hope we will have the pleasure of greeting you again in the near future !  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Loved our stay at Americas Best. The rooms were spacious and comfortable, everything was clean, and the staff was friendly and welcoming. Will definitely remember to check here for availability first on our next trip to Anaheim/LA.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay. As you have mentioned, we are family oriented ABVI close to Disneyland Park and Anaheim Convention Center. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. Once again, I thank you for your comments and looking forward for your next stay at ABVI !  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: I traveled with my family & loved that they had one room w/ 3 beds.  The hotel was very clean & staff was very friendly.  An added bonus was that the shuttle to go to Disneyland stops right in front of the hotel, little pricey but after walking what seemed a marathon in Disney was well worth it.  The only thing that was not great was the "continental" breakfast that was only coffee, juice, and doughnuts.  But considering how expensive everything else is in the area & value of the room did not mind.  Hey it was good doughnuts & pastries so have at it!
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Thank you for your recent review and giving us five star on Tripadvisor. Great to hear your overall experience of ABVI and we are glad your stay was good. We have also noted your kind comments on items we have to improve on and on which we can certainly do better. Thank you again and we look forward to greet you in the near future !  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We recently stayed at this property with 4 adults, two older teenagers, and an infant and it was a very good experience.  The rooms (2 room unit) was very comfortable and the staff was outstanding and very kind.  The continental breakfast was OJ, delicious donuts, Danish, and apples (coffee but we didn't try that) and was fine for our needs.  Pool was great. Refrigerator wasn't working great when we arrived and they immediately brought us a brand new one!  About a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland.  Would absolutely recommend this place to anyone looking for a clean, simple, well-run hotel, with a very kind staff close to Disneyland.  It's not fancy but was an excellent choice for our needs.  We'll be back there on our next trip. Mark L
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations with our future guests. We have read your review with the greatest of pleasure and pride. It makes all our efforts worthwhile when our guest leave such a great review.  We look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help if you decide to come back. It will be our pleasure to assist you.  With Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We were going to stay in a more expensive hotel. Honestly, I was a bit afraid of the good price offered by this hotel and expected something to go wrong. However, it was a pleasant stay and everything was as promised: free parking, wifi, fridge, etc. etc. The breakfast is extremely simple, but we took some food and put it in the fridge. Did not swim in the pool, but people were enjoying it. We went as a group of 3 adults and 3 young kids. Hotel is close to several restaurants on Katella. It is not far at all from Disney - requires a bit of a walk, but it takes 15 minutes going at a good pace. First time to Disney, and we have zero complaints about our stay here.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write review of our property, your comments are very much valued. We are glad that you enjoyed our amenities and services.  We look forward to host you at our property in the near future, and once again, thank you for your positive comments!  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: On our recent visit of 4 weeks to USA we based ourselves at this hotel 3 different times. Could not speak highly enough of their help. All staff from reception to cleaners were most friendly. Room was always clean and well presented. Pool area, including hot tub was most enjoyable after a day of sight seeing. Walking distance to Disneyland and the many different eating places and shops close by. Special thanks for all the help they provided to us as first time travellers to America. It was a great help to us when they offered to store a couple of our cases while we travelled around.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations with our future guests. We feel very proud to read comments like this and once again, it shows that our service is popular not only in the domestic level but all over the world. Thank you again for choosing ABVI and enjoying your stay with us.    We look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help if you decide to come back. It will be our pleasure to assist you.  Yours sincerely, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel many times (at least 5 times). Every time we come to Disneyland, the beach, or anywhere nearby, we stay here. We are always pleased with everything this hotel has to offer. It is about a 10 minute walk to and from Disneyland, which is really convenient. The hotel even has a decent view of the Disneyland fireworks.  Everyone who works here are so helpful, and friendly. The rooms are always clean and orderly.  In each room, there is a small table with chairs, a tv with good channels, a mini fridge, a coffee pot, a microwave, and a comfortable bed(s).  Every morning, in the main office, there is coffee, juice, a variety of donuts and pastries. This hotel is also really quiet (except that there is the Disneyland firework show nightly).  Even the guests
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   First, I would like to take this opportunity to personally thank you for coming back to stay with us and thank you for sharing your positive experience of ABVI with other Tripadvisor readers. Your positive comments makes all our hard work and effort worthwhile. We look forward to being of service to you in the future, and on behalf of our team ABVI..... Thank you!  With Best Regards Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Everything was cleaned to an excellent standard, the courtyard was kept in a very presentable state every day I saw it. The room is spacious and bed comfortable. The pool was just right for a mid day break, and all staff encountered were friendly and helpful. Definitely value for money. Thank you team at ABVI!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Greetings from ABVI and thank you sincerely on your review. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays at ABVI.  Yours in Hospitality, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We are a middle aged couple with no kids.Arrived to a very friendly welcome from both staff and the owner operators Pat & Shelley.Given a double room closest to road with no issues with traffic noise at all.Would consider hotel to be aimed at families however would strongly recommend for anybody looking for great value for money. Relatively small complex made up of over 30 different configurations of family rooms.All rooms look over pool/spa area which is great for parents watching over kids in the pool.Pool area open till 10.00pm which was great.Room was very clean and tidy and well maintained.Amenities included fridge,tea/coffee making,microwave, a/c and TV with cable and excellent wifi in rooms.Housekeepers cleaned room everyday and were very polite. Light breakfast of tea &
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Great review! - and thank you for it and for pointing your positive experiences of our facilities and services. We are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you on your encouraging and supportive review and when we share comments like yours with our staff at all levels, it warms their heart. Thank you again for taking time to share your experience of ABVI with other Trip Advisor readers and with the help of fabulous guests like yourselves we hope to achieve top marks in the future. We look forward to have another opportunity to greet you as our guest!  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: I am an annual passholder for Disneyland so I try to come down at least four or five times out of the year. I always stay at this location and I have yet to be disappointed with my stay. This most recent stay I even noticed that they made a few upgrades which made it more enjoyable. Free wifi, hot tub, swimming pool, a quick breakfast on our way to the park, and free parking! Easy decision to make. I even became a value club member because I plan to stay loyal to this property. I always check in pretty late and the staff is always nice and accommodating. I always ask if they can hold my bags and there is never any hesitation from their end. I ALWAYS recommend them to anyone traveling down to the area, great distance to the park and a great price! I love staying here and I am
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  I would like to take this opportunity to personally thank you for coming back to stay with us. We have worked very hard to win back guests such as yourselves, and to reach out to new travelers. We are very happy that you enjoyed our new upgraded rooms and property.   Thank you for staying with us and thank you for sharing your positive experience of ABVI with other Trip advisor users. I would appreciate the opportunity to meet you and personally thank you, on your next visit.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We just were passing through and needed a room to sleep 4.   We stayed in a family room that had 3 double beds. Perfect for us. Furnishings were dated.  Bed was very firm  Breakfast was minimal. Free wifi and parking. Close to Disneyland.  Good location on Katella.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate your comments regarding your recent stay. We have also noted your kind comments on items we have to improve on and on which we can certainly do better.  Thank you for staying with us !  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We stayed 5 nights at this property. Our room was clean and spacious. The staff were always cheerful and helped us with directions around Anaheim. It's not a fancy place but we didn't spend much time in our room. It's in a great location, close to Disneyland, 10 to 15 minute walk up the road. The Cheesecake Factory and Bubba Gump's are only moments away on the same street. They provide guests a light breakfast consisting of pastries & fruit. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations with our future guests and thank you for rating us so highly.  We hope we will have the pleasure of greeting you again !  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: I found them through An Unofficial Disney Guide Book. They had the lowest price & good reviews. We arrived earlier than check in time & planned to just park there and walk to Disneyland. They upgraded us & let us check in early. Our room was large & clean - not fancy - but we really just slept there. Very short walk to Disneyland with good price & helpful staff = great find!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments. We very much appreciate that you enjoyed your stayed with us. We look forward to being of service to you on your future stays in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Office staff was almost rude. Our bathroom had black mold. The beds felt almost as hard as cement. Then without being forewarned they started doing what sounded like construction remodel on the unit next door, such loud banging and loud tools at about 9 am, we had to leave it was so loud.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  First, I would like to personally apologize for the series of unfortunate incidences that you experienced during your stay with us. We continually try to do our very best for all of our guests, but unfortunately, sometimes we do fail.  We are starting renovation on few of our rooms, so that guest will experience wonderful stay at ABVI. We sincerely apologize for the loud noise caused because of the maintenance, however if you have notified us about the situation during your stay we would have completely stopped the remodeling process because we always want our guest to have positive experience and leave ABVI with fantastic memories. We look forward to another opportunity to host you at our property !  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: This place is nothing fancy, but it sure is a great deal for the money!!  Check in was fast and friendly.  The family enjoyed the swimming pool and I found it awesome to see families having fun together.  It made my stay with small children stress free.  The rooms were spacious and clean and I loved the shutters on windows.  We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Thank you for being our guest and thank you for sharing your positive experience of ABVI with other Tripadvisor readers. We appreciate that you liked our spacious clean rooms and recently upgraded new shutters on windows. We look forward to being of service to you in the future, and on behalf of our team - Thank you !  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: The hotel is very clean and staff is always friendly and welcoming also the location is excellent!!
Summary: I stay at Americas Best Value at least four or five times a year!! I always come back because of the friendly staff and clean rooms!! The hotel is walking distance from Disneyland and The Garden Walk!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  I would like to take this opportunity to personally thank you for coming back to stay with us. It makes all our hard work and effort worthwhile and sincere thank you on your kind words. We hope we will have the pleasure of greeting you again !  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Clean, inexpensive and close to the park!
Summary: It's not fancy and pretty outdated, but it's really clean and close to the park! The owners of the establishment are SUPER nice and very helpful! We bought our 3 day park tickets at the motel and they give you a small discount. I went with my parents, they got a mini suite and I booked a king room. I requested to be in a room next to my parents; they didn't have any king rooms by the mini suite rooms so they upgraded my room for free so I could be within very close distance to my parents.
