HOW NICE! :) I didn't sleep on the mini suite bed, but the king bed was comfortable. I think they are refurbishing the rooms slowly because my parents room had updated tile in the shower, but I didn't (which is fine). The facility is nicely lit at night and the grounds are well kept. It's
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Thank you for being our guest and thank you for sharing your positive experience of ABVI with other Tripadvisor readers.  We hope we will have the pleasure of greeting you again !  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Great customer service, good for price
Summary: We traveled down to California for a vacation and originally booked our stay at the Ramada South. The customer service there was so absolutely horrible we ended up checking out 4 hours later. We ended up booking a room here online that was a better price than the Ramada anyway, but when we got here, the night guy - Nick, said there was a mistake on their website and the room we booked was actually unavailable. We were very frustrated at this point, having had trouble with two hotels in one night, but Nick went out of his way to call around to different hotels that I believe were owned by the same people, trying to find us a room. Unable to find us one, he gave us a bigger room for the price we had booked online and told us to come back in the morning and talk to the manager to
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments. We are pleased that our staff members provided you amazing services and overall you enjoyed your stay with us. Your positive comments are very much appreciated by our staff, who work hard each day to make sure valued customers like yourself, are looked after.   Thank you again for being our guest and sharing your positive experience of ABVI with other Tripadvisor readers.   Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Overall had a great customer service and do recommend.
Summary: Very friendly,clean, spacious,reasonable price. The suite just as I wanted ,felt like home. Very comfortable and private.do recommend because it's very close to Disneyland by drive and walking. Easy to find. Good breakfast. Many restaurants near it. Provide good internet and cable tv.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments, we really appreciate that you took time to give us valuable feedback. It makes all our hard work and effort worthwhile and sincere thank you on your kind words. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: The hotel front desk was awesome and let me check into my room at 10 am, because they had a room already available!! I was so happy to be able to check in, the rooms are nice and very spacious. My only negative is that the bed is pretty hard and the pillows are too thick to rest your head on without your neck getting a kink. Luckily I had my own pillow. The walk to Disneyland is a bit far with youngsters, I believe they had a shuttle, but there is a fee. Overall for a one night stay it was great!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate your comments regarding your recent stay and thank you for rating ABVI so highly. We look forward to being of service to you in the future !  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Great Hotel. Would highly recommend it
Summary: Great location, walking distance to the shops, cheese cake factory, bubba gump bar, Disneyland and to car hire. Was extremely happy with the service, very friendly and helpful staff. Room was tidy, clean and spacious. Comfortable beds which no one can deny is great when you are staying anywhere. It also helps that this hotel had a pool. Rather nice to jump in after a long, hot day. More than happy with this hotel. Great for a family!
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Greetings from ABVI and thank you sincerely on your marvelous review and thank you for rating us so highly. We always appreciate the positive comments left by the most important people in our world; our guests. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that our staff have provided excellent service to you. We look forward to greeting you again so please let us know if we can be of any help if you decide to come back.   Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: For the budget minded traveler to Disneyland, this hotel was a perfect fit for us. Older but well maintained, clean, pool for the kids, close proximity to the park, great service and management, fridge/microwave, morning pastries and juice, free parking, bought Disney tickets discounted at the front desk. Booked two rooms, made two reservation changes after booking with no problems or fees, management even upgraded one room for us to a suite at no cost. I’ll recommend to my family and friends and will stay their again on our next trip.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in ABVI. Thank you again for being our guest and thank you for sharing your positive experience of ABVI with other Tripadvisor readers.  Best Regards, Mukesh Siwal

Summary Heading: I LOVE THIS HOTEL!!!!! / BEST HOTEL TO STAY AT IN ANAHEIM!!!!!
Summary: I absolutely love this hotel!!!!! I am staying with family, and it is the best hotel that I have stayed in, in Anaheim... The grounds are immaculate, and beautiful, and the courtyard makes you feel like you are staying in a resort far away from crowds and noise, when you are actually just a block away from both Disneyland and California Adventure. You are welcomed like family when you arrive at the front desk by the owners and managers Hitesh and Shelly. The rooms are spacious and as clean as can be, and with a great mini fridge, coffee maker, microwave and hundreds of channels on the television. This is my second time staying here, and I aboslutely reccomend it to anyone who wants to stay in a beautiful hotel and be treated like family when you arrive... WONDERFUL!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  I would like to take this opportunity to personally thank you for coming back to stay with us. We have worked very hard to win back guests such as yourselves, and to reach out to new travelers. Thank you for complementing our hotel facilities and most of all our dedicated employees.  Once again, thank you, for taking time to share your experience of ABVI on online and with the help of fabulous guests like yourselves we hope to achieve top marks too!  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Booked this hotel due to it's raking & being walking distance to the Disney park. Checked it was straight forward. The guy who checked us in was helpful.  We weren't expecting the room to be 5 star but we weren't quite prepared for what we got. The room was quite small & oddly shaped. Room was first room from the stairs. The views from the window was a brick wall means not much natural night. Had to keep the lights on all the time. Bathroom was down a corridor within the room. We didn't have anywhere to hanger clothes. There was only five hangers between two people. There wasn't even any drawers to put clothes in. We end up leaving them in are cases for six days. The carpet leading to the bathroom has started to fray. The room doesn't have a safe for valuables. The room has a
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you on your review and on pointing out issues which have influenced your overall impression of your stay with us. I personally, apologize for not meeting your expectations with respect to your recent stay. We are continually upgrading and improving our amenities and services at the hotel but its a long process and hopefully we will meet our expectation one day. We are very sorry to hear that you didn't have enough hanger to hang your cloths but we would have been very happy to provide you extra hangers if you have notified us during your stay.   Once again, I thank you for your comments, you have noted that our bathrooms were clean and yes we recently finish remodeling most of our hotel bathrooms. Even though we don't have big properties, we do offer spacious and clean guest rooms at in a very convenient location and at very low nightly room rates that includes, free parking, free continental breakfast and free internet service for our guest.   Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: I enjoyed my stay more than I thought I would! Very reasonable price and the staff was very friendly. The room wasn't fancy or anything but it was clean and did the job. Would definitely stay again. My only complaint would be I had trouble logging into WiFi with the password I was given.
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Thank you for your review on Tripadvisor. We recently upgraded our Internet service, so now we have high speed Internet connection available in all of our rooms but we need to change our password every week for security reason. I think due to the password change you had trouble logging in. I sincerely apologize for the internet issues that you had. We very much appreciate that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on your future stays.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: I liked alot the only problem was the mini fridge did not work so my food went bad other than that its a great place to stay not far from disney if u lloking for something thats within your budget this is a great place to stay
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay. I apologize for the fridge issues that you had. We take the comments of our guests very seriously, as our goal is to always improve on meeting and exceeding expectations.  We look forward to having you back to our hotel in the near future !  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Good just needs a few updates. :)
Summary: I really enjoyed my stay at this hotel they had great customer service. It did have a few things that I would love to see updated like the pool needed to be replastered this kept me from wanting to go swimming, the ice machine was a little tricky but very helpful staff showed us how it worked also the toilet handle had to be held down really long to flush the toilet completely. All in all it was a good hotel for the price close to both city walk (2min) and the parks (10min).
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments, we really appreciate that you took time to give us valuable feedback. We have invested time and resources into improving our property, and we are not finished yet!  Thank you again, and we look forward to having another opportunity to have you as our guest!  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: I came into the hotel at one in the morning after a long night of driving, along with a lot of time trying to find an available hotel room for a reasonable price. As I come to the front desk, the man behind the counter was helpful in telling me what was available, how much it cost, and if any discounts could be made. I booked one of the last rooms, which was a double queen (I only needed a single) and came to my room.  I don't really know what I was expecting, maybe something shady just from what I had in my mind about Best Value Inns in general, but it was clean, and pretty nice. The only thing that I could complain about was the very squeaky shower floor. As I stated before, it was late and I had to take a shower as I was disgusting at that point. I felt terrible trying to
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in ABVI.  We are also in the process of renovation and continually improving our property.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: My family stayed for 3 nights in late April while in the area for Disneyland (about a 10-15 min walk). We wanted a place that we could stay together at an affordable price and this hotel fit that need. The room (217) has the basic items - clean, comfortable beds and an updated bathroom. There is a small refrigerator and microwave. We went to the local grocery store (about 1.5 miles away on Katella) and purchased items to fix for breakfast and snacks. While the front desk does provide muffins & donuts we were looking for something a little healthier so we just made our own. We didn't have any noise from other guests but I don't think the hotel was filled to capacity either.  Our only complaint is that the pool/hot tub hours are 9am to 9pm and we were hoping to soothe our aching
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write your review of our property, your comments are very much valued. Clean, comfortable and quiet ! - what is there to add ! Many thanks on your great review and for ranking us so highly. Sorry, for the pool hours and we apologize, you didn't have enough time for the hot tub. Thank you for your understanding, we close the pool at 9:00 P.M, so that guests can get a good night’s sleep.Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Yours in Hospitality, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Stopped here for 5 nights in April, hotel is in a great location about 10 mins walk to parks, will stop here again, staff where very friendly, breakfast included orange and apple juice was very nice which saved time looking for some where to eat before parks,
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Great review! - and thank you for it and for pointing your positive experiences of our food, facilities and services. We have read your review with the greatest of pleasure and pride.  Once again, thank you for ranking us so high, and we look forward to another opportunity to serve you!  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: My boyfriend & I stayed here for a week over spring break and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The room was spacious and comfortable, with all the basics- mini fridge, microwave, hair dryer. The hotel was very clean, and the A/C worked like a charm. The staff was incredible! Everyone we encountered was very friendly. Best part- the hotel is a 15 minute walk from the entrance gates to Disneyland, AND it's right next door to the Anaheim Gardenwalk. We have another stay booked for August!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your recent review, and we really appreciate that you took time to give us valuable feedback. It was great to read of your experience during your stay with us and we are so pleased that we were able to make your spring break a memorable success. It makes all our hard work and effort worthwhile and sincere thank you on your kind words and awesome ratings.  I would appreciate the opportunity to meet you and personally thank you, on your next visit on August !  Best Regards Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights whilst visiting disney, perfect location, 5 min walk to disney entrance, lovely room, staff very friendly would recommend and would stay again in the future, very close to restaurants and other amenities
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  We appreciate for your review on Tripadvisor. Great to hear your overall experience of ABVI during your stay with us. Thank you again for choosing us and for ranking us so highly.  We hope we will have the pleasure of greeting you again !  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a disney vacations!
Summary: Its a great hotel !, very quiet , clean,  close to disney parks and restaurants and the people is really nice and friendly! . We stay 4 nights and the service was excellent! , we also buy there the disney tickets . We have being staying in this hotel for years and i will continue staying here! it offers the best at a really low price!! I really recommend this hotel! =)
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  I would like to take this opportunity to personally thank you for coming back to stay with us. Great review! - and thank you for it and for pointing your positive experiences of our facilities and services. We are very proud to provide Discounted Disneyland tickets to our valuable guest.    Thank you again for being our guest and thank you for sharing your positive experience of ABVI with other Tripadvisor readers.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Great hotle for a great price
Summary: Very pleased with this hotel, very clean,quiet, and great price. Disneyland is a 5 min walk away, with a mall with awesome resteruants right next door, the mall also has a movie theatre and a bowling alley. Just a few mins away is angels baseball or ducks hockey.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in ABVI.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Great place to stay while in Anaheim, very good service, the staff is very friendly, the room was ok, but the cleaning needs to get better. Is just 10 minutes (walking) away from Disney and is close to a lot of good restaurants. You can even buy Disney tickets there, as well as ART passes. Very good hotel and the price is really low for all the services and the room. Is a little bit noisy in the morning but I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review.  We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in ABVI.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Great place, good staff, close to the parks, highways, outside food places, not loud, very quiet. Truly enjoyed stating here and will be back, would recommend to anyone looking for somewhere near disneyland without staying at a disneyland hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate your comments regarding your recent stay. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: If you like noise and dirt, this is the place for you
Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights. Chose this hotel due to reading good reviews. On arrival staff were friendly and helpful. On entering the room thought it looked OK,Basic but OK, then saw cracked tiles on bathroom floor. Room was top floor facing Katella Ave, double glazed windows useless as road noise was terrible. In the courtyard are two fountains left running all night, might as well turn on the bath tap and leave it running as that is how bad the noise was. Also regular visitor had TV on all night with volume turned up. That was rectified after a complaint by myself..again good service from the manager. Carpets were found to be absolutely filthy, could not walk in the room without shoes on. Breakfast was very poor with donuts, small pastries and small muffins on offer. some apples
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments. We appreciate both the great comments, and the 'no so great' comments that our valued guests provide to us. It is based on this feedback, that we are able to deal with the issues. We apologize for the inconvenience, we are continually upgrading and improving our amenities and services, and many of the rooms already have new bathroom, and I apologize that your particular room did not.  Once again, I thank you for your comments, you have noted that our staff were friendly and helpful and I will make sure that these comments reach to our staff members, who work hard every day to ensure a positive guest experience.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Best hotel to stay at in Anaheim!!!!!
Summary: This is absolutely the best hotel to stay at in Anaheim!!!!! If you want a wonderful, spacious and so very clean room with comfortable beds... to stay with folks that make you feel so very welcome and like you are staying with family... to stay a mere block away from the Disney Parks and from the Anaheim Gardenwalk... to be met with a smile and hello from their wonderful staff... this is the place for you to stay...  Mr. and Mrs. Patel are such wonderful people, and make you feel so very welcome... LOVE YOU GUYS!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Greetings from ABVI and thank you on your encouraging and supportive review. We are so happy to hear that you have enjoyed your stay with us. All of our staff members, believe in providing that personalized service, and I agree with you, that Mr. and Mrs. Patel is very good at there job and we are proud to have such an amazing staff members.  We look forward to another opportunity to host you at our property, and once again, thank you for your positive comments!  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights.  Lovely atmosphere and good clean large rooms.  Didn't like the breakfast as it's a standard American continental breakfast and I don't like all the sugar.   Nice restorants near by.   Parked the car and walked to Disney (10-15 min. Walk). Even came back one day for a short mid day sleep.  Did not use the pool but others seem to enjoy it.  Defenetly will come back.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on Trip advisor. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on future stays in ABVI. Thank you again !  Best Regards Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Good value stay close to Disneyland
Summary: From a price standard this place is pretty hard to beat.  It's approximately a 15min walk to Disneyland or the ART bus stops right out front.  There are shops nearby for food and drink plus plenty of restaurants.  The rooms themselves are fairly spacious and really clean.  Ours had a small lounge in its own little sitting area.  The room had a microwave and fridge and coffee maker which was a handy for keeping food and snacks as well.  The pool area and hotel surrounds were neat and tidy and well maintained.  The staff were friendly and were always around cleaning and maintaining the hotel.  The front desk staff were also very helpful.  The only comment I can make which is not so much negative as it is informative is regarding the "continental" breakfast.  To be 100% accurate it
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Thank you for sharing your experiences of your recent stay in ABVI. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and liked our clean & spacious rooms and friendly staff members. It makes all our efforts worthwhile when our guest leave such a fantastic memories.  We look forward to greeting you again. It will be our pleasure to assist you.  Best Regards Mukesh Silwal

Summary: This place is located in a great spot!  There are some great restaurants nearby, the walk to Disneyland isn't too great, the rooms were clean and functional, the continental breakfast was sufficient to stave hunger and the personnel were friendly and helpful.  Besides that, it was the lowest price we could find so close to the park!  I gave it 4 of 5 because it isn't the newest, lavish place to stay.  You wouldn't want to be spending your day there, but to shower, sleep and have privacy, it is enough!  I know some of my friends are so stuffy that they could pick the place apart, but hey!  It isn't where you are going to live the rest of your life, have parties or sit around all day!  I would NEVER spend 500.00 plus for a room like the disney hotels, because I would rather spend
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations with our future guests. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on your future stays in ABVI.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We stay at here every time we visit Anahiem.  We love the rooms, the staff is always friendly and helpful.  The rooms are always clean and comfy.  Some of the larger rooms I have seen in the area.  We always look forward to our trips to Anaheim and Americas best value.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words. I would like to take this opportunity to personally thank you for coming back to stay with us. We have worked very hard to win back guests such as yourselves, and to reach out to new travelers. I would appreciate the opportunity to meet you and personally thank you, on your next visit.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: very nice and clean rooms, would most definitely stay here again. The customer service was very good. We had no problems with the staff. Everyone was very helpful. We would recommend to family and friends.
Manager Response: Dear Guests,  Thank you for sharing your experiences of your recent stay at ABVI in on line and thank you for rating our hotel so highly. Review like yours gives us necessary “fuel” and energy to keep on doing what we are all here to do and that is; providing excellent hospitality to our valued guest. Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Yours in Hospitality,  Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Location was good the hotel itself probably will not stay again.
Summary: We had a last minute change so this was the only available place. We had never stayed around the garden walk before so this was nice, however, the hotel was nasty. The rooms you could tell had not been cleaned stuff was left from the guests before and the beds were never changed. My baby is crawling and she dirty after crawling on the floor.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I apologize for not meeting your expectations with respect to your recent stay.  We take the comments of our guests very seriously, as our goal is to always improve on meeting and exceeding expectations..  With regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: This place was great. Wonderful value, clean and quiet. Walking distance to Disneyland. Would definitely recommend this place and definitely stay here again.Having a fridge and microwave included is awesome especially for family's on a budget. Pool and hot tub were great to, especially after walking all day.Thanks for the great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write your review of our property, your comments are very much valued and will always motivate us to do our very best.  We hope we will have the pleasure of greeting you again ! Thank you !  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Hotel was clean and bright. bathroom had NO signs of mold or mildew. the owner and his staff were very friendly. Hot tub and pool were clean. the location is great, 15 minute to Disneyland and 2 minute walk to Garden Walk. We will recommend to family and friends
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your recent review, and your kind words. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay and we are looking forward to having you back to our hotel in the near future.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Basic, clean, great value, kind,... I would stay again
Summary: 1km to disney gates, lots of food choices close by, friendly helpful staff,  Towels rough, not luxurious, but clean, tidy  Linen soft and crisp, beds comfy No dust any where,  Fridge decent size What more can I say We loved it
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments, we really appreciate that you took time to give us valuable feedback. We look forward to serving you in the near future.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Great location, good price, quality service
Summary: This is an older, but very well kept property within a 10 walk of the Disney parks.  Recently painted, neatly trimmed landscape.  Parking is tight, not suitable for RV or trailer. Rooms are simple but oversized, see the photos.  MW, coffeemaker & Fridge.  Minimum number of TV channels.  Our bath had been newly remodel, again simple but functional.  Small clean pool and jacuzzi.  Coffee and danish in the morning.  Restaurants of all price ranges a few minutes away. Target store two miles south, other retail nearby. Friendly staff.  Only "noise" we heard was guests walking past our room, water pipe noise in the wall typical of an older building.  If you are looking for a resort, this not it.  If you are looking for simple, economical accommodations, I highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate your comments regarding your recent stay. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay at ABVI. Your valuable feedback means a lot to us and we are continually upgrading and improving our amenities and services at the hotel, and we recently finished painting exterior part of hotel and now working on the Interior. Many of the rooms already have new upgraded bathrooms and we are working on remaining few. We are trying our best to provide excellent service and amenities to our hotel guest and maybe one day we will reach our goal. Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Yours in Hospitality, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Walking distance to Disneyland. Wonderful front desk service. Very nice and friendly!
Summary: This place is great! Very inexpensive and a quick walk to Disneyland's front gate. Also very close to convenience/liquor store, good strip mall food and breakfast restaurants.   The room was clean and the bed was comfortable. Had a refrigerator and coffee maker. Large poker sized table in an extra side room. This hotel room was much larger than I was expecting. It is comfortable, clean and very spacious.  The front desk service is outstanding. They are just so nice and friendly. They even let me leave my car in their parking lot after I checked out and went to Disneyland! That alone saved me $16! This place just can't be beat!  I'm from San Diego and an annual passholder to Disneyland. I regularly make trips to the park and like to stay the evening before and get to the parks
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your recent review and we are happy that you enjoyed your stay. Your positive comments mean a lot to us and help us to pass along appreciation to our hard working staff members. I look forward to having another opportunity to have you as our guest!  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We stayed for two days in a mini suit and they the rooms were very spacious, clean and comfortable.  The staff was very nice they even allowed us to check in early which helped out a lot. I would stay In this hotel again when we go to disneyland next year, even though its a little of a walk its not too far from disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review, and we are happy that you enjoyed your stay at ABVI. We are really proud to have an amazing staff members, who always give their best to provide excellent customer service to our valuable guest. Once again, thank you, and we look forward to another chance to serve you!   Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: I stayed here for 6 nights during my visit to Anaheim for a business expo. It is located very closer to the Anaheim convention centre. Moreover, the Disney world is also located in a walkable distance. The rooms are clean, tidy and comfortable equipped with microwave, refrigerator and coffee maker. The hotel has swimming pool and small Jacuzzi. The important thing is that the price is quite affordable and more competitive than compared to the others in the vicinity.  Above all, the management is very friendly and highly co-operative. Here I would like to share my experience. As my secretary had booked the hotel online through some agency at the last minute rush, mistakenly it was booked with the hotel at Stanton Avenue instead of West Katella Avenue. I noticed this when I
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that our staff have gone above and beyond in terms of service. Mr. and Mrs. Patel (and all of our staff), believe in providing that personalized service to our guest, and I am glad that you receive a very warmly welcome at our hotel.  We look forward to another opportunity to host you at our property, and once again, thank you for your positive comments.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: My son and I travelled from Australia to go to Disneyland and the staff here were amazing, so welcoming and so helpfull!!  The rooms were perfect for what we needed and we got discount tickets to the park as well!!! Cannot say enough how fantastic the staff are!!!!! If we come back we will definitely stay here!!!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that our staff have provided excellent service to you. Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: This hotel is perfect for family's that are going to Disneyland.  We walked right over and we had a room that held 3 couples.  Can you believe it, yes, it had 3 beds in the hotel room.  The breakfast was a quick grab and go, which was convenient.  The staff was nice and I will come back here every time we go to Disneyland or the Anaheim area.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   I appreciate your comments regarding your recent stay with us, your comments are very much valued. Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you again.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Found the place to be very clean. Breakfast was basically donuts and small pastries and some apples. The internet did not work most of the time in my room. Since I was at the very back. Though when moving up near the lobby I was able to connect very well. It was a short walk to the park. I would give it 5 stars but was disappointed with the internet not working. The room was clean. I will stay there again. great value for the price. The disabled room was great however no roller in shower. Though I did not need one. Could be a problem for someone who does. The staff were very pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments, you have noted that our guest rooms were "clean" and I will make sure that these comments reach our housekeeping staff, who work hard every day to ensure a positive guest experience. I apologize for the Internet issues that you had but at the same time we are very proud to say that just few days ago we installed completely new internet service in our hotel.  We look forward to having you back to our hotel in the near future, where you will experience a completely new, faster and secured Internet service.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Nice place to stay. Everything you need is in walking distance. One block to Disney. Nice clean and quiet rooms, Nice pool area, friendly frontdesk. We feel very well, coming here for more years, and will do that again...
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  I would like to take this opportunity to personally thank you for coming back to stay with us. We have worked very hard to win back guests such as yourselves, and to reach out to new travelers. Your positive comments are very much appreciated by our staff.  I would appreciate the opportunity to meet you and personally thank you, on your next visit.  Thank you!  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: Very nice motel, spend the second time 11 night there. Clean rooms, nice pool and spa area and friendly service. Nice place to stay, good location. Free w-lan and breakfast :-) I´ll come back next year for sure!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We really appreciate that you took time to give us valuable feedback. We very much appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to being of service to you on your future stays.  Thank you for being one of the most important people in our world; our valued guests.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland but really smells
Summary: This hotel is about a 10 to 15 minute stroll to Disneyland - great, convenient location. When we arrived we were not welcomed by the usual Disney Resort area welcome.  They were not rude but not friendly either. The room really smelled when we entered it. They had obviously masked other bad smells. The smell was so overwhelming that it made our eyes water and we were gagging. We had to put the air conditioner on to clear the air. The room itself was OK - a little run down. The bathroom was in need of renovation. On the stairs someone had left cigarette butts that remained there for two days. Very disappointing stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I would like to personally apologize for the series of unfortunate incidences that you experienced during your stay with us. We continually try to do our very best for all of our guests, but unfortunately, sometimes we do fail.  I will look into each issue that you have noted, in an attempt to correct and improve our hotel policies.  Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Ok for a night or two
Summary: Stayed here for a couple of nights while visiting Disneyland. Rooms are spacious, nice bathroom. A little dusty in the corners and behind the furniture. Loved the hot tub. Staff very helpful and friendly. Breakfast could be better - add some yogourt or fruit. Not very soundproof so if you want quiet get a room on the second floor.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments, we really appreciate that you took time to give us valuable feedback. I apologize for the issues that you had, and will try our best to correct it.  I am glad that you liked the room, bathroom and enjoyed the hot tub. I am also very happy that our staff have provided very good service. I look forward to having another opportunity to have you as our guest !  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: I come to Anaheim regularly and I always choose to stay in Best Value Inn as it offers the best ratio of the price and the quality. There is no other option for me in this area. I have never experienced any problems here and I deffinitelly recommend everybody else to try this hotel. During many years I have been accomodated in various rooms and I had found no difference in comfort level. Wifi connection is working perfectly and the pools are giving me the fine time to relax. If only all hotels are as good as this one...
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for being valuable guest and taking your time to write the review. I appreciate your comments regarding your recent stay and hope to see you soon again.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: We spent 2 nights at the Katella St. location. We arrived on Friday and left on Sunday. We wanted a room within walking distance of Disneyland and California Adventure. We had a 2 day hopper and we didn't want to drive to the resorts and pay for parking. The America's Best Value Inn on Katella St is located about 3 blocks from the main entrance of both resorts. It is an very easy walk up Harbor Blvd. There are many restaurants and convenience store located on Harbor Blvd also with in walking distance of this motel. The price was within our budget and so was the location. The rooms are very clean and the staff was very helpful. Our suite came with 2 bedrooms and featured both a king and full size beds. Fridge, microwave, coffeemaker, blow-dryer, ironing board and Iron.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review and taking your time to write good things about our hotel. We take the comments of our guests very seriously, as our goal is to always improve on meeting and exceeding expectations.  Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: My two children and I recently stayed at the Americas Best Value Inn and Suites and I just want to share my experience. We had a wonderful stay at the property after visiting Disneyland etc. The highlight was that on the day we were checking out, I couldn't find my handbag which contained our passports. I had already phoned the car rental company and they insisted that I hadn't left it in the car. Hitesh and his staff went to great lengths to help me and even drove around and found my children and I to tell us that the car rental company had found my handbag and had called the motel to tell me. Hitesh and his sister gave the boys and I a ride to the car rental company to pick up my handbag and I couldn't have been more grateful to them for their kind offer of help. They went
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent comments, we really appreicate that you took time to give us valuable feedback. Your positive comments are very much appreciated by our staff, who work hard each day to make sure valued customers like yourself, are looked after.   We look forward to having you back to our hotel in the near future.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Will stay here again in the future!
Summary: Stayed here the weekend after New Years for 3 nights with friends. The front desk men were super nice and welcoming, we also bought our Disneyland tickets from them at a discounted price. Our family suite (3 double beds) was clean, a little smaller than expected but decent. TV, microwave, and small fridge was provided. I really liked that the bathroom had a small window to air out shower steam.   As for walking distance to the Disney parks, it isn't bad at all. It's not as great as staying at a hotel across the street from the parks, but the walk is definitely doable. There are also a bunch of places to grab food right around the corner (subway, burgers, Mexican, pizza). Very convenient after a long day at Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent comments. We really appreciate that you stayed with us, and we look forward to provide excellent service to you on your future stays at ABVI.   Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary: I booked this hotel because I wanted to be walking distance to Disneyland and to have two rooms. I had both with this hotel. The staff was beyond friendly and they let us leave our car all day after we checked out. The room was comfortable but a little dated. The inner court yard was nice and the pool looked inviting. We bought our Disney tickets at the front counter. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking out some time to write comments and give us some valuable feedback.  We are still in the process of renovation and we recently completed renovation of hotel exterior and now we are working towards interior and completed renovation of few rooms.    I look forward to see you as our guest in the near future again.  Best Regards, Mukesh Silwal

Summary Heading: Only place I will stay in Anaheim
Summary: I always stay at this location when in Anaheim.  The rates are incredible, the rooms are large, and location is fantastic.  It's not 5 star, but the rooms are clean and the staff are friendly.  I had to make several changes to my bookings over the Internet and the owner Mr Patel handled them all with no problems, and very graciously. My friends and I originally stayed for 2 nights in a suite and arrived well before lunch and we were given an early check in no problems whatsoever.  We stayed again a few weeks later for 8 nights, in connected rooms, and loved that it was only a 10 minute walk to Disneyland, and that the ART bus stop is right out the front.   (Route number 2).  Also very close walking distance to The Cheesecake Factory, and other eateries.  The only thing I was
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Best Bang for your Buck! Large rooms. Great service! Best Price + Location!
Summary: This might not be a 5 star hotel, yes it is a bit older, and the carpet is dated. There are not granite counter tops or robes. You do however get way more than you pay for!  Very large rooms, we have stayed here twice in the same oversized room with a king bed. Small couch, and room on the floor for another queen bed. (or kids)  Clean, quiet smaller building. Looks like pictures!  Extra LARGE rooms.  Free WiFi internet.  Refrigerator and microwave.  Free parking! Walking distance to Disneyland. Probably closer than you could park in their lot!  A lot of food and souvenir shops on this block. Tons of options!   Friendly staff will get you whatever you need.  Hot water, cold AC, clean towels and sheets!  Clean looking POOL and hot tub!  We love this place for a family on a budget.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Made two separate booking, each for 2x nights in the 2-room, 2-bed setup. I was happy that we were able to check-in early as well as having the two rooms beside each other. Bed wasn't the most comfy, but it was good to have air-con, ref and fridge. Bathroom was renovated and clean. Breakfast was exactly as described, with a selection of donuts, danishes and muffins, with the beverages being coffee and juice. The front desk staff was very helpful. The only downside is that the whole place looks pretty old, but that is expected for the price.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Even though the hotel appears to be an older hotel, it is VERY CLEAN and FRESH.  The staff are wonderfully pleasant to talk to and helpful (including the housekeeping).  The rooms are very spacious too. The breakfast is minimal and some areas could use a spruce up but I definitely would recommend this place to any of my friends.  The price is very nice to my pocketbook too. A little bit of a walk to Disneyland but that is how it is at Disneyland if you aren't staying at a Disneyland resort.  They have BIG BLOCKS here. There are buses that will take you to the park and it stops at this hotel.  Restaurants are very nearby.  Don't let the name or photos steer you away.  Book with confidence. Oh, ask for a room that faces the back parking lot.  You will be able to watch the
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family stayed at this inn for 2 nights.  If you're just looking for a place to sleep for your Disneyland/ California Adventure experience, this is a good place and right for the budget.  The manager was very helpful all throughout our stay.  There's a ref and microwave, which was great especially when you have kids.  There's free continental breakfast (don't expect a great selection though).  A suggestion for ABVI - W. Katella Ave.  I hope the smell of the room can be improved.  It's not that bad but definitely not "fresh."
Manager Response: none

Summary: They didn't have my booking when I arrived and they didn't have any rooms available for the night, so one of the managers booked and drove me to one of their other hotels in the area and picked me up again the next morning with my room all ready for check-in. Very friendly staff. Close walking to Disneyland, lots of restaurants. Room very spacious.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: I was very satisfied with my stay at  Americas Best Value Inn.
Summary: I had a very nice room with a micro/fridge, coffee maker, hairdrier, iron and board, free wi-fi, and continental breakfast. There also is a jacuzzi and a large heated pool on the property. I was within walking distance to Disneyland and California Adventure Park. The rooms are reasonably priced.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel management and staff are just fantastic!! With out us even asking and from hearing a convo with my husband about his electric cart we had to get. They gave us an accessible room! Pretty spacious, very clean. Not a bad walk to the park at all. Not a hotel with all the bells and whistles and frills but it was so clean, beds comfy, close distance, great staff. Considering how long one is in a room when at Disneyland this is THE best value and place we have stayed at. I highly recommend  here. Basic free continental breakfast just enough to get you going out the door (the coffee is very good btw) As a matter of fact just booked my next stay there for August. You want something that has no bugs, clean, clean smelling not a chemical clean smell?? Friendliest staff? Comfy
Manager Response: none

Summary: Anywhere else, this hotel would be overpriced, however considering Disneyland is within walking distance, it was a good deal.  No parking fees, and we didn't have to hassle with taking a bus to the parking lot after a long day in the park (though young kids may have a hard time walking the distance when tired). We felt safe in the area, even walking late at night.  We had the mini suite with a king bed in the main room, and a double bed in a smaller room with a door between.  Beds were hard, and the pillows were the hardest I have ever slept on in my life.  So if you stay there, bring your own pillow. They provide the very minimum in soap (little bitty bars) and shampoo. Thin towels.  The place is old, but pretty clean, good air conditioning.  The management was very nice and
Manager Response: none

Summary: Spent a couple of days at Disney and really only needed a place to sleep and a place within walking distance. This hotel met both needs.  We stayed in a room with 3 beds. The room was a nice size and was clean with a couple of exceptions- the chairs at the table in room 215 had very nasty stains on them and the carpet looked dirty.  Other than that, I could tell the owner worked hard to keep the grounds/pool and rooms clean. I think I saw someone cleaning something all the time.  This place is definitely old- the bed mattresses are old, tv and furniture is old also. But if you are staying here you are probably planning on spending your time at Disney and do not need many frills. We felt the hotel delivered what we needed at a great price. We bought our tickets at the hotel which
Manager Response: none

Summary: Family of 5 stayed in a room with 3 queen beds. Small table in the room had only 2 chairs. Carpet was dirty and stained. Bathroom was old and was not very clean.  They had ONE very tiny bar of soap that was not enough for 5 people.  We asked for more, which they did provide.  Bath towels were stained and very low quality (my camping towels are nicer!). Beds were EXTREMELY uncomfortable and after spending all day at the parks, you really want a place to rest your tired body!  Blankets and bedspread were thin AND the sheets on my bed TORN!  (The maid should have seen this each time she cleaned our room and made up the bed!) Two stars are for the friendly family who runs the place and the fact that it was semi-close to Disneyland.  Pool area looked nice, but we did not use it, as
Manager Response: We appologize for your uncomfortable time at our hotel, and thank you for your comments regarding the condition of our hotel.  We take pride in reviewing and responding comments suggestions and criticisms made by our guests.  In regards to your comments, we have put an effort to changing what items that need to be changed. We thank you for your buisness and assure you the right modifications will be made.

Summary: The first impression when you get into the room is that it's just VERY old. And that a HUGE amount of air freshener has been used... I wonder what it smelled like BEFORE the freshener, although not really... The furniture/TV and especially AC are all very old. The AC is so loud you can't actually sleep. We had a room on the ground floor so we could hear our neighbours upstairs just moving around the room. The bathroom is more or less ok, but there were different type of hair everywhere, even on the towels, which was disgusting. And of course there was a note on the night stand saying: thank you for the tips! Maybe you should first do your job properly and then await something and not wise versa. Haven't tried the breakfast, there are plenty of possibilities around. Short walk to
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Close to Disney, quiet, very nice
Summary: My friend and I stayed here for one night while during our short Disneyland vacation, it was perfect. Very reasonable rates, and the room was clean and quiet. It's within walking distance from Disneyland and since we got there on Thursday night and went to Disneyland on Friday, they let us keep our car there all day Friday so that was nice. I would definitely recommend this place and stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our first time on this property. A basic accommodation (nothing fancy) within walking distance of Disneyland. Next door is a great Indian restaurant, especially with parents travelling with us who like Indian vegetarian food. Free parking. Free breakfast. Very reasonable rent. Also there is a swimming pool, hot tub on the property but we passed that in favor of spending more time in Disneyland. Unlike the usual experience here the affordable accommodation came with excellent service, functional amenities and cleanliness.
Manager Response: none

Summary: i've been here so many times every i brought my family to disneyland this is my favorite hotel i always want to stay, is just because its affordable room price, amenities, ambiance and most important rooms was always clean! two thumbs up this place!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Our favorite place to stay in
Summary: This hotel/inn is our favorite of all..  It's clean, affordable, and  walking distance from the park... my kids loves the pool!! they had alot of fun!   And near to restaurant, and convinient store the staffs are friendly... sure to stay here again....     ps. we use to stay here for atleast 4 times a year... that's how we love this place..
Manager Response: none

Summary: OK...This place is nothing flash, if you are looking for a place to sleep and shower while visiting Disneyland this place is for you.  If you want any more than that, go elsewhere.  There are no fancy finishing touches, the paintwork needs works etc...but it doesn't bother us and the price is great for what we get.   We returned here because the rooms are perfect for our party of 3, 2 adults 1 child.  We stay in a mini suite which gives junior a room of his own and us adults some personal space while he is sleeping.  It takes us about 10 minutes to walk to Disneyland, but is only a couple of minutes walk to takeaway food and restaurants. We would stay here again because we spend very little time in the rooms, the price is fantastic and the room layouts are perfect for us. FYI, I
Manager Response: none

Summary: My sister and I stayed in a 2 room suite for four nights.  The hotel is basic but very clean. It is an older hotel. The bathroom is very basic, and the second bedroom is basically just big enough to fit the double bed and bedside table in. Having said that, it suited us just fine!  We had the pool to ourselves during the day. It's a good 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland.  And a very short walk to Bubba Gump shrimp, the Cheesecake Factory and the Gardenwalk.  The staff were friendly, and from the back carpark you get an excellent view of the fireworks at night.  If you want cheap, basic, clean and convenient - this is your hotel!!
Manager Response: We wish to thank you for taking your time in reviewing our hotel here at Americas Best Value Inn of Anaheim.  We hope you enjoyed your stay and look foward to accommodating you very soon!  As always our staff are grateful for your business and hope to build on any relationship established during your stay.  We wish you nothing less than the very best! -Irwin Adrian Velasco            Front Office Manager at Americas Best Value Inn

Summary Heading: Well, at least my wife didn't shoot me
Summary: OK, let me start off by saying that my wife and I are raising our grandkids and we wanted to take them to Disneyland.  So, I was trying to save a buck.  We get to the Yellow and Red painted "motel" and found out why it was much less expensive.  It is one of the older "Disney area" motels that is still standing and has probably changed ownership more than a few times over the years.  It is currently run by folks from India (hence the color of the motel).  They were very nice folks, but I should have paid $25-$35 per night more and made my wife happier.  From now on, she picks where we are staying...........
Manager Response: Apologizes on our behalf but as a fellow employee of Americas Best Value Inn.  The comment posted remarking the ethnicity of some of our workers to the color the hotel made them feel succumbed to a racist remark.  The color choice of the hotel should not refer to the owners or workers ethnicity, judgement should not be based on cultural backgrounds.  We take pride in hiring different ethnicites and do not judge.  We believe in equal opportunity and discourage racisim in all areas from our service, to even guests staying at our hotel.  We appreciate your buisness and hope to keep on building on everyones comments and suggestions for a better stay and for a better service.  - Irwin Adrian Velasco             Front Office Manager at Americas Best Value Inn

Summary: We were tourists from the Philippines .We didnt know our way around.The staff was so nice, so helpful. Our Room had 2 queen beds clean and comfortable. Very good location. So easy to commute to and from disneyland. We had a great time! We are definely coming back!
Manager Response: Thank you, for your taking your time to comment on your behalf.  We look foward to servicing your every need and look foward to your next stay here.  It is customers like you and so many others that make our job here at Americas Best Value Inn delightful!  We hope the next time you choose to visit Disneyland in Anaheim that you bare us in mind.  From the very bottom of our hearts we wish to thank you once again for choosing Americas Best Value Inn! -Irwin Adrian Velasco            Front Office Manager at Americas Best Value Inn

Summary: Our family stayed at America's Best Value Inn and Suites in early October for four nights, during our trip to Disneyland. We had a room upstairs and could see the night time fireworks at Disneyland from the verandah outside my room. The room itself was clean and functional, with a small fridge provided and also a microwave. The gardens and pool, around which the hotel is built, made it a very pleasant environment the kids had alot of fun in the pool and the hot tub. The staff, are extremely helpful and polite and went out of their way to help us find things locally. The hotel is very handy to Disneyland, a few minutes' walk. There is a multitude of restaurants very close. There are also two convenience stores down on the corner. I enjoyed my stay at this hotel and we will stay
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time on your behalf to comment on your stay.  We wish to thank you for your visit in the city of Anaheim and hope that the next time you visit, you bare us in mind.  We hope to keep providing you as well as all our future customers with the same service you were provided and to keep on building from each suggestion.  Once again thank you for choosing Americas Best Value Inn for your stay and we look foward to seeing you in the near future. -Irwin Adrian Velasco            Front Office Manager at Americas Best Value Inn

Summary: Price was a factor for this stay and accomodating 3 men, This was our first night on our trip to the US. No excuses for the carpet being filthy feet got black when walking on it. Also the walls were grubby and marked. Fair enough it was cheap, but what does the cleaner do. Wouldnt recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Booked this hotel as the description says it is a luxury hotel with suites.  WRONG! - This is a Motel. The room smelled like it has been cleaned with a rag which has just been used to clean a dudes urinal! - We had to leave the windows open and go and buy air freshener.  The pillows are hard and the bedding and towels did not have the just laundered feel.  Our bedding and towels were not changed during our stay.  The breakfast they advertise is a sugar fest.  Stale pastries from Sams club and if you take more than one 7oz cup of OJ you got the stink eye from the person behind the desk.  Ok if you just want to lay down and move on.  Certainly not worth the money. Look into better deals around that area and pay a little more
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed 16 nights at this Hotel, very clean and comfortable rooms, pillows good.  The room i had overlooked the pool and i could see the fireworks from Disneyland - bonus, it was also very quiet.  The Manager Hitesh Patel and his family could not have been nicer, they helped with everything from recommending places to eat to booking and recommending tours for me.  Is within walking distance to Disneyland and the Convention Centre and the Garden Walk.  I could not recommend this hotel highly enough.  Some friends stayed at an hotel nearby, a big hotel and they would rather have stayed here, says it all really.  If i ever come back to Anaheim i will certainly be staying at Americas Best Value Inn and Suites with Hitesh and his family.  Even the cleaning ladies were so lovely.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Clean, safe, convenient and a very good price.
Summary: I stayed at America's Best Value Inn and Suites in early September for three nights, during my first visit to the Los Angeles area.  I had a room upstairs and could see the night time fireworks at Disneyland from the verandah outside my room.  The room itself was clean and functional, with a small fridge provided and also a microwave.  The gardens and pool, around which the hotel is built, made it a very pleasant environment. The room could perhaps use a little freshening up as the furniture was a little worn but everything worked as it should. The staff, in particular the manager, are extremely helpful and polite and went out of their way to help me find things locally such as Target and Walgreens.  The hotel is very handy to Disneyland, a few minutes' walk.  There is a
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our first time staying at this hotel.  It is within walking distance from Disneyland.  The rooms were clean. They were also courteous and helpful at the front desk. We are planning on going back next year to Disneyland and for sure we will make reservations at this hotel again.  I will recommend this hotel to my family and friends.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Expedia should be ashamed to even help these people! This "motel" is an apt/ motel. The perm people live upstairs, the guests are down stairs. The bed was like concrete, the room smelled like smoke even though it was a " non- smoking" room!!! They gave us only 1 roll of tp, like we were stocking up for the winter! No discounts, not AAA or Military which really pisses me off, being a military wife. Need to use your room key to get ice, and forget about the breakfast! There wasn't one! Hope you don't drive a big car because it will be a B--ch to get a spot in their parking lot. There were also cig burns in the sheets. The people were sorta nice, but they need to decide what they want to be? An apt bldg or a motel????? Never agn. No wifi unless you want to pay xtra ea nite. For the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to make us aware of your experience at America's Best Value Inn and Suites.  Providing for your total satisfaction, from the moment you arrive to the moment you depart, is my staff's primary duty.  Hearing that we failed in your case is truly disheartening, and for that, I offer you my sincerest apology. It is my pleasure to provide you with an explanation regarding your concern about our amenities. Our hotel is known for providing great rooms at great rates, without some of the fluff that you find at other hotels. Items like toilet paper  shampoos and conditioners are not complimentary; you do wind up paying for it in the nightly rate. Although we don't place extra amenities into a guest room prior to check-in, we do have a limited supply of sundries available upon request at the front desk. We operate this way because it lets us continue to provide our guests with quality accommodations at an exceptional price. I do regret that we were not able to communicate to you exactly what you could expect before you arrived.  As for you’re the cost of stay at your hotel, the reservation made on Expedia was a third party reservation; meaning it was pre-paid before your arrival.  Unfortunately, we feel deeply sorry on our behalf as we provide all types of discounts from Government rates, to AAA rates, and more exclusively Military discounts.  We will look deep into this situation to make sure this never happens again with Expedia.  Our wifi has and will always be free, miscommunication on our behalf for not letting you know may have been a key factor in this misfortune.  We will assess this situation to the fullest extent and will work on bettering our communication with future guests.  Let me assure you that your experience is certainly not typical, and that we have put in place measures to ensure that the type of stay you had won't be repeated. Again, I apologize and promise you that we are committed to your total satisfaction. If there is anything you would like to discuss further with me, please don't hesitate to contact us by visiting our website and clicking on the Contact Us link at the bottom of the page. I do hope you will give us the honor of having you as a guest again if future travels will bring you into our location.

Summary: It was an awesome place to stay with my family. The service was really excellent and the rooms were clean too. I loved the stay and if i visit anaheim again, i would definitely choose to stay here... On top of it all, the best thing was that garden walk is so near and its just walking distance to disneyland from the hotel... Overall, THUMBS UP ;-)
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: This is really good hotel near Disneyland!!
Summary: This hotel is at walkable distance from Disneyland and offers variety of rooms at great rates. I have been there twice 3-4 days stay both time. We checked in at this hotel, visited Disneyland on day 1, went to Sea world on day 2 (1.5 hrs drive), Universal Studios on Day 3 (0.5 hrs drive). So the location was perfect with our plan. They offer good breakfast in the morning n staff is cooperative. Seven Eleven, Indian restaurant and panda express at few mins walk.   Have fun!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good value and location for budget conscious families
Summary: First of all I'd really like to say the owners of the hotel were very understanding. A couple of days before we were to check in our family came down with the some kind of stomach flu and the hotel was very understanding and allowed us to change our date of arrival for the next week without being charged. Most hotels would not have let us do that without charging us.  Especially near Disneyland. We stayed 3 nights here for our trip to Disney Land.  We stayed in the 3 bed suite, which was great for our family.  Its a hotel room with the basic amenities 2 beds in 1 room and another bed in a separate room, only 1 tv.  But since we spent all our time at Disneyland, it wasn't a big deal. The bathroom was very nice and updated, and I noticed during our stay that maintenance was
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good value for a good location
Summary: I believe for the amount of money paid, it's a combination of a good value for a basic room. No luxury or room service but the pace is good for family and is located in the heart of the city.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family stayed for 4 nights and we stayed in a suite.  It was roomy, nothing fancy but nice.  Anything extra I asked for, coffee, towels, etc., were readily given with a smile.  For the money I think it was very nice, housekeeping did an excellent job, the staff alsways had a smile and friendly greeting.  When asked if we could stay past check out it was not a problem.  Close to Disney, continental breakfast was a nice bonus.  Definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your comments. It's fantastic to hear you were satisfied with your stay.  We take pride in our customer service and strive to provide clean and comfortable rooms at a good price.  Please think of us again for all your future trips.  We look forward to seeing you again.  -- Pat (manager)

Summary: Price was cheap, room small, dirty smells , beds hard, very bad motel
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We are sorry to hear you had a bad experience during your last visit with us.  We take all our guest's feedback seriously and appreciate you bringing these items to light for correction. Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We still hope you think of us for your future accomodations as we will do whatever it takes to provide you with a comfortable, enjoyable stay.  Thank you.  -- Pat (manager)

Summary Heading: “Great value,  great location for disney very friendly"
Summary: Stayed here for 5 nights from may/26/12 to jun/02/12  stop 2 nights to Las vegas for vacation , Had a 3 bedroom and it has been fantastic , housekeeping is excellent verry clean and very friendly ,free parking except the wifi is very  slow , I can not using phone on my laptop , need to upgrade the wifi ,I will come back to stay again . " Pat management " was super nice and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your positive comments. It's fantastic to hear you were satisfied with your stay and that you would consider staying with us again.  We take pride in our customer service and strive to provide clean and comfortable rooms at a good price.  We look forward to seeing you again!  -- Pat (manager)

Summary: We have read some not-so-good reviews of the place, and after staying there I can't help but wonder why that is so. The staff there seemed to be relatively friendly, and had in fact upgraded our room to a suite for free since it wasn't occupied. I was really impressed by that! In addition, this motel is really close to Disneyland (which was what we were there for), such that we were able to reach the theme park before it opened, thus avoiding the crowd. The suite itself was really big and comfortable, and had all the basic facilities we needed. In fact, it was one of the biggest rooms we had stayed in during our 1-month stay in the United States.  The only thing I have against this place is the breakfast. Maybe it is an American thing, but the only thing available was doughnuts
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  It's fantastic to hear you were satisfied with your stay and that you would consider staying with us again.  We take pride in our customer service and strive to provide clean and comfortable rooms at a good price.  Thank you for expressing your opinion about some of the amenties we provide.  We take all our guest's requests and comments into consideration while continually trying to provide the best services.  Please think of us again for all your future trips.  We look forward to seeing you again.  -- Pat (manager)

Summary: We have stayed at this place on 3 separate occasions, it really suits our budget. We have found over months of travelling that most places in the USA have one big room, with 2 beds, but if you have kids you know that having the room to close off to get littlies to sleep is a big plus!  The beds are nice and comfy and you have your own fridge/freezer, microwave and awesome storage for bags, which was perfect for our family.  It was a very short walking distance to restaurants on the left and a short walk to take-away places such as subway, chinese and pizza going right.  Disney is just a block away as well.  The pool is lovely and a great place to spend a few hours.  Also if you are filling in time the Garden Walk is right next door.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your positive comments.  It's fantastic to hear you were satisfied with your stay and that you continue to come see us everytime you visit Anaheim.  We take pride in our customer service and strive to provide clean and comfortable rooms at a good price.  Please think of us again for all your future trips.  We look forward to seeing you again.  -- Pat (manager)

Summary Heading: Accommodating: early check-in and luggage storage. Good for car-less Disney Resort vacations.
Summary: No Gideon Bibles. Hair in the shower drain upon arrival. Donuts, danishes, coffee, and orange juice each morning. Two heat pumps in the suite. Lots of rose bushes planted around the grounds. Ice machine is non-intuitive. Convenience stores are along the walk to Disneyland. A low-tech hotel operation.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for the review.  I am sorry to hear you had some issues with your stay.  It is our goal to make each guest's stay enjoyable and comfortable.  We appreciate you bringing these items to our attention for immediate correction.  We take all our reviews seriously and hope you will still consider us for accomodations in the future.  Thank you for your time.  -- Pat (manager)

Summary Heading: Really good for and excellent price.
Summary: Great choice! Really good for and excellent price. You should try it~
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for recommending our hotel to other travelers.  We take pride in our customer service and strive to provide clean and comfortable rooms at a good price.  It's great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to see you again soon.    -- Pat (manager)

Summary: The only good thing about this place was the nice guy that checked us in, other than that... Miserable!  The beds were like sleeping on a piece of wood, the air conditioner didn't work, the bathtub was filthy. At 2:00 am we were woken up by a huge fight going on outside our door. It was so bad we thought someone was going to get shot!  Trust me, stay elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We are sorry to hear you had a bad experience during your last visit with us.  We take all our guest's feedback seriously and appreciate you bringing these items to light for correction.  Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We still hope you think of us for your future accomodations as we will do whatever it takes to provide you with a comfortable, enjoyable stay.  Thank you.  -- Pat (manager)

Summary Heading: If you are spending all your money at Disneyland and really need a suite...
Summary: I would really rate this place about a 2 1/2. Having stayed at other motels along South Harbor Blvd., I know that none of the within walking distance motels are spectacular, but this place offers even a little lower caliber than what I've experienced elsewhere. Upon seeing the motel from the exterior, it looks well enough. The parking in the back was plentiful, and very private, though entry to it was slightly obscured. The courtyard pool area is great, filled with fragrant roses and jasmine, it smelled heavenly. The pool was clean, though the hot tub didn't have anything floating in it, the water appeared dingy. Perhaps it was an additive, perhaps it was truly dirty...I don't know.  We had a suite with a king in one room and a double in a tiny side room. We chose this motel
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We are sorry to hear of the mixed reviews you had with your last visit at our hotel.  We take all our guest's feedback seriously and appreciate you bringing these items to light for correction.  Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We still hope you think of us for your future accomodations as we will do whatever it takes to provide you with a comfortable, enjoyable stay.  Thank you.  -- Pat (manager)

Summary Heading: My yearly January stay at America's Best, Ahaheim, CA
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel several times & I have always found Hitu, the manager, to be very pleasant.  The rooms are comfortable & clean & within walking distance of the Convention Center where I attend a craft show every year.  Parking at the Convention Center is expensive  so I appreciate the fact I can leave my car at the hotel & feel I've left it in a safe place.  The Internet connection is very good & I don't think you can find a more reasonable place to stay this close to the Convention Center or Disneyland.  There are great places to eat, all within walking distance. The pool & yard are very nice & you can't find more accommodating people!  I would definitely recommend this hotel if you are looking for a clean, quiet place to sleep at night ... at a VERY reasonable
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for recommending our hotel to other travelers.  We take pride in our customer service and strive to provide clean and comfortable rooms at a good price.  It's great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to see you again soon.    -- Pat (manager)

Summary: I stayed here with my two children and thought it was a good place. It's ideal for walking to disneyland and also very close to the garden walk, where we like to eat. We stayed in one of the suites and though the second bedroom was very small, it suited our needs. The management was super nice and helpful. Even though the hotel is older and it's noticeable in some aspects, it's clear they are working to upgrade it and keep it clean. I would recommend it to people who are looking for a decent place to stay with children that's not too pricey. Thanks so much for having a budget friendly and clean hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you valued guest for recommending our hotel to other travelers!     We are glad you found your stay with us affordable and enjoyable. We are one block to  Disneyland,The Garden Walk is next door and does provide great shopping and diningchoices.  We look forward to seeing youagain on your next visit!

Summary Heading: Decent inexpensive accommodation, walk to Disney!
Summary: My sister and spent 2 nights here in March 2012 to visit Disneyland for 3 days. Given the very good value price, the hotel was actually much nicer than I expected, the service was good, and I would definitely stay here again without hesitation.  We arrived a little earlier than the stated check in time but our room was ready and check in was straightforward. They had accommodated our request for a room at the back away from the main road.  We had an upstairs room - be aware there are no elevators so you need to be able to carry your bags up one flight of stairs. Not a major issue. Because of the inexpensive price of the room I wasn't expecting the full range of modern conveniences.   We had a deluxe queen room and it was great. Clean and tidy, and with two separate 'areas' for
Manager Response: Dear Sharon Blance,  Tank you for the review! We are glad you found your stay with us affordable and enjoyable. We are very close to Disneyland, just a 10 to 15 minute walk.One of service you missed to use ART service to Disneland Resort for all day $4 adult $1 child. ART shuttle picks up 30 minutes from our door stop.The Garden Walk is next door and does provide great shopping and dining choices. Bubba Gumps, The Cheesecake Factory and California Pizza are just a few of the great restaurants in walking distance(next to us) from here. We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit!  Thank you again Pat

Summary Heading: Decent Budget Hotel Within Walking Distance to Park
Summary: We stayed here on a Wednesday after spending the day at Disneyland.  Arrived at around 11am and were issued room keys and parking pass even though check-in is not until 2pm.  The room wasn't ready, so our stuff stayed in the car, but not having to mess with front desk on our return from the park was very convenient.  Walk to Disneyland was about 10 minutes with young ones in tow, so not too far.  We reserved a single queen room for $30 less than ANY other hotel in the area.  Room was spacious and clean, though certainly worn.  The bed was a little on the firm side, but not uncomfortable, though the pillows on the bed were pretty thin.  However, after a call to the front desk, we were given two additional pillows that were much thicker, so had a great sleep.  Breakfast provided
